original: A free city of the Holy Roman Empire, granted special privileges by the Emperor.
translation: 神圣罗马帝国的自由市，被皇帝授予了特权。

original: It was a short-lived city-state government that formed in the Duchy of Milan when the Duke died without an heir in 1447.
translation: 这是一个短命的城邦制政府。在1477年，米兰公国的公爵死后没有继承人，导致了这个政府的形成。

original: The title Archduke was only used by the House of Habsburg in order to elevate them above other dukes into a more a prestigious position more in line with the Prince-electors of the Holy Roman Empire.
translation: 哈布斯堡大公为其家族所特有的头衔，旨在使哈布斯堡公爵拥有比其他公爵更加显赫的地位，并与神圣罗马帝国的选帝侯相匹敌。

original: A powerful territorial vassal lord in Japan, ruling their hereditary lands under the shogun.\n§MA country can take over the Shogunate, and become the overlord of all Daimyo Subjects, by taking the province of Kyoto.§!
translation: 日本体制中强有力的地方诸侯领主，在幕府将军治下统治着其世袭领地。\n§M各国国主可以通过上洛即占据京都来继任将军并成为所有大名的宗主。§!

original: Although nominally appointed by the Emperor, the shogunate became a hereditary military dictatorship and the de facto ruler of Japan between 1192 and 1867.\n§MA country can take over the Shogunate, and become the overlord of all Daimyo Subjects, by taking the province of Kyoto.§!
translation: 虽然幕府将军名义上由天皇任命，但是其却成为了世袭的独裁军阀，是日本从1192年到1867年间的实际统治者。\n§M各国国主可以通过上洛即占据京都来继任幕府将军并成为所有大名的宗主。§!

original: A powerful Lord in Japan, ruling their hereditary lands without acknowledging any shogun.\n§MA country can take over the Shogunate, and become the overlord of all Daimyo Subjects, by taking the province of Kyoto.§!
translation: 日本体制中实力强劲的领主，在没有得到任何将军承认的情况下统治着其世袭领地。\n§M各国国主可以通过上洛即占据京都来继任将军并成为所有大名的宗主。§!

original: Although similar to the feudal fief system, the holders under the iqta tax farming system did not actually own their lands, and were not guaranteed that they would be inherited by the next generation.
translation: 尽管与封建采邑制相似，但伊克塔制下的封建主实际上并不拥有领地，其下一代的继承权也并没有受到保障。

original: This state is ruled by a religious leader with the throne passing on within his divinely sanctioned family.
translation: 这个国家的统治者同时兼任宗教领袖，其王位在一个受神灵认可的家族内传递。

original: This state was once taken over by Mamluk slave soldiers and sustains itself through continued importation of soldier slaves.
translation: 这个国家曾一度被马穆鲁克奴隶士兵所占领，并通过持续输入奴隶士兵来维持自己的地位。

original: The Dutch Republic is a confederation of seven provinces, which have their own governments and are very independent, and Generality lands, which are governed directly by the States-General, the federal government.
translation: 荷兰共和国是一个由七个省及若干分子邦组成的联邦。共和国各省有着相当高的独立性，且都拥有自己的政府，而分子邦则由联省议会即联邦政府直接管辖。

original: The highest government rank, the King of Kings, used for a large sprawling group of states that are united and ruled by a single individual.
translation: 最高的政府等级，众王之王，由单独一人所统治的统一的庞大国家集团。

original: This is an instant action, due to this being a Territorial Core.
translation: 基于这是一个自治领地核心，该行动将是即时的。
过滤与感兴趣国家有关的消息。
过滤与其他国家有关的消息。

original: The current heir is NOT a general
translation: 现在的继承人不是陆军将领

original: This province has been razed by our nomadic warriors.
translation: 此省份已被我族的游牧战士所劫掠。
现在的继承人是陆军将领
任命继承人为陆军将领

original: Are you sure you want to assign your ruler as general?\n\nThis might put them at risk but will not cost any monarch points.
translation: 确定要将统治者指定为陆军将领吗？\n\n这可能会让他面临风险，但这个将领不会消耗任何君主点数。

original: Are you sure you want to assign your heir as general?\n\nThis might put them at risk but will not cost any monarch points.
translation: 确定要将继承人指定为陆军将领吗？\n\n这可能会让他面临风险，但这个将领不会消耗任何君主点数。

original: Are you sure you wish to recruit a General?\n\n This will cost §Y$COST$§!£mil .
translation: 你确定要招募一位陆军将领？\n\n这将花费§Y$COST$§!£mil£。

original: Are you sure you wish to recruit an Admiral?\n\nThis will cost §Y$COST$§!£dip .
translation: 你确定要招募一位海军将领？\n\n这将花费§Y$COST$§!£dip£。

original: Are you sure you wish to recruit an Explorer?\n\n This will cost §Y$COST$§!£dip .
translation: 你确定要招募一位探险家？\n\n这将花费§Y$COST$§!£dip£。

original: Are you sure you wish to recruit a Conquistador?\n\n This will cost §Y$COST$§!£mil .
translation: 你确定要招募一位征服者？\n\n这将花费§Y$COST$§!£mil£。

original: Not possible with these game-rules of historical monarchs!
translation: 有关历史君主的规则设置不允许这样做！

original: The $NAME$ government type does not allow heirs to lead armies.
translation: $NAME$政体不允许继承人领导军队。

original: The $NAME$ government type does not allow rulers to lead armies.
translation: $NAME$政体不允许统治者领导军队。

original: You have no heir that could lead your armies.
translation: 你没有可以领导军队的继承人。

original: Sadly females are not respected as generals in this time-period.
translation: 遗憾的是，在这个时代女性无法成为将领。

original: Only an adult of 15 years or older can command armies.
translation: 只有年满15岁的成人才可以指挥军队。

original: You are the lesser partner of a union.
translation: 你是联合统治中被统治的一方。

original: Your heir is already a general.
translation: 你的继承人已经是一位陆军将领了。

original: This will make a general out of your heir. He or she will then be available to command your armies. Having your heir leading an army could be beneficial, but it is also a large risk, as generals have risk of dying on the battlefield.
translation: 这会让你的继承人成为一个将军。他或她可以指挥你的军队。让你的继承人领导一支军队可能有好处，但也会冒着巨大的风险，因为将军有在战场上死亡的风险。

original: You can only create cores in provinces you own.
translation: 你只能将你控制下的省份核心化。

original: It is not possible to seize a province when in combat.
It is not possible to seize someone's capital.
You can only seize the provinces of an enemy!
translation: 你只能夺取敌国的省份！

original: You need to control this province to be allowed to seize it.
translation: 你需要控制这个省份才能夺取它。

original: You need §Y$COST$§W £mil to seize a province, and you only have §Y$VAL$§!.
translation: 你需要花费§Y$COST$§W£mil£来夺取一个省份而你只有§Y$VAL$§!。

original: Seize permanent ownership of this colony or native city for §Y$COST$§!£mil .
translation: 花费§Y$COST$§!£mil£以夺取该殖民地或原住民城市的永久控制权。

original: It is not possible to burn a colony when in combat.
translation: 战斗中无法焚毁殖民地。

original: You can only burn down the colonies of your enemies.
translation: 你只能焚毁敌人的殖民地。

original: §YBurn Colony§!\nOnly colonies can be burnt down.
translation: §Y焚毁殖民地§!\n只有殖民地能够被焚毁。

original: §YBurn Colony§!\nYou need to control this province to be allowed to burn the colony.
translation: §Y焚毁殖民地§!\n你需要控制这个省份才能焚毁这里的殖民地。

original: §YBurn Colony§!\nYou need §Y$COST$§W £mil to burn a colony, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W.
translation: §Y焚毁殖民地§!\n你需要花费§Y$COST$§W £mil 来焚毁殖民地，而你只有§Y$VAL$§W。
§Y焚毁殖民地§!\n花费§Y$COST$§W £mil 来焚毁这个殖民地。

original: It is not possible to try to attack the natives while in combat.
translation: 战斗中无法攻击原住民。

original: There are no natives here that can be attacked.
translation: 此地没有可以攻击的原住民。

original: This is not our land, the natives here are under protection.
translation: 这不是我们的领土，此地的原住民受到保护。

original: It is not possible to attack natives while moving.
translation: 移动中无法攻击原住民。

original: You need §Y$COST$§W£mil to attack natives, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W.
translation: 需要花费§Y$COST$§W £mil 才能攻击原住民，而你只有§Y$VAL$§W。

original: Attack the local population to eliminate the threat of them attacking your colonists later.
translation: 攻击当地原住民以消除其对殖民队的威胁。

original: You can't scorch earth in a province that has been devastated past $VAL|$ devastation.
translation: 你不能对荒废度已达$VAL|$的省份实行焦土政策。

original: Colonies are not built up enough to be scorched.
translation: 该殖民地还没发展到能实行焦土政策的程度。

original: This place is already as desolate as possible, so scorching it any further is out of the question.
translation: 此地已然被毁灭殆尽，故而进一步的焦土政策是没有意义的。

original: You can only scorch provinces you control or that are owned by enemies.
translation: 你只能在你控制下或属于敌人的省份上实行焦土政策。

original: You can only scorch the earth while at war.
translation: 你只能在战时实行焦土政策。

original: It is not possible to scorch the earth while running away.
translation: 撤退时不能实行焦土政策。

original: You need §Y$COST$§W £mil to scorch the earth of this province, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W.
translation: 你需要花费§Y$COST$§W£mil£才能对这个省份实行焦土政策，而你只有§Y$VAL$§W。

original: Scorched Earth costs §Y$COST$§! £mil , impacts $NAME$ with $MOD$ for $TIME|Y$ months, and increases devastation by §R$AMOUNT$§! with the following effects:
translation: 实行焦土政策花费§Y$COST$§! £mil ，对$NAME$造成持续$TIME|Y$个月的$MOD$，增加§R$AMOUNT$§!荒废度并带来以下效果：

original: Property and resources have been destroyed in order to deny the enemy the use of this province.
translation: 此省份内的产业及资源已被完全摧毁以让敌人无可利用。

original: §YImprovement value§!\n§WThis sorts Buildings by the value they provide relative to their cost.§!
translation: §Y改进数额§!\n§W按产出与花费之比给建筑排序。§!

original: In the message filter settings window, you can select countries that you are interested in. You will be shown messages and alerts from those countries important to you.
translation: 在消息过滤器设置窗口中，你可以选择你感兴趣的国家。你将收到对你来说很重要的国家的消息和警报。

original: §YLeft click§! replaces current selection.\n§YRight click§! adds to current selection.\n§YLeft click + SHIFT§! toggles filter.
translation: §Y左键点击§!以替代当前的选择。\n§Y右键点击§!增加到当前的选择。\n§Y左键点击+SHIFT§!切换过滤器。

original: Deselect all countries from the list.
translation: 取消列表中的所有国家。

original: Select countries by using best guess method.
translation: 通过最优估测方式选择国家。

original: Select countries that are your enemies.
Select countries that are your allies.
Select countries that are your neighbors.
Select countries that own any province on the continent.
translation: 选择在大陆上拥有省份的国家。

original: This is only valid in provinces producing §Y$GOODS$§W.
translation: 这只在生产§Y$GOODS$§W的省份有效。

original: Unlocked idea groups and number of ideas:
translation: 未解锁的理念组和理念数量：

original: Patriarch Authority is less than §Y$VAL$§W percent.\n
Patriarch Authority is at least §Y$VAL$§W percent.\n
When reaching maximum Patriarch Authority you will gain:
translation: 当牧首权威达到最大值时，你将得到：

original: With no Patriarch Authority you will get no modifiers.
translation: 没有牧首权威，你不会得到任何修正效果。

original: With this setting, we will pay up to §Y$PERDEV$§!¤ per §YDevelopment§! to combat §YCorruption§! each month. Currently, we pay §Y$COST$§!¤ monthly to reduce corruption by $ROOTOUT$ yearly, for a total yearly change of $CHANGE$.
translation: 在此设置下，每点§Y发展度§!每月会消耗我们§Y$PERDEV$§!¤以对抗§Y腐败度§!。目前，我们每月花费§Y$COST$§!¤，每年可减少$ROOTOUT$腐败度。目前的腐败度年变化总额为$CHANGE$。

original: Mercantilism is less than $VAL|Y$ percent (current $CURRENTVAL|Y$ percent).
translation: 重商主义小于百分之$VAL|Y$（目前为百分之 $CURRENTVAL|Y$）。

original: Mercantilism is at least $VAL|Y$ percent (currently $CURRENTVAL|Y$ percent).
translation: 重商主义至少百分之 $VAL|Y$（目前为百分之 $CURRENTVAL|Y$）。

original: Mercantilism is less than mercantilism of $COUNTRYNAME|Y$ ($VAL|Y$ percent). Currently $CURRENTVAL|Y$ percent.
translation: 重商主义少于$COUNTRYNAME|Y$（百分之$VAL|Y$）。目前为百分之$CURRENTVAL|Y$。

original: Mercantilism is at least same as mercantilism of $COUNTRYNAME|Y$ ($VAL|Y$ percent). Currently $CURRENTVAL|Y$ percent.
translation: 重商主义至少与$COUNTRYNAME|Y$（百分之$VAL|Y$）相同。目前为百分之$CURRENTVAL|Y$。

original: Declaring war on the $REL$ will move us towards Legalism by §Y$VAL$§!.
translation: 向$REL$国家宣战将会提高§Y$VAL$§!教条主义。

original: Declaring war is an inherently immoral action, and it will decrease our karma by §Y$VAL$§!.
translation: 宣战本身就是不道德的行为，这将降低我们§Y$VAL$§!的业报。

original: $NAME$ is traveling to §Y$PROV$§W. Will arrive on §Y$DATE$§W
$NAME$ is currently on a mission in §Y$PROV$§W
You have §Y$CURRENT$§W available Missionary(s) out of §Y$TOTAL$§W total
translation: 你有§Y$CURRENT$§W位可用的传教士，总共有§Y$TOTAL$§W位

original: You have §Y$CURRENT$§W available Spy/Spies out of §Y$TOTAL$§W total
translation: 你有§Y$CURRENT$§W位可用的间谍，总共有§Y$TOTAL$§W位

original: You have §Y$CURRENT$§W available Diplomat(s) out of §Y$TOTAL$§W total
translation: 你有§Y$CURRENT$§W位可用的外交官，总共有§Y$TOTAL$§W位

original: You have §Y$CURRENT$§W available Colonist(s) out of §Y$TOTAL$§W total
translation: 你有§Y$CURRENT$§W支可用的殖民队，总共有§Y$TOTAL$§W支

original: You have §Y$CURRENT$§W available Merchant(s) out of §Y$TOTAL$§W total
translation: 你有§Y$CURRENT$§W支可用的商人团，总共有§Y$TOTAL$§W支

original: Have at least $UNITS$ heavy ship in $PROVINCE$
Have less than $UNITS$ heavy ship in $PROVINCE$
Have at least $UNITS$ light ship in $PROVINCE$
Have less than $UNITS$ light ship in $PROVINCE$
$NAME$ from $FROM|Y$ is working to $ACTION|Y$ in $PROV|Y$ ($COUNTRY|Y$). He has been doing it for $DAYS|Y$ days.
translation: $FROM|Y$的$NAME$正在$COUNTRY|Y$的$PROV|Y$执行$ACTION|Y$。他已经执行了$DAYS|Y$天。

original: Our relation with $COUNTRY|Y$ has been improved by $OPINION|+2$.
translation: 我们和$COUNTRY|Y$的关系已经提高了$OPINION|+2$。

original: $NAME$ is returning from §Y$PROV$§! after working to §Y$ACTION$§!. Returns on §Y$DATE$§!
translation: $NAME$完成了§Y$ACTION$§!的任务，正由§Y$PROV$§!返回。将于§Y$DATE$§!抵达

original: Send patrol to the trade node §Y$NAME$§W.
translation: 向贸易节点§Y$NAME$§W派遣巡逻队。

original: We can only have §Y$VAL$§W alliances, so we cannot initiate any more.
translation: 我们只能有§Y$VAL$§W个盟友，不能与更多国家结盟。

original: The speed by which manpower recovers is modified by:
translation: 人力恢复速度受到如下修正：

original: A policy of centralization will increase our tax revenue.
translation: 中央集权政策将提高我们的税收收入。

original: Decentralization will have a negative effect on our income.
translation: 地方分权对我们的收入有负面影响。

§YManpower§!
Maximum is §Y$MAX$§W
Currently you gain §Y$YEARLY$§W each month

§YSailors§!
Maximum is §Y$MAX$§W
Currently they gain §Y$YEARLY$§W each month

他们当前每月增长§Y$YEARLY$§W海员

With §Y$POOL$§! sailors awaiting ship construction, our sailors pool cannot grow to be bigger than §Y$MAX$§!.

original: The speed by which sailors recover is modified by:
translation: 海员恢复速度受到如下修正：

original: You don't have enough £adm£ to boost Stability! You need §G$POWER_COST$§! and have §R$POWER_AVAILABLE$§! power available.
translation: 你没有足够的£adm£提高稳定度！你需要§G$POWER_COST$§!而可用点数只有§R$POWER_AVAILABLE$§!。

original: Spend §Y$POWER_COST$§! of your §Y$POWER_AVAILABLE$§! £adm£ to boost Stability.
translation: 花费§Y$POWER_COST$§! £adm£提高稳定度，共有§Y$POWER_AVAILABLE$§!点可用。

original: No Unrest for this faction, the progress towards revolt will instead decay by §R$VAL$%§! each month.\n
translation: 由于这个派系的叛乱风险小于零，叛乱进度每月将会衰减§R$VAL$%§!。\n

original: Arctic terrain represents the snow and ice-covered areas close to the North Pole.
translation: 北极圈地形为临近北极的冰雪覆盖之地。

original: Forest terrain represents areas of conifer forest with high density of trees and underbrush.
translation: 森林地形为由密集的树木和灌木丛组成的针叶林。

original: Hills terrain represents areas dominated by a rolling landscape of shifting elevation that are lower and less steep than mountains. Unlike the highland terrain hills represent areas with a higher density of trees and underbrush.
translation: 丘陵地形为比山脉低矮且较平缓的起伏地形，相比高原地形，丘陵具有更高密度的树木和灌木。

original: Woods terrain represents areas of broadleaf forest with high density of trees and underbrush.
translation: 树林地形为由密集的树木和灌木丛组成的阔叶林。

original: Mountain terrain represents areas mainly occupied by rugged mountain ranges and narrow passes, often on high altitude and in cold climate.
translation: 山脉地形为主要由崎岖不平的高山和狭窄的山谷组成的地区，通常海拔较高且气候寒冷。

original: Desert Mountains terrain represents areas rugged mountain ranges and narrow passes that are surrounded by deserts.
translation: 沙漠山地地形为被沙漠环绕的高山幽谷。

original: Impassable Mountains terrain represents areas of mountains too inhospitable or too difficult for an army to maneuver in.
translation: 不可逾越之山脉地形为不适于居住且难以让军队穿行的山脉。

original: Grasslands terrain represents areas of farmland where the vegetation is dominated by grass.
translation: 草原地形为以草为主要植被的可耕种土地。

original: Plains terrain represents large areas of flat or rolling treeless land.
translation: 平原地形为树木稀疏的大片平缓土地。

original: Jungle terrain represents areas overgrown with dense tropical vegetation, difficult for an army to maneuver in.
translation: 丛林地形为热带植被茂密的地区，军队难以穿行。

original: Marsh terrain represents tracts of wetland dominated by grasses or low-growing shrubs.
translation: 湿地地形为以草或低矮灌木为主的潮湿陆地。

original: Desert terrain represents desolate and arid areas with little or no vegetation, often in a very warm climate.
translation: 沙漠地形为荒凉且干旱的地区，几乎没有植被，通常气候炎热干燥。

original: Coastal Desert terrain represents areas where the desert meets the ocean, resulting in a milder and less inhospitable climate.
translation: 沿海沙漠地形为海与沙漠交汇的地区，气候比沙漠温和且更宜居。

original: Coastline terrain represents the narrow areas where land and sea meet, comprised of cliffs or sand dunes.
translation: 海岸线地形为海陆交汇之处，多为断崖与沙地。

original: Farmlands terrain represents highly cultivated areas where the landscape is dominated by agriculture and towns or villages.
translation: 农田地形为耕种率较高的地区，存在以农业为主的村镇。

original: The Glacial terrain represents areas with very harsh and cold conditions often with permanent snow coverage and glaciers. Areas with Glacial terrain are very inhospitable for human settlement or military maneuvers.
translation: 冰川地形为被积雪和冰川覆盖的严寒地区，非常不适于人类居住或军队穿行。

original: Drylands represents large areas of dry, flat or rolling treeless land.
translation: 干旱地形为地势平缓且树木稀少的大片地区。

original: Steppes terrain represents large and continuous open areas covered in grass that are suitable for grazing yet unsuitable for agriculture.
translation: 大草原地形为连续而开阔的草地，适合放牧，但不适合农业生产。

original: Savanna terrain represents large grass-covered areas with a high degree of trees mixed in.
translation: 稀树草原地形为大片被草覆盖的地区，并有大量树木混杂其中。

original: Highlands terrain represents areas dominated by a rolling landscape of shifting elevation that are lower and less steep than mountains. Unlike the hills terrain highlands represent areas with a low density of trees and underbrush.
translation: 高原地形为地处高海拔、地势较为平缓的地区，相比丘陵地形，高原具有更低密度的树木和灌木。

original: The following technologies can be invested in:\n$LIST$
You have reached the maximum amount of §Y$POW1$ Power§!.
translation: 你已达到§Y$POW1$点数§!的最大值。

original: You have reached the maximum amount of $POW1|Y$ and §Y$POW2$ Power§!.
translation: 你已达到$POW1|Y$与§Y$POW2$点数§!的最大值。

original: You have reached the maximum amount of $POW1|Y$, $POW2|Y$ and §Y$POW3$ Power§!.
translation: 你已达到$POW1|Y$，$POW2|Y$与§Y$POW3$点数§!的最大值。

original: You should spend some of your power, otherwise the power you gain every month will go to waste.
translation: 你应当使用一些点数，否则你每月获得的点数会被浪费。

original: You can continue playing past the scenario end date.
translation: 剧本结束日期后你可以继续游戏。

original: §RNo game content has been designed for this and Paradox provides no support for any issues encountered.§!
translation: §R没有为此后设计的游戏内容。因此，对于遇到的任何问题，P社无法提供任何支持。§!

original: Leaders will add a significant bonus to the unit they are leading. A unit without a leader will do less damage and suffer more casualties in battle.\n\n§GClick here to assign a leader to this unit.§!
translation: 将领会为其领导的单位带来可观的增益。没有将领的单位在战斗中能造成的伤害很有限，并会遭受更大伤亡。\n\n§G点击这里为此单位分配将领。§!

original: §RThis leader is at sea and cannot be reassigned.§!
translation: §R这位将领正在海上，无法重新分配。§!

original: §RThe unit is out of your Supply Range and its leader cannot be reassigned.§!
translation: §R此单位在你的补给范围以外，无法更换其将领。§!

original: §RThe target unit is out of your Supply Range and cannot be assigned a leader.§!
translation: §R目标单位在你的补给范围以外，无法为其指派将领。§!

original: §RThis leader is in combat and cannot be reassigned.§!
translation: §R这位将领正在指挥战斗，无法重新分配。§!

original: §RThis leader cannot be reassigned until the current Exploration mission is completed.§!
translation: §R这位将领无法重新分配，直到当前探索任务结束。§!

original: §RThis leader is in hostile territory and cannot be reassigned.§!
translation: §R这位将领在敌人领土上，无法重新分配。§!

original: You have the following missions to choose between:
translation: 你可以在以下任务中选择：

original: It is not possible, nor would it be honorable, to retreat from a battle in the first $DAYS$ days.
translation: 在战斗刚开始的$DAYS$天内撤退既不可能做到，又有辱声誉。

original: Not Eligible to be the Emperor.
Not a member of the HRE: §R$VAL$§W\n
translation: 不是神圣罗马帝国成员：§R$VAL$§W\n

original: Has a Harem, providing a choice of heir!
translation: 拥有后宫以获得继承人！

original: Militarization is already at its highest!
translation: 军事化程度已达到最高！

original: Militarization of our Country change by $VAL$ each month due to:\n
translation: 基于以下因素，我们的军事化程度每月改变$VAL$：\n

original: Is a Militarized Society, where rulers cannot get MIL below 3.
translation: 处于军事化社会制度，君主军事能力不会低于3。

original: You require at least $COST|Y$ military power to increase militarization of your country, but you only have $VAL|Y$!
translation: 你需要至少$COST|Y$点军事点数提高军事化程度，现只有$VAL|Y$点可用！

original: Spend $COST|Y$ military power to increase militarization of your country by §G+$EFFECT$§!.
translation: 花费$COST|Y$点军事点数以提高§G+$EFFECT$§!军事化程度。

original: You require at least $COST|Y$ military power to strengthen your government, but you only have $VAL|Y$!
translation: 你需要至少$COST|Y$点军事点数以强化政府，现只有$VAL|Y$点可用！

original: Spend $COST|Y$ military power to strengthen your government and $EFFECT$.
translation: 花费$COST|Y$点军事点数以强化政府并$EFFECT$。

original: Horde Unity is already at its highest!
Legitimacy is already at its highest!
Republican Tradition is already at its highest!
Devotion is already at its highest!
Meritocracy is already at its highest!
You can only Disinherit an Heir in a Monarchy!
translation: 只有君主制政体才能废黜继承人！

original: It is not possible to Disinherit an Heir during a Regency!
translation: 在摄政会议统治期间不能废黜继承人！

original: Prestige needs to be at least $NEED|Y$ to be able to disinherit an heir.
translation: 威望至少$NEED|Y$才能废黜继承人。

original: Disinherit $HEIR|Y$, and hope for a more capable heir.\nThis will give a hit of $PRESTIGE_HIT|R$ prestige from this action.
translation: 废黜$HEIR|Y$，期望下一位继承人更能够更为胜任。\n受废黜继承人影响，你的威望减少$PRESTIGE_HIT|R$。

original: You currently have no heir which can be disinherited!
translation: 你现在没有可废黜的继承人！
不能废黜宗主国的继承人！

original: Cannot disinherit while there are pending events!
translation: 有未处理事件时不能废黜继承人！

original: You can only Abdicate from the throne in a Monarchy!
It is too cowardly to Abdicate while your nation is at war!
translation: 在战争中逊位乃怯懦卑鄙之行！

original: You cannot Abdicate while you do not have an heir.
translation: 没有继承人时不能逊位。

original: You can only Abdicate if your heir is at least $NEED|Y$ years old. $NAME$ is currently $AGE$ year(s) old.
translation: 继承人年满$NEED|Y$岁后，你才可以逊位。你的继承人$NAME$现在$AGE$岁。

original: Legitimacy must be at least $NEED|Y$ if you wish to Abdicate.
translation: 需要至少$NEED|Y$正统性才允许逊位。
不能使你宗主国的君主逊位！

original: Horde Unity must be at least $NEED|Y$ if you wish to Abdicate.
translation: 需要至少$NEED|Y$游牧团结才允许逊位。

original: A ruler must be at least $AGE|Y$ years old or have ruled for $RULE|Y$ years to be able to Abdicate.
translation: 统治者至少有$AGE|Y$岁或统治满$RULE|Y$年后才能逊位。

original: Cannot abdicate while there are pending events!
translation: 有未处理事件时不能逊位！

original: Make $RULER|Y$ Abdicate, and let $HEIR|Y$ take the throne!
There will be a hit of $HIT|R$ Horde Unity and $PRESTIGE_HIT|R$ prestige from this action, after the Heir's claim has been considered.
translation: 逊位之后，经过继承人宣称的影响，游牧团结将降低$HIT|R$，威望将降低$PRESTIGE_HIT|R$。

original: There will be a hit of $HIT|R$ Legitimacy and $PRESTIGE_HIT|R$ prestige from this action, after the Heir's claim has been considered.
translation: 逊位之后，经过继承人宣称的影响，正统性将降低$HIT|R$，威望将降低$PRESTIGE_HIT|R$。

original: Are you sure you want to enact $REFORMTITLE|Y$?\n
Are you sure you want to enact $TITLE|Y$?\n
This will cost us $STABILITY|R$ Stability and $MANDATE|R$ Mandate, and give us the following long term effects:\n$EFFECTS$
translation: 这将花费$STABILITY|R$稳定度和$MANDATE|R$天命值，带给我们如下长期影响：\n$EFFECTS$

original: This will cost us $MERITOCRACYCOST|R$ Meritocracy, and give us the following effects for $YEARS|Y$ years:\n$EFFECTS$
translation: 花费$MERITOCRACYCOST|R$贤能值，将给我们带来如下长达$YEARS|Y$年的影响：\n$EFFECTS$

original:
You have $FREE|Y$ of $MAX|Y$ free Promoted Culture slots.
To promote a culture, click the §Y"Promote Culture"§! button on a Non-Accepted Culture.
The number of slots is calculated from:
translation:
你的$MAX|Y$个已认同文化槽中有$FREE|Y$个是空的。
要认同一种文化，点击一种未接受文化上的§Y「认同文化」§!按钮。
已认同文化槽的数量通过如下方式得出：

original: We cannot promote more cultures, as we already have $CURR|Y$, and our nation can only have $MAX|Y$ promoted cultures with our ideas and technology.
translation: 由于我们已认同了$CURR|Y$种文化，所以不能再认同更多文化。根据我们的理念和科技，我国最多可认同$MAX|Y$种文化。

original: You require at least $COST|Y$ diplomatic power to change primary culture, but you only have $VAL|Y$!
translation: 你需要$COST|Y$点外交点数以改变主流文化，但你只有$VAL|Y$点！

original: Changing Primary Culture to $NAME|Y$ will cost $COST|Y$ diplomatic power.
translation: 改变主流文化为$NAME|Y$将花费$COST|Y$点外交点数。

original: $NAME|Y$ is neither an accepted culture, nor belong to the $GROUP|Y$ culture group, so it cannot be made into our primary culture.
translation: $NAME|Y$既不属于被接受文化，也不属于$GROUP|Y$文化组，所以它不能成为我们的主流文化。

original: $NAME|Y$ needs to be at least §Y$NEED$%§! of your development in your states to become the primary culture, but it is only at §Y$VAL$%§!.
translation: $NAME|Y$文化在国内的地区至少要占有全国§Y$NEED$%§!的发展度才有资格成为主流文化，但它只占§Y$VAL$%§!。

original: You require at least $COST|Y$ diplomatic power to promote a culture to being accepted, but you only have $VAL|Y$.
translation: 你需要$COST|Y$点外交点数以认同一种文化，使其成为可接受文化，但你只有$VAL|Y$点。

original: Promoting $NAME|Y$ to being an accepted culture will cost $COST|Y$ diplomatic power.
translation: 认同$NAME|Y$文化将花费$COST|Y$点外交点数，该文化将成为可接受文化。

original: $NAME|Y$ needs to have at least $NEED|Y$ development in your states to be promoted to an accepted culture, but it is only at $VAL|Y$ development.
translation: $NAME|Y$文化在国内的地区需要至少$NEED|Y$发展度才有资格被认同并成为可接受文化，但它只有$VAL|Y$发展度。

original: You require at least $COST|Y$ diplomatic power to remove an promoted culture, but you only have $VAL|Y$!
translation: 移除一种已认同文化需要至少$COST|Y$点外交点数而你只有$VAL|Y$!点

original: Removing $NAME|Y$ as a promoted culture will cost $COST|Y$ diplomatic power.
translation: 将$NAME|Y$从已认同文化中移除将花费$COST|Y$外交点数。

original: The amount of Development in our state Cores that belong to this culture is $DEV|Y$ (§Y$PERC$%§! of total in state Cores).
translation: 这个文化在我国核心领土中所占的发展度是$DEV|Y$（占我国核心领土总发展度的§Y$PERC$%§!）。

original: $NAME|Y$ has been promoted to Accepted status, so it gives us no penalties.
translation: $NAME|Y$文化已经被认同并成为可接受文化，所以不会有任何惩罚。

original: Since $NAME|Y$ is in the same culture group as $PRIMARY|Y$, demoting it will only give us reduced penalties.
translation: $NAME|Y$和$PRIMARY|Y$属于同一文化组，占领它只会受到少量惩罚。

original: $NAME|Y$ belongs to the same culture group as $PRIMARY|Y$, so it gives us reduced penalties.
translation: $NAME|Y$和$PRIMARY|Y$属于同一文化组，我们只会受到少量惩罚。

original: $NAME|Y$ culture is Accepted because it is part of our Cultural Union based on the $GROUP|Y$ culture group.
translation: $NAME|Y$是被接受的文化，因为它属于$GROUP|Y$文化组，视我们为文化母国。

original: $NAME|Y$ is our Primary Culture. It gives us no penalties, and any cultures in the same culture group gives us reduced penalties.
translation: $NAME|Y$是我们的主流文化，所以不会产生任何惩罚，且属于相同文化组的其他文化也只会产生少量惩罚。

original: They have the backing of another elector, so they are backing their own candidacy.
translation: 由于有其他选帝侯支持，他们选择为自己加冕。

original: Voting because of a mission goal.
They are rating us at §Y$VAL$§W points when evaluating who to vote for.
translation: 决定投票支持对象时，他们对我们的评价是§Y$VAL$§W。

original: They prefer $NAME$ though, who they rate at §Y$VAL$§W points.
translation: 他们更倾向于$NAME$，支持度为§Y$VAL$§W点。

original: They prefer themselves though, whom they rate at §Y$VAL$§W points.
translation: 他们更倾向于他们自己，支持度为§Y$VAL$§W点。

original: The closest rival to us is $NAME$ though, who rate at §Y$VAL$§W points.
translation: 我们最强劲的竞争者是$NAME$，其评价为§Y$VAL$§W。

original: You need to have some Imperial authority to enforce religious unity.
translation: 你需要有一些帝国权威来强迫宗教统一。

original: When rebels manage to break a country all of the active revolts will succeed and their demands will be enforced.
translation: 当叛军成功使得国家崩溃之后，所有的起义行动都会成功，他们的诉求也会被接受。

original: Rebels cannot fully break a country unless they control at least one fortified province.
translation: 叛军必须控制至少一个建有要塞的省份，否则无法使国家完全崩溃。

original: Rebels occupy §Y$NUM$§W out of §Y$OF$§W provinces. The country may break if they occupy more than half of your provinces!
translation: 叛军占领了§Y$OF$§W个省份中的§Y$NUM$§W个。如果他们占领了超过半数的领土，国家将崩溃！

original: Rebels may enforce their demands §Y$MONTH$§W months from now because they control the capital.
translation: 从现在起的§Y$MONTH$§W个月之内，叛军或许将强行落实他们的诉求，因为他们控制了首都。

original: $PROVINCE_NAME$ may annex to $ANNEX$ §Y$MONTH$§W months from now.
$PROVINCE_NAME$ may annex to $ANNEX$ any month now.
translation: 从现在起$PROVINCE_NAME$随时都有可能被$ANNEX$吞并。

original: $PROVINCE_NAME$ may defect to $DEFECT$ §Y$MONTH$§W months from now.
$PROVINCE_NAME$ may defect to $DEFECT$ any month now.
translation: 从现在起$PROVINCE_NAME$随时都有可能会向$DEFECT$投降。

original: The rebels may declare independence in §Y$MONTH$§W months.
translation: 叛军或在§Y$MONTH$§W个月内宣布独立。

original: The rebels may declare independence any month now.
translation: 从现在起叛军随时都有可能宣布独立。

original: Show different means to handle the rebels.
translation: 展示不同的手段来处理叛军。

original: They are $PROGRESS|%Y1$ towards enforcing their demands.
translation: 叛军强行实现诉求的进度为$PROGRESS|%Y1$。

original: A Disaster is a series of bad events that can strike your country in times of turmoil. When the starting conditions are fulfilled for a Disaster, its progress begins to tick up every month at a rate depending on a separate set of modifiers. A ticking disaster can be stopped completely by fulfilling a set of stopping conditions that are separate from its starting conditions. When progress reaches 100% the disaster starts and will continue until its ending conditions are fulfilled.
translation: 灾难是一系列在动荡时期冲击国家的负面事件。当灾难的前提条件被满足时，每个月都会增加灾难的进度，增加的速度由一系列因素决定。一个正在读条的灾难是可以被阻止的，前提是满足一系列和灾难前提条件不同的灾难阻止条件。当灾难的进度到达100%，灾难将开始爆发并持续直到结束条件被满足。

original: Your National §YStability§! affects the §YUnrest§! in the §YProvinces§!, and many other things.
translation: 国家的§Y稳定度§!会影响§Y省份§!的§Y叛乱度§!以及其他方面的事情。

original: When the progress reaches 100%, the faction will revolt and a couple of rebel armies will spawn. The faction has a $VAL|%1Y$ chance of increasing the progress by §R$INC$%§! each month due to how much unrest is in their provinces. At this pace, the next revolt will be in about $YEARS|Y1$ years.
translation: 当进度到达100%时，派系叛乱将爆发且出现叛军。根据情况，该派系每个月将有$VAL|%1Y$几率增加§R$INC$%§!进程，这一速度由省份的叛乱风险大小决定。照这样的速度，下一次叛乱将在大约$YEARS|Y1$年后发生。

original: Rumors of Ottoman weakness caused Pope Eugene IV to call for a crusade against them in 1443. With the West still embroiled in the Hundred Years War, the King of Hungary and Poland, Wladyslav III, took on the cause to finally expel the scourge of Christendom from Europe. Led by general John Hunyadi, The White Knight, the Hungarian army saw some initial success, but was ultimately defeated. The abdicated Sultan Murad II came back to aid his son and led the Ottoman army to victory at the battle of Varna where King Wladyslav was killed. Peace was eventually signed but the way for further Ottoman expansion into Eastern Europe now lay open...
translation: 奥斯曼虚弱不堪的传言令教宗恩仁四世在1443年召集起针对他们的十字军。此时西欧仍深陷百年战争的泥沼，故而匈牙利-波兰国王瓦迪斯瓦夫三世担起重责，意图将「上帝之鞭」逐出欧洲。「白骑士」匈雅提·亚诺什率领的匈牙利军队在初期取得了一些胜利，但最终还是被打败了。弃政隐居的苏丹穆拉德二世复位以辅助他的儿子，并亲率奥斯曼军队在瓦尔纳之战中取胜，而瓦迪斯瓦夫三世则在那场战斗中战死。双方最终签订了和平协议，但奥斯曼在东欧进一步扩张的大门已经打开……

original: You have level §Y$LEVEL$§W and need level §Y$NEEDED$§W of administrative technology to unlock this idea slot.
translation: 你的行政科技等级为§Y$LEVEL$§W级，需要升至§Y$NEEDED$§W级才能解锁这个理念槽。

translation: 为已解锁槽位「$NAME$」选择一个理念组

translation: 确定要解锁§Y$NAME$§!？如此做会增加§R25§!末日值，释放你所有的属国并且降低§R1§!稳定度。

original: The mining operations in the Great Copper Mountain started as early as the 9th century. By mid 14th century it was of vital economic importance for Sweden, and from the 17th century it produced more than two thirds of Europe's copper.
translation: 大铜山地区的采矿活动可以追溯至九世纪。十四世纪中叶时这里成为了瑞典的经济命脉，从十七世纪开始这里出产了欧洲三分之二的铜。

original: The importance of this province as a Religious Center will make it very difficult to convert.
translation: 该省份作为宗教中心的重要性使其难以改变信仰。

original: The importance of this province as a Center of Trade will help control trade in the region.
translation: 此省份作为重要的贸易中心，可以帮助控制该地区的贸易。

original: The importance of this province as a Center of Trade will help control trade in the region.

translation: 控制住重要的多瑙河河口可以增强我们在这一区域的贸易掌控力。

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Dnestr strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制住重要的德涅斯特河河口可以增强我们在这一区域的贸易掌控力。

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Dnieper strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Don strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Yangtze strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling one of the important mouths of the Nile strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Gambia strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Pearl strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Parana strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Mekong strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Mississippi strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制住重要的密西西比河河口可以增强我们在这一区域的贸易掌控力。

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Rio Grande strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制格兰德河河口这个贸易要地有利于加强我们在此区域的贸易控制。

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Niger strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of Taz strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制塔兹河河口这个贸易要地有利于加强我们在此区域的贸易控制。

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Columbia River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制哥伦比亚河河口这个贸易要地有利于加强我们在此区域的贸易控制。

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Delaware River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制特拉华河河口这个贸易要地有利于加强我们在此区域的贸易控制。

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the James River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Santee River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Guayas River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Senegal River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Zambezi River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制赞比西河河口这个贸易要地有利于加强我们在此区域的贸易控制。

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Congo River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制刚果河河口这个贸易要地有利于加强我们在此区域的贸易控制。

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Red River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制红河河口这个贸易要地有利于加强我们在此区域的贸易控制。

original: Controlling one of the important mouths of the Irrawaddy River strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制伊洛瓦底江口这个贸易要地有利于加强我们在此区域的贸易控制.

translation: 没有他国的舰队被允许在我们的港口停靠。

translation: 花费§Y$POWER_COST$§!£adm 降低$VAL$通货膨胀。

original: Do you really want to stop imposing War Taxes?
translation: 你确定停止征收战争税吗？

original: You do not have any inflation.
You do not have enough inflation at the moment. You can only reduce it when it's above $VAL$.
translation: 你目前通货膨胀不够高， 你只能在它高于$VAL$时才能手动降低。

original: Selecting this option means that we will treat the natives §Yruthlessly§! from now on. It'll increase the frequency of their raids, but also allow our colony to grow faster.
translation: 选择这个选项意味着从现在开始我们将§Y毫不手软§!地对待原住民。 这将会增加他们袭击的频率，但我们的殖民地也会发展得更快。

original: With this option, we are adopting a '§Ylive and let live§!' attitude to the natives. We will have a higher chance of assimilating the natives.
translation: 在这个选项下，我们将会对原住民采取「§Y和平共处§!」的态度。我们将会有更高的几率同化原住民。

original: With this option, we will '§Ytrade§!' with the natives, and profit from it.
translation: 在这个选项下，我们将会同原住民「§Y互通贸易§!」，并且从中获利。

original: \nWhen we have gained all the §Y$NAME$§! we will also gain:\n$EFFECT$
translation: \n当我们获得所有的§Y$NAME$§!时，我们将会获得：\n$EFFECT$
我们已经拥有了所有的§Y$NAME$§!

original: You need to unlock all ideas in the idea group to get the bonus idea
translation: 你需要解锁该理念组中所有的理念以获得奖励理念

original: When fully unlocked, you gain the following additional benefit:
translation: 当完全解锁时，你会获得以下的额外奖励：

original: Select this Mission as your Mission
translation: 选择这个作为你的任务

original: You can't choose a new Mission until $DATE$.
translation: 在$DATE$前无法选择新的任务。

original: Lollards believe the Catholic Church to be corrupted, and favor seeking spiritual advice directly from the Scripture. They seek to spread their faith and fight against persecution.
translation: 罗拉德派认为天主教会已经腐化，寻求直接从圣经中获得精神慰藉。他们致力于传播其信仰并且反抗一切压迫。

original: Lollards are followers of the theological teachings of John Wycliffe, protesting against the wealth, power, and pride of the clergy.
translation: 罗拉德派教徒追随约翰·威克里夫主张的神学教义，反对财富、权力与神职者的傲慢。

original: The act provides the general populace with the right to complain about the actions of justices directly to the monarch or his council.
translation: 此法案为一般民众提供了直接向君主和御前会议投诉法官行为的权利。

original: Gives the navy an efficient and strong strategic leadership.
translation: 给海军带来高效且强有力的战略领导。

original: Gives the army an efficient and strong strategic leadership.
translation: 给陆军带来高效且强有力的战略领导。

original: The Heresy Act, concerning the arresting and punishment of heretics, has been enacted by the authorities as a response to the increase of heresy within the realm.
translation: 为了应对国内日渐严重的宗教异端问题，当局已经制定出异端法案，授权逮捕并惩罚异端教徒。

original: A greater tolerance of heretics has been instituted under the Religious Freedom Act.
translation: 一个对异端施以更多宽容的宗教自由法案已经得到了签署。

original: Limits the ability to levy new taxes without the consent of the Parliament and forbids the billeting of soldiers in private homes.
translation: 限制未经议会允许开征新税的权力，并且禁止士兵在私人住宅内驻扎。

original: Refusal of the Petition of Rights
Refusing to sign The Petition of Rights has caused severe unrest throughout the country.
translation: 拒绝签署权利请愿书导致国内爆发了严重的动乱。

original: Instituted to ease the situation for dissenters and Catholics.
translation: 为缓和天主教徒和其余教派间的局势而制定。

original: Issued to exclude dissenting religious groups from public offices and allow their persecution.
translation: 由政府发布排斥其他宗教派别的文件，同时允许对他们进行迫害。

original: The establishment of a trading company focused on the White Sea trade greatly improves our trade income.
translation: 组建一家专注于白海贸易的贸易公司极大地提高了我们的贸易收入。

original: Rumors at the court about infertility seem to have had a negative effect on the ruler.
translation: 关于不孕症的宫闱传闻似乎对统治者产生了负面影响。

original: Much of the nobility and even many peasants in the province have declared their support for the House of Lancaster.
translation: 省份中许多贵族甚至是农民都宣布了他们对兰开斯特家族的支持。

original: Much of the nobility and even many peasants in the province have declared their support for the House of York.
translation: 省份中许多贵族甚至是农民都宣布了他们对约克家族的支持。

original: Much of the nobility and even many peasants in the province have declared their support for us.
translation: 省份中许多贵族甚至是农民都宣布了他们对我们的支持。

original: Many nobles feel we have failed to show recognition for their loyalty to the crown.
translation: 许多贵族认为他们对君主的忠诚没有得到我们的认可。

original: The ruler is seen by many as benign in light of the recent pardoning of captured rebel leaders.
translation: 统治者赦免了最近被抓获的叛军首领，许多人都因此而感受到了他的仁慈。

original: The execution of several rebel leaders has not been seen favorably by the public.
translation: 处决这几个叛军首领似乎得不到公众的好评。

original: Starvation among our soldiers has forced the government to import food from abroad.
translation: 军中的饥馑迫使政府从海外进口食物。

original: To avoid starvation many of our soldiers have turned to the plundering of the civilian population.
translation: 为了避免挨饿，许多士兵不得不去劫掠百姓。

original: Our own commanders and soldiers are questioning the legitimacy of the current leadership.
translation: 我们自己的指挥官和士兵质疑当前领导人的正统性。

original: Many rebels who have been forced to flee the War of the Roses have sought refuge in this province.
translation: 许多在蔷薇战争期间遭到驱逐的叛军已经来到了这个省份寻求避难。

original: The rebels have turned this province into a strongly fortified bastion of resistance against the crown.
translation: 叛军已经将这个省份变成了一座对抗王权的强大堡垒。

original: The armed forces have been reorganized into the full-time professional army led by experienced commanders.
translation: 我们的武装力量已经被重组为一支由经验丰富的指挥官率领的职业常备军。

original: Reforms and new taxes have upset the local population.
translation: 改革与新的赋税已经刺激到了地方群体。

original: The obligation of the Church to 'lend' money to the state in the form of silver chalices and Church bells.
translation: 教会有义务将财产“借”给国家，包括教堂里的银圣餐杯和大钟。

original: Fleeing unemployment on the continent many master metal workers and ore refiners have relocated here.
translation: 为逃避欧洲大陆的失业问题，许多熟练的金属技工和冶炼工人已经来到这里定居。

original: Tactical innovations and organizational reforms to develop a professional army through conscription.
translation: 推行战术创新和组织改革使我们的军队发展成了一支征兵制的职业军队。

original: Tactical innovations and organizational reforms to develop a professional army through relying on professional mercenaries.
translation: 推行战术创新和组织改革使我们的军队发展成为一支以佣兵为主的职业军队。

original: Tactical innovations and organizational reforms to develop a professional navy through conscription.
translation: 推行战术创新和组织改革使我们的海军发展成为一支征兵制的职业海军。

original: A policy to control and tax the domestic trade.
translation: 一项旨在控制国内贸易并其对征税的政策。

original: Promoting free trade to help our merchants expand their international trade.
translation: 促进自由贸易以帮助我们的商人扩展其国际贸易。

original: Reforms to increase the ability to embark on lucrative colonial ventures.
translation: 通过改革以促进利润丰厚的殖民地投资。

original: Gives the ruler sole control of the country with no obligation to heed either parliament or royal council.
translation: 给予君主对国家的最高统治权，无需顾忌议会或御前会议。

original: A higher instance providing the ability to appeal verdicts from the local courts.
translation: 高级法庭可以受理对地方法庭判决的上诉.

original: Greater influence acquired during a regency has left the aristocracy with several privileges.
translation: 在摄政期间获得的巨大影响力使贵族享有若干特权。

original: Reduction of lands to strengthen the state finances.
translation: 削减封建采邑以增强国家财政。

original: Reduction of lands to strengthen the state finances.
translation: 削减封建采邑以增强国家财政。

original: Increased contributions by the nobility to strengthen the state finances.
translation: 提高贵族的捐税以增强国家财政。

original: In the power struggle between internal factions we have aligned with the aristocracy.
translation: 我们在国内各派系之间的权力斗争中与贵族保持一致。

original: A compromise deal with the aristocracy to return some financial means to the state.
translation: 与贵族达成妥协以向国家返还部分财力。

original: The armed forces have been reorganized to allow a larger and better standing army within reasonable economic limits.
translation: 军队现已改组，可以在适当的经济条件下维持规模更大也更强的常备军。

original: A military organization where the soldiers were given a croft to live on and cultivate where the harvest served as their wages.
translation: 一种士兵会被授予一处田产以生活并进行耕种且由其收获作为俸禄的制度。

original: Restrictions on foreign shipping in order to stimulate the domestic shipping industry.
translation: 限制外国商运以促进国内的航运业发展。

original: Forbids any religious gatherings outside the framework of the Church.
translation: 禁止在教会的框架之外举行任何宗教集会。

original: Emphasizes individual piety and living a good Christian life.
translation: 强调个人虔诚以过上正统的基督徒生活。

original: The war with Russia has left many Finnish officers in the army disgruntled and disappointed.
translation: 与俄国的战争让军中许多军官不满和失望。

original: The execution of several prominent officers has left the armed forces demoralized.
translation: 对一些杰出军官的处决使得军队士气低落。

original: Economic reforms have improved state finances but upset the local population.
translation: 经济改革改善了国家财政，但是也招来了地方群体的不满。

original: The Act of Union and Security
Gives the ruler sole control of the country with no obligation to heed either parliament or royal council.
translation: 赋予统治者对国家的唯一控制权且无需顾忌议会或王室参政会。

original: New methods and rearranged lots, resulting in larger fields, have resulted in more bountiful harvests.
translation: 新的耕作方法和地块划分使田地变得更加广阔，也获得了更好的收成。

original: An effort to speed up the industrialization by founding a number of state-controlled ventures.
translation: 一项通过建立大量国有企业来快速提升工业能力的举措。

original: Much power has been shifted from the ruler to the parliament.
translation: 大量的权力已经由君主转交给了议会。

original: A harsh blockade to hinder important trade goods from reaching local rebels.
translation: 一项旨在不让重要商品流入当地叛军手中的严厉禁运举措。

original: Enforced restrictions against the tradition of free trade with neighboring provinces.
translation: 强制的贸易管制以对抗其与周边省份自由贸易的传统。

original: The privilege of free trade with neighboring provinces.
translation: 与邻近省份进行自由贸易的特权。

original: They hold provinces that are rightfully ours.
translation: 他们拥有理应属于我们的省份。

original: They embargoed one of our league members!
translation: 他们对我们联盟的一个成员实行禁运！

original: We should unite Japan under our banner! By conquering the Imperial capital of Kyoto we will place the Emperor under our protection and take over the reins of the Shogunate.
translation: 我们应该将日本团结在我们的旗帜下！通过征服帝国首都京都，我们将把天皇置于我们的保护下并接手幕府将军之职。

original: We should unite Japan under our banner! By conquering the Imperial capital of Kyoto we will place the Emperor under our protection and take over the reins of the Shogunate.
translation: 我们应该将日本团结在我们的旗帜下！通过征服帝国首都京都，我们将把天皇置于我们的保护下并接手幕府将军之职。

original: They are threatening our rule over Japan!
translation: 他们正在威胁我们对日本的统治！

original: We should force them to have the same government form as ours!
translation: 我们应当强迫他们采用和我们一样的政体！

original: [new_shogunate.GetName] will be the leader of the new Shogunate.\nAll Daimyo's loyal to the Shogunate will be transferred to [new_shogunate.GetName].
translation: [new_shogunate.GetName]将成为新幕府的领导人。\n所有的大名都将转而效忠于[new_shogunate.GetName]幕府。

original: The Defender of the Faith gets Casus Belli to enforce religious unity. This will cost §Y$VALUE$§W¤. After §Y$MONTHS$§W months, countries with more prestige than the current Defender can claim the title. \nYou'll also lose if you decline a call to war from a country of your faith being attacked by infidels.
translation: 信仰守护者拥有执行宗教统一的宣战理由。宣称信仰守护者头衔将花费§Y$VALUE$§W¤。§Y$MONTHS$§W个月后，若一个国家的威望比当前守护者更高，则其可以宣称此头衔。\n若你拒绝了一个遭到异教徒攻击的同信仰的国家的求援，你也会失去此头衔。

original: §YActive cardinal§!\nWe control this active cardinal from $HOME|Y$. Each active cardinal gives us $BENEFIT$ Papal Influence per year.
translation: §Y正在效力的枢机主教§!\n这名来自$HOME|Y$的枢机主教为我们效力。每位效力的枢机主教每年给我们增加$BENEFIT$教廷影响力。

original: Spend your papal influence to vote on future cardinals to increase your chance to control a cardinal in the Papacy in the future.
translation: 花费教廷影响力为未来的枢机主教投票，以增加未来在教廷中控制一名主教的机会。

original: §YPapacy view§!\nClick here to open the papacy view.
translation: §Y教宗界面§!\n点击此处以打开教宗界面。

original: §YCuria controller§!\n$NAME$ is currently in control of the curia.
Other countries may have invested points in this cardinal. This will be revealed when the cardinal becomes an active cardinal or if he dies.
translation: 其他国家可能在这个主教身上投资了点数。当他升任枢机主教或死亡时，这层关系将被揭露。

original: Sort by the time it will take to convert.
translation: 按转化宗教的耗时排序。

original: Sort by the impact on religious unity converting this province will have.
translation: 按转换省份信仰对宗教统一的影响排序。

original: Converting $NAME$ will increase religious unity by $CHANGE$.\nIt currently increases it by $CURR|Y$.
translation: 转化$NAME$的信仰将提高宗教统一$CHANGE$。\n目前它增加$CURR|Y$。

original: §Y$RELIGION$§! is not allowed to convert to another religion.
There are no potential religions to convert to right now.
translation: 目前没有可以改信的宗教。

original: There are no potential Syncretic Faiths to choose right now.
translation: 目前没有潜在的兼容宗教可供选择。

original: They are not loyal to the true faith!
translation: 他们并不忠于正统信仰！

original: It's always good to unite all your provinces under the same religion. Religious unity under 100% increases the local unrest and decreases your influence over the Papacy if your state religion is Catholicism.
translation: 让你所有省份的民众都皈依于同一宗教是再好不过的了。宗教统一低于 100% 会增加本地叛乱风险；如果你的国教是天主教，还会减少你对教廷的影响力。

original: We have achieved religious unity in $COUNTRY$ and live in harmony!
translation: 我们已经在$COUNTRY$实现了宗教统一，人民生活一片和谐！

original: There are some provinces in our realm that are not $RELIGION$, causing problems for us. The list below contains the provinces currently not adhering to the one true faith.
translation: 我国的一些省份并不信仰$RELIGION$，正给我们造成麻烦。下面列出了尚未皈依正统信仰的省份。

original: Having this level of religious unity has the following effects:
translation: 当前的宗教统一度有如下影响：

original: Have religious unity of at least
You need to unlock §Y$NUM_IDEAS$§W more Idea(s) from any Idea group to unlock the next National Idea.
translation: 你需要再解锁来自任意理念组的§Y$NUM_IDEAS$§W个理念来解锁下一个国家理念。

original: You can't claim the title because of the following reasons:
translation: 由于以下原因，你不能宣称此头衔：

original: You need more prestige than the current defender.
translation: 你的威望要比现任守护者更高。

original: You can't claim the title until the date $DATE$.
translation: 在$DATE$之后才能宣称此头衔。

original: Automatic Spending for §Y$CARDINAL$§! is currently ON. You will automatically spend Papal Influence to try and maintain control of this cardinal.
translation: 维持§Y$CARDINAL$§!的自动花费目前已开启。你会自动花费教廷影响力维持对这位枢机主教的控制。

original: Automatic Spending for §Y$CARDINAL$§! is currently OFF. You will need to manually spend Papal Influence to maintain control of this cardinal.
translation: 维持§Y$CARDINAL$§!的自动花费目前已关闭。你需要手动花费教廷影响力维持对这位枢机主教的控制。

original: Click to turn Automatic Spending on.
Click to turn Automatic Spending off.

translation: 没有正在效力的枢机主教。

original: Spend Papal Influence to vote for this future cardinal.
translation: 花费教廷影响力为这名候补枢机主教投票。

original: §YLeft click§! to spend $PI|R$ point of Papal Influence to add $PI|G$ vote for this future cardinal.
translation: §Y单击左键§!来使用$PI|R$点教廷影响力为这名候补枢机主教增加 $PI|G$票。

original: You need at least $PI|Y$ point(s) of Papal Influence to vote for this cardinal.
translation: 你需要至少$PI|Y$点教廷影响力才能给这名候补枢机主教投票。

original: The country that has the most loyal active cardinals will be the papal controller.
translation: 效忠的枢机主教数量最多的国家将成为教廷监护。

original: When an active cardinal dies, a random one of future cardinals will be chosen to be an active cardinal. The cardinal will be loyal to the one who has spent the most points on him.
translation: 当一位现任枢机主教死亡时，候补枢机主教中会有一位被随机挑选出来接替他的位置。新主教会效忠于为他投入最多点数的国家。

original: Papal Influence represents our influence with the Holy Father. This can be spent on future cardinals to make them loyal to us when they one day become active cardinals.
translation: 教廷影响力代表了我们对圣座的影响力。教廷影响力可以花费在候补枢机主教身上，使他们有朝一日成为枢机主教时效忠我们。

original: Papal Influence represents our influence with the Holy Father. The largest Catholic cities in countries with large papal influence will be chosen to represent the Catholic faith.
translation: 教廷影响力代表了我们对圣座的影响力。 在教廷影响力高的国家，最大的天主教城市将会获选代表天主教信仰。

original: §RYou do not meet all the requirements for taking this action.§!
translation: §R你还没有满足能采取此行动的所有要求。§!

original: §RYou need at least §Y$COST$§R Papal Influence to take this action.§!
translation: §R你需要至少§Y$COST$§R教廷影响力来采取这一行动。§!

original: Spend §Y$MOD_COST$§W Papal Influence to gain §Y$COST$§W Invested influence towards becoming the next Papal Controller.
translation: 花费§Y$MOD_COST$§W点教廷影响力以获得§Y$COST$§W点已投资影响力，这有助于成为下任教廷监护。

original: Sort by the size of the army
Sort by the morale of the army
Sort by the type of the unit
Sort by if the unit has a leader or not.

translation: 按单位执行的命令排序.
按花费的外交点数排序.

original: Sort by number of active cardinals
translation: 按效力的枢机主教数量排序

original: Sort by chance to get Curia control
translation: 按成为教廷监护的几率排序

original: Sort by amount of invested papal influence
translation: 按已投资的教廷影响力数额排序

original: All of your provinces already have the state religion. Provinces that no longer have the state religion will be displayed here.
translation: 你的所有省份都已经信仰了国教。不再信仰国教的省份会在这里显示。

original: This area is only unlocked for Catholic countries.
translation: 这里只对天主教国家开放。

original: Sending a Missionary will attempt to convert the province to your state religion. This will have §Y$CHANCE$%§W chance of success per year. However, the population might not be overjoyed...
translation: 派遣的传教士会尝试把当地宗教转化为国教。每年有§Y$CHANCE$%§W的几率转化成功。但是，当地人可能并不会因此而高兴……

original: There is §Y$CHANCE$%§W chance of success per year that the province will be converted.
translation: 该省每年有§Y$CHANCE$%§W的几率转化成功。

original: The advisor with id $NAME$ doesn't exist.
Open the diplomacy view for your own country.
Average autonomy above minimum is less than $VAL|Y$%.\n
translation: 最低限度以上的平均自治度低于$VAL|Y$%。\n

original: Average autonomy above minimum is $VAL|Y$% or higher.\n
translation: 最低限度以上的平均自治度达到$VAL|Y$%。\n

original: Local autonomy above minimum is less than $VAL|Y$%.\n
translation: 最低限度以上的地方自治度低于$VAL|Y$%。\n

original: Local autonomy above minimum is $VAL|Y$% or higher.\n
translation: 最低限度以上的地方自治度达到$VAL|Y$%。\n

original: Average non-overseas autonomy is less than $VAL|Y$%.\n
Average non-overseas autonomy is $VAL|Y$% or higher.\n
translation: 非海外省份平均自治度达到$VAL|Y$%。\n

original: Fleets Protecting Trade will give you Trade Power in the selected Trade Node based on the Light Ships the fleet contains.
translation: 利用舰队进行贸易保护会增加指定贸易节点的贸易竞争力，数额基于舰队中轻型战舰的数目

original: Spend §Y$COST$§!£mil to create an army from the garrison to protect the province.
translation: 花费§Y$COST$§!£mil£从驻军中组建一支军队防卫该省。

original: The garrison will increase with §G+$VAL|0$§! each month due to the following modifiers
translation: 由于以下修正，驻军将每月增加§G+$VAL|0$§!

original: Select action. You have §Y$POWER$§! $TYPE$ power that you can spend.
translation: 选择一个行动。你拥有§Y$POWER$§!点$TYPE$点数可供支付。

original: Do you wish to request Fleet basing rights from $COUNTRY$, thereby allowing our ships access to their ports? This will allow our ships to be repaired in their ports as well as extend our trading range.\nEach month they will charge us a fee of §Y$VAL$§W¤. If they acquire more ports this cost may go up.
translation: 你希望向$COUNTRY$要求舰船停泊权，使我们的舰队可以在他们的港口停泊吗？这将使得我们的船只可以在他们的港口里进行维修，还能扩大我们的贸易范围。\n他们每月会收取§Y$VAL$§W¤的费用。如果他们获得了更多的港口，这个费用还会提升。

original: Request fleet basing rights in their ports.
translation: 要求他们港口的舰船停泊权。

original: Offer fleet basing rights in your ports.
translation: 提供你港口的舰船停泊权。

original: $COUNTRY$ is requesting Fleet Basing Rights from us. Accepting will allow them to base ships in our ports and allows them to repair ships in them. It will also extend their trade range.
translation: $COUNTRY$希望我们提供舰船停泊权。如果我们接受，他们的船只就可以在我们的港口停靠并进行维修，而这也会增加他们的贸易范围。

original: $COUNTRY$ is offering Fleet Basing Rights to us. Accepting will allow us to base ships in their ports and allows us to repair ships in them. It will also extend our trade range.\nEach month they will charge us a fee of §Y$FEES$§W¤. If they acquire more ports this cost may go up.
translation: $COUNTRY$将为我们提供舰船停泊权。如果我们接受，我们的船只将可以在他们的港口驻扎并进行修理。同时，这也将增加我们的贸易范围。\n每月他们将向我们收取§Y$FEES$§W¤。如果他们获得了更多的港口，费用可能会增加。
取消我们的舰船停泊权。

original: Do you wish to cancel fleet basing rights given to us by $COUNTRY$? Doing so will prevent our fleets from accessing their ports and using them to extend our trading range.
translation: 你想要取消$COUNTRY$给予我们的舰船停泊权吗？这样做会使我们的舰队无法使用他们的港口，也无法利用这些港口来拓展贸易范围。
撤销他们的舰船停泊权。

original: Do you wish to revoke fleet basing rights given to $COUNTRY$? Doing so will prevent their fleets from accessing our ports and using our ports to extend our colonial and trading range.
translation: 你想收回给予$COUNTRY$的舰船停泊权吗？这样做会使他们的舰队无法使用我们的港口，也无法利用这些港口来拓展贸易范围。

original: Do you wish to offer Fleet basing rights to $COUNTRY$, thereby allowing their ships access to our ports? This will allow their ships to be repaired in our ports as well as extending their colonial and trading range.\nEach month we will charge them a fee of §Y$VAL$§W¤. If we acquire more ports this cost will go up.
translation: 你确定要向$COUNTRY$ 提供舰船停泊权吗？这样的话他们的舰队便可以停靠我们的港口进行维修，并能以我们的港口来拓展贸易范围和殖民距离。\n每月我们会收取费用§Y$VAL$§W¤。如果我们获得了更多的港口，这个费用会提升。

original:
A nation will lose a Core Province §Y$YEARS$§W years after the most recent of the following: 
1) After having received it. 
2) After the most recent time the nation was at war with the current owner. 
3) The most recent owner change of the province.
translation:
如下事件最近一次发生的§Y$YEARS$§W年后，一个国家会失去在该省份的核心：
1) 在接收此省份后。
2) 该国最近一次与该省份现在的所有者交战。
3) 该省的最近一次易主。

original:
§Y$WHO$§! has the same culture group as §Y$PROVCULTURE$§! and will lose §Y$PROV$§! as a Core Province §Y$YEARS$§W years after the most recent of the following: 
1) After having received it. 
2) After the most recent time the nation was at war with the current owner. 
3) The most recent owner change of the province.
translation:
§Y$WHO$§!与§Y$PROVCULTURE$§!属于同一文化组，在以下事件最近一次发生的§Y$YEARS$§W年后将失去核心省份§Y$PROV$§!：
1) 在接收此省份后。
2) 该国最近一次与该省份现在的所有者交战。
3) 该省份的最近一次易主。

original:
§Y$WHO$§! is the primary nation of §Y$PROVCULTURE$§! and will lose §Y$PROV$§! as a Core Province §Y$YEARS$§W years after the most recent of the following: 
1) After having received it. 
2) After the most recent time the nation was at war with the current owner. 
3) The most recent owner change of the province.
translation:
§Y$WHO$§!是§Y$PROVCULTURE$§!的最强国家，在以下事件最近一次发生的§Y$YEARS$§W年后将失去核心省份§Y$PROV$§!：
1) 在接收此省份后。
2) 该国最近一次与该省份现在的所有者交战。
3) 该省份的最近一次易主。

original: Spend §Y$POINTS$§W£adm to gain a core in this province.
§Y$PROVINCE$§R is too far away for §Y$WHO$§R to make into a core.
Rivals are countries you expect to come into conflict with in the future.
translation: 宿敌是你期望将来与之发生冲突的国家。

original: Enemies are countries that view this country as a rival.
translation: 敌人是将此国家视为宿敌的国家。

original: This is the current monthly attrition.
Morale is currently at $COL$$CURR$§W out of a maximum of §Y$MAX$§W.
§Y$NATION$§! have a missionary in this location.
No country is trading here yet.
translation: 没有国家在此进行贸易。

original: Go to trade node interface for §Y$NAME$§W
$OUT$% of the ducats ¤ in §Y$NAME$§W leaves the trade node.
$STAY$% of the ducats ¤ in §Y$NAME$§W stays in the trade node.
Unknown command, type '/help' or '/?' to list commands
translation: 未知指令，输入'/help'或'/？' 来查看指令列表。

original: Could not find user '$NAME$' in current channel
translation: 在目前频道无法找到玩家'$NAME$'

original: $FIRST$ slaps $SECOND$ around with a large halberd
Only channel creator can invite users
translation: 只有频道建立者可以邀请玩家

original: User is already in the channel
Only the channel creator can kick users
translation: 只有频道建立者可以踢出玩家

original: User is not in the channel
No connected user to reply to
translation: 没有可作为回复对象的已连接玩家

original: The culture in $NAME$ is §Y$CULTURE$§W. §Y$CULTURE$§W is in the §Y$GROUP$§W group.
$CULTURE|Y$ is §Rnot§W an accepted culture in $COUNTRY$, but it belongs to the primary culture group $GROUP|Y$.
translation: $CULTURE|Y$文化§R不是§W$COUNTRY$的接受文化，但它属于主流文化组$GROUP|Y$。

original: We are currently working on making $CULTURE|Y$ the primary culture in this province.
translation: 当前我们正试图将$CULTURE|Y$转变为此省份的主流文化。
属于主流文化组（§Y$GROUP$§!）的文化：

original: Other cultures in the §Y$CULTURE$§W group are:
translation: 其他属于§Y$CULTURE$§W文化组的文化：

original: §Y$NAME$§W has no modifiers that modifies this value right now.
translation: §Y$NAME$§W目前没有对此有影响的修正。

original: Click to show all mapmodes and customize your primary mapmodes.
translation: 点击显示全部内容并自定义你的主要地图模式。

original: Click to go back to your primary mapmodes.
translation: 点击返回主要地图模式。

original: §RIt is not possible to detach damaged ships while fleet is in combat.§!
It is not possible to detach damaged ships while they carry troops.
translation: 运送部队时无法分离受损舰船。

original: Fleet has to be in port to be able to use mothballing.
translation: 舰队必须处于港口中才能进行封存。

original: The backbone of any army, the humble infantryman has marched since time immemorial. The bedrock of your army that sets the platform for your other arms to fight, and first in the breech when a fortress is stormed.
translation: 作为每一支军队的骨干中坚，谦卑的步兵们自远古时起便在战场上活跃。他们是你军中挥舞武器作战的基石，也是要塞遭受进攻时的第一道防线。

original: With the owning and maintaining of a horse being an expensive undertaking, the mounted warrior is the elite of any army. The speed of the horse gives this soldier greater mobility on the battlefield, while only the most disciplined soldiers can stand in the face of the cavalry charge.
translation: 饲养马匹固然耗费颇丰，但马背上的勇士可谓任何一支军队中的精英。马的速度使得骑兵在战场上拥有着极高的机动性，只有最训练有素的士兵才能直面骑兵的冲锋。

original: Artillery is quite specifically gunpowder cannon, in its primitive form are at their most effective in a siege situation. The evolution of the cannon will see it become a destructive weapon on the battlefield.
translation: 火炮特指使用火药的大炮，自最原始的形态起，便已是围城战中最有效的武器。火炮的演变使其日益被视作战场上最具破坏性的武器。

original: Everyone knows that soldiers simply cannot magically turn into boats, the transport ship is a vessel specially built to move armies from A to B on the High Seas.
translation: 众所周知，士兵们不能神奇地变成船只。运输船就是专门建造用来运送士兵穿过公海的船只。

original: The shallow draft of the Galley gives it poor sea keeping on the high seas, but in enclosed waters the oar powered Galley is the prime warship.
translation: 桨帆战舰吃水很浅，因此难于在深海航行。但在内海水域，靠桨驱动的桨帆战舰就是水战的主力。

original: Small, fast and maneuverable, the light ship excels in the role of commerce defense. Wherever your light ships go, merchants who fly your flag will feel safe.
translation: 小巧、敏捷、机动性强，轻型战舰在商船护航方面表现出色。无论在哪，只要你的轻型战舰随行，悬挂你旗帜的商人团就会感到安全。

original: With the exception of closed waters like the Mediterranean the man 'o war or the ship of the line is the prime combat vessel.
translation: 除了像地中海这样的封闭海域，海战的主力舰还是英国战列舰和其他风帆战列舰。

original: Either through distinguishing himself in combat, proving himself as a leader or simply knowing the right people, this man has proven himself to have what it takes to lead one of your armies into battle.
translation: 无论是在战斗中表现突出从而证明了自己作为将领的能力，抑或仅仅是有些管用的人脉，总之此人已经证明了自己可以领兵作战。

original: Far away from the land and any other source of authority, this man is almost like a God for his sailors, at least for as long as they are alive. This man commands your fleets to glory.
translation: 远离陆地及其他任何权威，对于水手们来说此人就如同上帝——至少在他们还活着的时候是这样。他将带领你的舰队夺得荣耀。

original: A man of adventure, who will lead bands off into the unknown, the Conquistador will lead armies where few dare to venture.
translation: 他为冒险而生，能够领导队伍深入不毛。征服者将带领我们的军队踏入少有人敢进入的区域。

original: The vast oceans are daunting to sail at the best of times, but to sail Oceans that are unknown to us takes a special breed of man. The Explorer is such a man, cut from a different cloth. He will sail where none other would go.
translation: 即便天气极佳，航行于浩瀚的海洋也令人却步，而探索未知的海域则更是需要非凡之才。探险家就是这样一个与众不同的人，他将驶向无人可达的海域。

original: The country has moved towards a centralized state.
translation: 该国正在成为一个集权化国家。

original: The country has moved towards a decentralized state.
translation: 该国正在成为一个地方分权制国家。

original: More power has been put into the hands of the nobility.
translation: 贵族阶级获得更多权力。

original: More power has been put into the hands of merchants and manufacturers.
translation: 商人和工场主们获得更多权力。

original: More and more of the population are becoming serfs.
More and more of the population are becoming free subjects.
translation: 更多人口将成为自由民。

original: The country is becoming more and more innovative.
translation: 国家变得越来越具有创新性。

original: The country is becoming more and more narrow-minded.
translation: 国家变得越来越思维狭隘。

original: The ideas of mercantilism are what will steer our trade policy.
translation: 重商主义成为我们贸易政策的宗旨。

original: The ideas of free trade are what will steer our trade policy.
translation: 自由贸易将成为我们贸易政策的宗旨。

original: Our military focus is moving towards a strong offensive doctrine.
translation: 我们军队的重心转向强大的进攻学说。

original: Our military focus is moving towards a strong defensive doctrine.
translation: 我们军队的重心转向坚韧的防御学说。

original: The nation's military focus has moved towards land warfare.
translation: 国家的军事重心向陆军偏移。

original: The nation's military focus has moved towards naval warfare.
translation: 国家的军事重心向海军偏移。

original: Measures to give our military forces an edge in quality.
translation: 使我国军队在质量上拥有优势。

original: Measures to give our military forces have an edge in quantity.
translation: 让我国军队在数量上拥有优势。

This is the amount of money available for recruiting armies, recruiting advisors and building new buildings.

translation:
这是你可以用于征募军队、招募顾问和建造建筑的资金数量。

§Y上个月的余额是：§W

original: Your National Stability affects the unrest in your provinces, and many other things. Improve your Stability in the Stability and Expansion tab.
translation: 你的国家稳定度影响着各省的叛乱风险以及许多其他事情。你可以在稳定与扩张界面提高国家稳定度。

original: $NAME$ gain $VAL$ score each month due to:\n
translation: 基于以下因素，$NAME$每月获得$VAL$得分：\n

original: A nation needs to be among the §Y$RANK$§! best nations in one of the three categories.
translation: 国家需要是三个类别之一的前§Y$RANK$§!名。

original: The score is determined by how well the nation is doing. The score gains increase as the game progresses to later dates. Currently score for §Y$NAME$§! is gained at $VAL$.
translation: 得分取决于国家的表现。分数会随时间提高。§Y$NAME$§!现在的得分是$VAL$。

original: There is a detailed view in the ledger where you can see how the rank is calculated for each country.
translation: 统计里有详细的信息，你能在那看到每个国家的排名是如何计算的。

original: We have been cursed! God have mercy on us all.
translation: 我们被诅咒了！愿上帝保佑我们！

original: Contacting server, please wait for the server to accept or deny your request...
translation: 正在连接服务器，请等待服务器接受或拒绝您的请求……

original: $PLAYER$ wants to join the game\n(If you allow this the game will pause while $PLAYER$ picks a country and loads)
translation: $PLAYER$想加入游戏\n（如果你接受这个请求，则游戏会在$PLAYER$选择国家并加载游戏时暂停）

Server has accepted the join request
Server has declined the join request
Server is currently busy, please try again later.

original: Declined. Your name is already taken.
Reentered lobby due to pending hotjoin.
translation: 热连接挂起，重新进入大厅。

original: This province only has the most basic of defenses.
translation: 此省份只有最基础的防御。

Opinion difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! at least §Y$VAL$§!

translation: 上个月你从贸易中获得$VAL$¤。

translation: 正向我们转移贸易竞争力

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§W currently has the most power in $NODE$ with §Y$POWER$§W trade power.
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§W当前在$NODE$节点的贸易力量为§Y$POWER$§W，是最强贸易力量。

original: You currently have no influence over this node.
translation: 目前你对这个节点没有影响力.

original: $NAME$ from $COUNTRY|Y$ will arrive at $PROVINCE$ in $DAYS$ days ($DATE$). On arrival he will start building a colony and will have a chance of $CHANCE$ to increase the population of Settlers each month.
translation: 来自$COUNTRY|Y$的$NAME$将在$DAYS$天内（$DATE$）抵达$PROVINCE$。他抵达后便会开始建设殖民地，且每月会有$CHANCE$的可能性增加定居者。

original: The Colonist $NAME$ from $COUNTRY|Y$ is on his way to $PROVINCE$.
translation: 来自$COUNTRY|Y$的殖民者$NAME$正在前往$PROVINCE$。
贸易竞争力：$POWER|1$\n贸易额：$VALUE|2$\n贸易节点：$NODE$

original: There are currently $SETTLERS$ settlers here. $MAX$ is needed to create a city.
translation: 目前这里有$SETTLERS$定居者。发展为城市需要$MAX$定居者。

original: The maneuver value on your units is increased by §G$VALUE$§W.\n
There are no appropriate nations for $COUNTRY$ to pick as a rival, either due to being too strong or too weak compared to your neighbors.
translation: 目前没有国家适合作为$COUNTRY$的宿敌，因为你的邻国要么太强，要么太弱。

original: Vassals and junior partners in a Personal Union cannot pick rivals.
translation: 附庸国与被联统国无法选取宿敌。

original: The §Y$ADJ$§! army is §R$PERC$%§! stronger than ours.
The §Y$ADJ$§! army is on par with ours.
The §Y$ADJ$§! army is §G$PERC$%§! weaker than ours.
Our beloved country does not have an army.
translation: 我们亲爱的祖国没有陆军。

original: The §Y$ADJ$§! navy is §R$PERC$%§! stronger than ours.
The §Y$ADJ$§! navy is on par with ours.
The §Y$ADJ$§! navy is §G$PERC$%§! weaker than ours.
Our beloved country does not have a navy.
translation: 我们挚爱的祖国并没有海军。

original: This unit will recover §G$PART$%§W of its maximum morale (§Y$VAL$§W out of §Y$MAX$§W) each month.
translation: 该单位将每月恢复其最大士气的§G$PART$%§W（§Y$MAX$§W点中的§Y$VAL$§W点）。

original: §YLow morale§W\nThis unit has low morale, therefore it can't receive a new move order until it has recovered its morale to §G$THRESHOLD$§W.
translation: §Y低士气§W\n此单位正处于士气低落状态，在士气恢复至§G$THRESHOLD$§W之前无法接受任何新的行动命令。

original: §YMovement locked§!\nThis unit has moved more than halfway to its next province and its movement cannot be halted.
translation: §Y行动锁定§!\n此单位向下一个省份行进的路程已经过半，因而无法中止行动。

original: §YShattered retreat§W\nThis unit is doing a shattered retreat to §Y$PROVINCE$§!. It will recover morale §G$RECOVERSPEED$%§W faster on controlled provinces.
translation: §Y溃退§W\n此单位正向§Y$PROVINCE$§!溃退。此部队在已控制地区的士气回复速度会额外提升§G$RECOVERSPEED$%§W。

original: §YShattered retreat§W\nThis unit is doing a shattered retreat. It will recover morale §G$RECOVERSPEED$%§W faster on controlled provinces.
translation: §Y溃退§W\n此单位正在溃退。此部队在已控制地区的士气回复速度会额外提升 §G$RECOVERSPEED$%§W。
