original: This production is on hold because there are other units before it in the build queue.
translation: 由于建造序列前方还有其他单位在建，因此该项建造处于暂停状态.

original: This unit is relocating to §Y$PROVINCE$§!. The unit will arrive on §Y$DATE$§!.
translation: 此单位正重新部署至§Y$PROVINCE$§!。它将在§Y$DATE$§!抵达.

original: This unit is relocating to §Y$PROVINCE$§!. Their relocation progress is currently halted because of the blockade.
translation: 此单位正重新部署至§Y$PROVINCE$§!。其重新部署进程因封锁而受阻。

original: We have no provinces that are producing gold.
translation: 我们没有出产黄金的省份。

original: The following provinces are producing gold: $LIST$
None of your provinces are collecting tariffs.
translation: 你没有收取关税的省份。

original: We get tariffs from the following provinces: $LIST$
translation: 我们正从以下省份获取关税：$LIST$
我们没有收到任何贡品。
我们从以下国家获取贡品： $LIST$.
我们没有收到任何资助.

original: No one is paying us for war reparations.
translation: 没有国家向我们支付战争赔款。

original: War Reparations are paid until the truce expires.
translation: 将要支付战争赔款，直到停战协议到期。
我们从以下国家获得资助： $LIST$。

original: We have $NUM$ advisor(s) hired that cost us a total of §Y$VAL$§W each month.
translation: 我们雇佣了$NUM$位顾问，每月开支为§Y$VAL$§W。

original: We have to pay an interest for our loans each month.
translation: 我们每月要为贷款支付利息。

original: We pay for a fleet access to: $LIST$.
translation: 我们向以下国家支付舰队通行费用： $LIST$。

original: We don't have fleet access in any country.
translation: 没有任何国家对我们开放舰队通行权。

original: We don't pay tribute to anyone.
translation: 我们不向任何国家朝贡。
我们向以下国家提供资助：$LIST$。

original: We don't pay subsidies to anyone.
translation: 我们没有向任何国家提供资助。

original: We don't pay for anyone's War Reparations.
translation: 我们没有向任何国家支付战争赔款。

original: The base cost is §Y$COST$§W¤\n$EXTRA$With the current slider settings this gives a total of §Y$TOTAL$§W¤.
translation: 基础花费为§Y$COST$§W¤\n而当前滑块设置会带来$EXTRA$额外花费，总值为§Y$TOTAL$§W¤。

original: Being over the Force Limit costs you: §R+$EXTRACOST$§!¤ each month.
translation: 超出上限使得每月额外花费：§R+$EXTRACOST$§!¤。

original: Click to see a list of the Manufactories you can build in this province. You can only construct one building at a time in a province.
translation: 点击以查看所有可在该省份建造的生产建筑。每次只能在一个省份建造一个建筑。

original: This war has not had any major battles yet.
translation: 这场战争还没有发生大型战役。

original: We have won $PERC$ of the battles.
A peace offer cannot be empty!
You cannot enforce both a union and a forced vassalization at the same time.
translation: 你不能同时要求强制联统与强制附庸。

original: You do not have enough war score to demand this!
translation: 你没有足够的战争分数来要求这一点！

original: This peace would take you below §Y$DEBT_LIMIT$§!£dip which is not allowed.
translation: 这项和平协议会使你的外交点数低于§Y$DEBT_LIMIT$§!£dip£ ，无法达成。
源自$SIZE$ 场战斗的影响： §Y$VAL$§!\n

original: Attacker receives §Y$ASCORE$§! battle score bonus from war goal.\nDefender receives §Y$DSCORE$§! battle score bonus from war goal.
translation: 进攻方根据战争目标获得§Y$ASCORE$§!额外战斗分数加成。\n防御方根据战争目标获得§Y$DSCORE$§!额外战斗分数加成.

original: Attacker receives §Y$ASCORE$§! battle score bonus from war goal.\nDefender receives §Y$DSCORE$§! battle score bonus from war goal.
translation: 进攻方根据战争目标获得§Y$ASCORE$§!额外战斗分数加成。\n防御方根据战争目标获得§Y$DSCORE$§!额外战斗分数加成。

original: War Goal: Attacker has naval superiority
translation: 战争目标：进攻方拥有制海权

original: War Goal: Defender has naval superiority
translation: 战争目标：防御方拥有制海权

original: War Goal: No one has naval superiority
translation: 战争目标：无人拥有制海权

original: War Goal: Attacker has won enough battles
translation: 战争目标：进攻方已赢得了足够多的战役

original: War Goal: Defender has won enough battles
translation: 战争目标：防御方已赢得了足够多的战役

original: War Goal: No one has won enough battles
translation: 战争目标：无人赢得了足够多的战役

original: War Goal: Attacker has managed to win enough battles
translation: 战争目标：进攻方设法赢得足够多的战役

original: War Goal: Defender has managed to win enough battles
translation: 战争目标：防御方设法赢得足够多的战役

original: War Goal: Not enough decisive battles for bonus war score
translation: 战争目标：没有足够的决定性战役来提供额外战争分数加成

original: War Goal: Attacker has won enough battles ($WARSCORE$ war score from battles)
translation: 战争目标：进攻方赢得了足够多的战役（来自战役的战争分数共$WARSCORE$）

original: War Goal: Defender has won enough battles ($WARSCORE$ war score from battles)
translation: 战争目标：防御方赢得了足够多的战役（来自战役的战争分数共$WARSCORE$）

original: War Goal: No one has won enough battles (over $WARSCORE$ war score from battles)
translation: 战争目标：无人赢得了足够多的战役（来自战役的战争分数超过$WARSCORE$）

original: Attacker blocks $A_BLOCK|0Y$ ports. Defender blocks $D_BLOCK|0Y$ ports. This gives the $WHO$ $SCORE|+$ war score each month. Current war score from goal is
translation: 进攻方封锁$A_BLOCK|0Y$港口。防御方封锁$D_BLOCK|0Y$港口。这将为$WHO$每月带来$SCORE|+$战争分数。当前从目标获得的战争分数为

original: We have no valid reason to attack them.
translation: 我们没有合适理由进攻他们。

original: You cannot take any more Bank Loans.
translation: 你无法从银行获得更多贷款。

original: You have taken $LOANNUM|Y$ loans, cannot take more than $MAXNUM|Y$ loans!
translation: 你已经借贷了$LOANNUM|Y$笔贷款，无法获得超过$MAXNUM|Y$笔贷款！

original: Cannot take loans while unconditionally surrendered!
translation: 无法在无条件投降时进行贷款！

original: provinces owned by you or your non-tributary subjects with
translation: 个属于你或者你的非朝贡属国的省份

original: The encouragement of cultural development has led to a Golden Age for our nation.
translation: 鼓励文化发展使得我国踏入黄金时代。

original: A set of laws concerning the treatment of the indigenous peoples in the New World.
translation: 一套关于新世界原住民待遇的法律。

original: The failure to restrict the ruthless exploitation of the natives has led to unrest.
translation: 毫无节制地剥削当地原住民引发了叛乱。

original: A new set of laws concerning the treatment of the indigenous peoples in the New World.
translation: 一套新的关于新世界原住民待遇的法律。

original: The failure to restrict the ruthless exploitation of the natives has led to unrest.
translation: 毫无节制地剥削当地原住民引发了叛乱。

original: A government agency to oversee all aspects of colonization.
translation: 一个全方位监督殖民事务的政府机构。

original: Sevilla has become one of the main ports of trade with the colonies in the New World.
translation: 塞维利亚已成为了与新世界殖民地进行贸易的主要港口之一。

original: Our finances are run by the powerful Fugger family and their immense banking empire.
translation: 我们的财政由强大的富格尔家族与其经营的庞大银行业帝国管理。

original: In order to pacify the 'Comuneros', heavy concessions have been given to the peasantry.
translation: 为了稳住「平民社区」，我们不得不向农民们作出大量让步。

original: The people of this province are yet to be convinced that their new ruler is legitimate.
translation: 该省份的民众还没有完全接受其新统治者的合法性。

original: The appointment of Colonial Governors has led to a noticeable increase in revenue from overseas. Unfortunately it has also created a lot of tension with the local population.
translation: 任命殖民地总督显著提升了来自海外的收入。不幸的是这也使得与殖民地人民的关系越发紧张。

original: Our continued insistence to micromanage every colonial decision from home has severely hurt our efficiency in the colonies.
translation: 我们对由本土直接细化管理各个殖民地的坚持使得我们各个殖民地的效率受到了一定程度的损害。

original: The nobility's victory over the regency council has caused a lot of unwanted influence over politics and economy.
translation: 贵族阶级对抗摄政议会的胜利使得我们的政治与经济受到了许多不利的影响。

original: Building a $BUILDING$ in $PROV$, expecting to be finished at date $DATE$.
Do NOT have the ruler modifier
Are you sure you want to quit and return to desktop?
translation: 确定要退出游戏并返回桌面吗？

original: Confirm that you want to dismiss $NAME$

translation: 你无法遣散你的统治者！
你无法遣散你的继承人！

original: You can't dismiss a leader who is commanding troops!
translation: 你无法遣散正在指挥军队的将领！

original: You can only build navies in a province that you control and that is a core of your nation.
translation: 你只能在处于你控制下且是你国核心的省份建造海军。

original: You can only build armies in a province that you control and that is a core of your nation.
translation: 你只能在处于你控制下且是你国核心的省份训练陆军。

original: You cannot declare a bankruptcy when you are already in one.
translation: 你无法在已处于破产状态时宣布破产。

original: Without any loans, there is no reason to declare bankruptcy.
translation: 在没有负债的情况下没有理由宣布破产。

original: Declaring a bankruptcy will wipe our loans, but we will suffer some severe drawbacks.
translation: 宣布破产将抹除我们的债务，但也会造成一些严重后果。

original: Are you sure you wish to debase your currency?\n\nYou will get §Y$VAL$§W¤, but corruption will increase by §R$CORRUPTION$%§!.
translation: 你确定要贬值货币吗？\n\n你会获得§Y$VAL$§W¤，但腐败度将增长§R$CORRUPTION$%§!。

original: Are you sure you wish to borrow §Y$VAL$§W¤ from the bankers? The total interest payment amounts to §Y$FEE$§W¤, you will have to pay this amount even if you repay early.
translation: 你确定要从银行家手中借取§Y$VAL$§W¤？总利息额度为§Y$FEE$§W¤，即便你提早偿还也必须全额支付这笔金额。

original: Are you sure you want to repay §Y$VAL$§W¤? This sum includes §Y$FEE$§W¤ in remaining interest.
translation: 你确定要偿还贷款§Y$VAL$§W¤？该金额包含剩余利息中的§Y$FEE$§W¤。

original: Are you sure you want to repay $NUM$ loans by the total value of $VAL|Y2$¤? This sum includes $FEE|Y2$¤ in remaining interest.
translation: 你确定要偿还总还款为$VAL|Y2$¤的$NUM$项贷款？该金额包含剩余利息中的$FEE|Y2$¤。
平均通货膨胀（最近$TIME$个月）：$VAL|Y%$§Y%§!
最高通货膨胀（最近$TIME$个月）：$VAL|Y%$§Y%§!
最低通货膨胀（最近$TIME$个月）：$VAL|Y%$§Y%§!

original: Can't fabricate a claim if it's already your core.
translation: 该省份已经是你的核心，无法伪造宣称。

original: Can't fabricate a claim if it's already your claim.
translation: 该省份已经有你的宣称，无法伪造宣称。

original: Ikko-ikki are mobs of peasant farmers, Buddhist monks, Shinto priests and local nobles who are dissatisfied with their monarch.
translation: 一向一揆是由不满于其君主的普通农民、佛教僧侣、神道教祭司与地方贵族组成的一些暴徒团伙。

original: Ronin are masterless samurai warrior bands who have turned to a life as mercenaries and robbers, and sometimes engaged in local uprisings.
translation: 浪人是选择像佣兵、劫匪一样生活的无主武士，有时也会加入地方暴动或起义。

original: The rebels refuse to pay their taxes! Accepting this will drastically lower our income.
translation: 叛军拒绝缴税！接受此要求会显著降低我们的收入。

original: In the eyes of the tribes our rule is weak, and they now seek to rule by their own accord.
translation: 在诸部族眼中我们的统治孱弱，因此他们开始寻求自治。

original: The Cossacks demand the right of recognition and to be able to rule themselves according to their own traditions.
translation: 哥萨克人要求被承认为一个民族且根据其民族传统进行自治。

original: The Particularists are tired of being governed from a far away capital, insensitive to the local needs. They demand that we let the regions govern themselves.
translation: 排他主义者厌倦了被遥远的首都所治理，并认为其不关心本地需求。他们要求我们让各个地区进行自治。

original: The Separatists demand Independence for $INDEPENDENCE_COUNTRY$. They feel that their ruler should be of $CULTURE$ culture.
translation: 分离主义者要求$INDEPENDENCE_COUNTRY$独立。他们觉得其统治者应该属于$CULTURE$文化。

original: The Patriots despise our unjust occupation and yearn to return to their native land of $DEFECT_COUNTRY$
translation: 此地爱国者否认我们的无理占领并盼望回到他们的祖国$DEFECT_COUNTRY$

original: The Colonials resent sending the tea leaves of their labor overseas and demand their independence!
translation: 殖民地非常不满我们将他们劳工的茶叶倾销海外，并要求独立！

original: The Colonials feel they don't get representation for their taxes and demand we let them join $DEFECT_COUNTRY$.
translation: 殖民者觉得他们并没有因为交税而获得话语权并要求允许其加入$DEFECT_COUNTRY$.

original: The revolutionaries resent our present, in their opinion, oppressive government and demand a $GOVERNMENT$.
translation: 革命者们对于现状极其不满，认为政府及其残暴，并要求成立一个$GOVERNMENT$国家。

original: The nobles demand we go back to the old ways, where mounted cavaliers ruled estates of subservient peasants. They demand an end to this country of Merchants and Peasants.
translation: 贵族要求我们重新沿用老一套体系——即马背上的骑士统治着服从他们的农民。他们要求结束这个由商人与农民管理的国家。

original: The religious rebels fight for the $RELIGION$ religion. They demand that we recognize its supremacy or at the very least cease our efforts to convert them and let them worship in peace.
translation: 宗教叛军为$RELIGION$奋战。他们要求我们承认其宗教的优越性或至少不再试图使其改宗并让他们安宁地进行礼拜。

original: $HERETIC_RELIGION$ rebels demand that we let them worship in peace. However, the Pope warns us this will undermine respect for the Catholic Church and cause even worse heresies to take root and spread.
translation: $HERETIC_RELIGION$叛军要求我们不干涉他们的信仰崇拜。然而，教宗警告我们，这会严重削弱天主教会的权威，甚至导致更糟糕的异端邪说的扎根与蔓延。

original: The pretender rebels demand that you install $PRETENDER_MONARCH$ on the $COUNTRY$ throne.
translation: 伪宣称的叛军要求你让$PRETENDER_MONARCH$成为$COUNTRY$的君主.

original: The Ronin are masterless samurai, left over from the war. Bitter and poor, they have gathered around a leader that they wish to install as Shogun.
translation: 浪人是无主武士，战争的遗留者。穷困潦倒的浪人们拥立了一个新领袖，并期望其成为新一任征夷大将军

original: The Ikko-Ikki are peasants upset with the current order in Japan and they will try to tear it down. They would rather be left alone.
translation: 一向一揆是对日本现状不安的农民起义军，他们会试图重新建立日本的秩序。一向一揆更倾向于独自行动

original: The reactionaries demand a stop to these new ideas from the west. They demand we go back to the good old days.
translation: 保守派要求停止让西方的新思想流入。他们宣称我们应该回到‘美好的旧时光’。

original: Lollards demands that we let them worship in peace. However, the Pope warns us this will undermine respect for the Catholic Church and cause even worse heresies to take root and spread.
translation: 罗拉德派要求我们不干涉他们的信仰崇拜。然而，教宗警告我们，这会严重削弱天主教会的权威，甚至导致更糟糕的异端邪说的扎根与蔓延。

original: The religious rebels fight for the $RELIGION$ religion. They demand that we recognize its supremacy or at the very least cease our efforts to convert them and let them worship in peace.
translation: 宗教叛军为$RELIGION$奋战。他们要求我们承认其宗教的优越性或至少不再试图使其改宗并让他们安宁地进行礼拜。

original: Religious fanatics tend to rise up in provinces controlled by nations of a different faith. They seek to spread their faith and smite all unbelievers.
translation: 宗教狂热者试图在由信仰其他宗教的国家所控制的省份里进行叛乱。他们将传播其宗教并打倒一切不信教者。

original: The religious rebels fight for the $RELIGION$ religion. They demand that we recognize its supremacy or at the very least cease our efforts to convert them and let them worship in peace.

original: Religious fanatics tend to rise up in provinces controlled by nations of a different faith. They seek to spread their faith and smite all unbelievers.
translation: 宗教狂热者倾向于在与国教不同的省份中起义.他们致力于传播信仰,惩罚不信者.

original: As your last province is taken, your nation is no more. Thus the history of §Y$NAME$§W ends.
translation: 随着你最后的省份被夺取，你的国家不复存在了。因此§Y$NAME$§W的历史也划上了句号。

original: You are not connected to Steam Friends and can't access the community tab!
translation: 你没有连接到STEAM，无法进入全球聊天频道.

original: You have not searched for any servers yet.
translation: 你尚未搜索到任何服务器

original: You have given an incorrect password or have been banned from this game.
translation: 密码错误或者你在这场游戏中被BAN了.

original: Allow players to play the same country
translation: 允许玩家扮演同一国家

original: Allow players to play the same country
translation: 允许玩家扮演同一国家

original: Our current interest level is based upon:
translation: 我们目前的利率水平取决于：

original: Each level of stability is multiplied by the following
translation: 各级稳定度所受到的效果

original: Each level of positive stability has the following effects
translation: 正稳定性的各个水平有如下影响

original: Each level of negative stability has the following effects
translation: 负稳定性的各个水平有如下影响

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§W has a claim on this province.
§Y$COUNTRY$§W has a permanent claim on this province.
§Y$COUNTRY$§W has some legitimacy in viewing this province as theirs.
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§W在这个省份的宣称权上拥有一定的合法性。

original: The claim is permanent and will not expire.
The claim is valid until $DATE|Y$, the day the truce with $PROVINCE_OWNER|Y$ ends.
translation: 宣称有效期：$DATE|Y$，这是与$PROVINCE_OWNER|Y$的停战协定到期之时。

original: The claim is valid until the war with $PROVINCE_OWNER|Y$ ends.
The claim is valid until the war with $PROVINCE_OWNER|Y$ ends, or $DATE|Y$, whichever is later.
translation: 与$PROVINCE_OWNER|Y$停战或者$DATE|Y$之后宣称失效，以较迟者为准。

original: The claim can never expire while $PROVINCE_OWNER|Y$ owns and hasn't cored the province. If the province is lost, the claim will expire $DATE|Y$.
translation: 只要$PROVINCE_OWNER|Y$依然占有这个省份但还未将其变为核心，这个宣称就不会失效，如果失去了这个省份，这个宣称就将在$DATE|Y$内失效。

original: Claims expire $CLAIM_YEARS$ years after they are created, unless the claimant is at war with the owner of the province, or the claimant is the owner.
translation: 宣称权自宣称起有效期为$CLAIM_YEARS$年，除非宣称者向省份拥有者开战或拥有该省份。

original: Recalling your colonist before the province is properly integrated into your realm will not cancel your colony, although it might trigger a native uprising.
translation: 在省份完全归顺贵国前召回殖民者并不会消除你的殖民地，但可能会触发原住民暴动.

original: The natives in this province have the culture $CULTURE|Y$ ($CULTUREGROUP|Y$).
Each month your Colonist has a $CHANCE$% chance of increasing the Settler population.
translation: 每个月你的殖民者都有$CHANCE$%的机会增加定居人口.

original: Sending a Colonist will cost you $COST$.
translation: 派遣一名殖民者将花费$COST$.

original: Mission succeeds when the following criteria are met
translation: 当各项条件达成时任务就成功了

original: At least one province in the $REGION$ region
translation: 至少一个属于$REGION$地区的省份
没有一个属于$REGION$地区的省份

original: At least one province in the $CONTINENT$ continent
translation: 至少一个属于$CONTINENT$大陆的省份
没有一个属于$CONTINENT$大陆的省份

original: §Y$NAME$§! from $COUNTRY|Y$ is building a colony in §Y$PROVINCE$§!. Each month he will have a §Y$CHANCE$§! chance to increase the population by §Y$NUM$§!, growing the colony by an average of §Y$VAL$§W people per year.
translation: 来自$COUNTRY|Y$的§Y$NAME$§!正在§Y$PROVINCE$§!建立一个殖民地。每个月他将有§Y$CHANCE$§!的机会增加§Y$NUM$§!人口，殖民地平均每年增长§Y$VAL$§W人。

original: The colonist $NAME$ from $COUNTRY$ is working in $PROVINCE$.
Trade power gives extra power to the trade node currently defended.
translation: 防御保护给予贸易节点额外的贸易竞争力.

original: The Colonist working here has a §Y$VAL$§!% chance of attracting extra Settlers each month.
translation: 我们的殖民者每个月有§Y$VAL$§!%的机会吸引额外的定居者.

original: No Colonist present to attract new Settlers.
translation: 没有殖民者吸引新移民.

original: Our policy to leave a large part of the profits in the hands of colonial officials has attracted more people to our colonies.
translation: 我们将大部分利润留在殖民地官员手中的政策，吸引了更多的人前来定居.

original: Our policy to demand that more of the profits from our colonies reach the central treasury has made life in our colonies less promising.
translation: 我们将大部分殖民地利润收归国库的政策，使得殖民地的生活不容乐观.

original: The able Duke of Coimbra ruled the country well during the regency of King Afonso, but he created many enemies among the plotting noblemen of the court.
translation: 科英布拉公爵在阿方索国王摄政期间将这个国家治理得很好，但同时也在宫廷的贵族中树立了很多敌人。

original: Portugal is increasing their hold on the trade in the region through privateers and blockades.
translation: 葡萄牙通过私掠船和封锁，对这个地区贸易的掌控越来越强了.

original: Appointed the first governor general of Brazil, Martin Afonso de Sousa intensified colonization and defeated foreign privateers and pirates.
translation: 作为指派到巴西的第一任总督，马丁·阿方索·德索萨拓展了殖民地，击败了他国私掠船和海盗。

original: An earthquake has laid waste to a large part of the province.
translation: 一场地震殃及了这个省份的大部分地区.

original: The death of the King and the expulsion of his trusted advisor have put a halt to reforms and let reactionaries dominate the internal politics.
translation: 国王之死以及他所信任的顾问被驱逐，为改革蒙上了阴影，并使得反改革派掌控了国内的政局.

original: The labor shortage is being reduced by slaves from Africa.
translation: 非洲奴隶的减少使得劳动力短缺.

original: In order to stabilize the possessions in the Spice Islands, an increased effort to convert the local population is being made.
translation: 为了维护在香料群岛的属地的稳定，我们已经加大了在当地民众中传教的投入。

original: The Casa da Índia oversees all Portuguese possessions in Africa and India and controls all the rights to trade there.
translation: 印度事务院掌管非洲、印度的葡萄牙财产，全权负责该地区贸易。

original: Tower of Belém was built in the early 16th century in order to defend the mouth of the Tagus River.
translation: 为了防御塔霍河的入口，贝莱塔于十六世纪早期建立.

original: Have demands they will enforce on victory
translation: 胜利后强迫他们接受要求

original: They will not enforce any demands
translation: 他们不会接受任何要求
将影响他们占领的省份

original: They will not impact provinces they take
translation: 它们不会影响所占领的省份

original: $NAME$ currently have $VAL|Y0$ loan(s) and a total debt of $AMOUNT|Y0$¤.

translation: 当前无法改变政体，由于：\n

There are no viable government types to change to.

§YMaximum morale§! is decided by the participating country with the highest land morale. §YCurrent morale§! is the average morale of all the units from all participating countries. Hover over the subunits to see the morale of that unit, who controls it and against whom it is fighting.
translation: §Y最大士气§!由参战国家的最高士气决定. §Y现有士气§!为所有参战国家陆军单位的平均值.鼠标移至单位上来观察每只单位的士气

original: The morale in sieges is decided by the value of the infantry troops in each army.
translation: 围城中的士气由步兵的值决定.

original: Gives §Y'Aggressive expansion'§! relation penalty towards countries interested in §Y'$PROV$'§!
translation: 对§Y$PROV$§!有兴趣的国家会获得§Y侵略扩张§!关系惩罚

Target has a different religion group than conqueror
translation: 目标与征服者的宗教组不同

original: Other country has a claim on the target
translation: 其他国家对该目标有宣称

original: Target is not on the same continent
This button will close the current troop window.
translation: 该按钮将关闭当前军队窗口.

original: There are no units of this type to detach.
Can't detach army that is loaded on the transport ships.
translation: 装载进船只中的部队无法派遣。

original: Can't detach transport ships that have armies on board.
translation: 无法派遣装载部队的运输船。

original: Can't detach units of this type, as it would leave the unit empty.
translation: 不能分离这个类型的部队，因为这将导致这个部队成为空编制。

original: Right click to delete this template.
translation: 单机右键以删除此模板

original: We need at least $THRESHOLD|Y$ more §Gpositive§! than §Rnegative§! reasons for an acceptance. We currently have $RATIO|Y$.
translation: 为了让对方接受，§G正面因素§!至少要超过§R负面因素§!$THRESHOLD|Y$。当前有$RATIO|Y$。

There are new global chat messages

translation: §Y$SUBJECT$§! 已经同意与 §Y$OVERLORD$§! 共同戴着一顶王冠！

original: Military tactics reduces the damage your units take in combat. The higher it is, the better.
translation: 军事战术值可以减小你在战斗中的损失，数值越高，效果越好。

original: This unit is currently located in $LOCATION$.
This unit is currently not moving.
This unit is moving in friendly land.
translation: 该单位正在前往友军领土.

original: There are no friendly ships in port.
There are no friendly transport ships in port

A unit can be attached to a transport in port. When the transport leaves the port, the unit will embark on the transport and leave with it. If the unit size exceeds the transport capacity, the army will be split, and the remainder units will be left behind.
translation: 单位可在港口装载到运输船。当运输船离开港口，装载到船上的单位将一同离开。如果单位数量超过了运输船的容量，超载的部分会被留下。

original: A unit that has moved more than halfway towards its destination cannot be attached to transports.
translation: 此单位向目的地行进路程已经过半，不能装载到运输船。

original: As the development of firearms progressed the equipment of Indian musketmen increased in quality. Precision and long range was given priority as the Mughals would continue to use musketeers as sharpshooters or marksmen. The Mughals would also continue the use of musketeers in the direct service of the central authority (as opposed to the cavalry arm in the hands of the Mansabdars).
translation: 火药的发展增强了印度火枪兵的装备.射击的精度和距离使莫卧儿继续让火枪手担任狙击兵.并让火枪兵为中央服务（用以对抗曼萨达尔的骑兵）.

original: The Sikhs of the Punjab would develop a special kind of cavalry fighting style inspired by the Persian and Afghan armies. This was referred to as 'dhai-phat' or 'two-and-a-half' strikes. A group of cavalry would ride up to the enemy and fire their matchlocks, retreat and repeat. When the enemy was sufficiently softened the great mass of the cavalry charged with their sabers. Similarly many north Indian states increasingly came to incorporate mobile musket-armed cavalry troopers in their armies, often recruited from the many Afghan tribesmen in the region.
translation: 旁遮普的锡克教徒们受到阿富汗和波斯人的军队的启发，发展出了一种被称为「戴菲特」或者「两次半」攻击的特殊骑兵作战方式。一队骑兵冲向敌人并朝他们开火，然后撤退，如此重复。等敌人虚弱不堪时便朝他们举起马刀。许多印度北部国家同样也在他们的部队中使用滑膛枪骑兵，而其中许多人都是从该地区的阿富汗部落中招募的。

original: The Western Deccan, an area of hills, jungles and many forts proved quite hard to subdue for the large and heavily equipped Mughal armies. In its desperate fight to survive the Ahmednagar sultanate pioneered the use of light cavalry to harass the Mughal forces. The Maratha horsemen employed by Ahmednagar were so successful that they were soon employed by other rulers as well.
translation: 德干西部到处都是山川、丛林和堡垒，令庞大重装的莫卧儿军队难以征服。为生存而战斗的阿哈纳卡伊斯兰先锋以轻骑兵袭扰莫卧儿军队。如同其他君主的招募一样，马塔拉骑兵很快就被阿哈纳卡招募了。

original: Many tribesmen of the Kanara, Desh and Malnad regions, such as the Berads and Mavales, adopted matchlock muskets for hunting and warfare early on. Due to their familiarity with the weapons these tribesmen soon became the primary musketmen in southern India. The Maratha armies in particular came to rely on these tribal groups for recruiting infantry to their armies. The tribal organization of the troops was often kept, with the headmen serving as officers. Berads and Mavales would increasingly be deployed in Maratha, Mughal and Mysorean armies during the 17th and 18th centuries and would eventually form the core of future European-style infantry regiments in the area.
translation: 许多卡纳拉、德什和马尔纳德地区部落的成员，在早期为了打猎和战争成为了火绳枪兵。因为这些部落成员熟悉武器，在印度南部地区成为了火枪兵中的首要力量。马塔拉军队对他们尤其依赖.这些部落的首领往往都在军队中当军官.这些部落成员在马塔拉越来越多，莫卧儿和迈索尔的军队最终在17和18世纪之间在这一地区形成了欧洲步兵团风格的军队。

original: While Elephants were a common element in most Indian armies they would often only be used in smaller numbers by commanders and as a supplement to the cavalry or infantry. In the regions dominated by jungle however, such as Orissa or Bastar, horses are both hard to use effectively and to keep in good health. As a result armies in these regions would rely much more on larger units of elephants used as mobile archer platforms.
translation: 大象在印度军队中只是一个少量用于支援骑兵和步兵的因素。但在奥里萨或巴斯达，丛林统治着这些地方，马匹难以有效利用和保持健康。所以在这些地区很打程度上弓箭手要依靠大象作为射击平台。

original: With the general lack of interest in the development of infantry tactics in Indian armies the advent of fire arms would at first not make a big impact. While common in Indian armies they would not make up a sizable part of the infantry troops for a long time and firearms would continue to be used in an individual way rather than adopted for specific formations. Rather than equipping their own units with the new weapons the Indian states would initially be content to hire foreign, often Turkoman, arquebusiers as a supplement to their archers and artillery.
translation: 在印度将军们对发展步兵战术缺乏兴趣，火器的到来并没有产生重大影响。他们不愿弥补印度军队的落后之处，比起把火枪兵编阵列队来，他们更愿意让士兵单干.他们更愿意雇佣外国人，常常是土库曼人，而不是装备自己部队，火绳枪兵则作为弓箭手和火炮的补充。

original: With the arrival of Muslim powers came an increased influx of good foreign cavalry mounts to India. The use of Muslim military tactics eventually became commonplace even in the armies of Hindu states such as the Vijayanagara Empire. In the north-west the Rajput warriors quickly adapted to the tactics of the Indian sultanates and a new breed of Rajput cavalry horses also soon emerged. The care and breeding of these Marwari horses would take on a highly ceremonial and revered role in the highly militant Rajput societies. In the southern Indian climate breeding cavalry mounts proved harder and south Indian rulers found themselves having to rely on the traders of the Indian Ocean to supply their cavalry.
translation: 随着穆斯林力量进入印度，也带来了更好的骑兵坐骑.穆斯林的军队战术最后在毗奢耶那伽罗王朝也是极普遍的。西北的拉其普特武士迅速吸收了印度伊斯兰人的战术，并且新的拉其普特战马也出现了。而哺育马瓦里马在好战的拉其普特社会中变成了崇高的事。南印度的气候使得喂养战马成为一件非常困难的事情，他们的君主不得不依赖海外贸易来供应骑兵坐骑。

original: Throughout the 15th century cavalry continued to be the most influential of the combat arms in India. The arrival of Babur in the early 16th century and the birth of the Mughal Empire came to further accentuate this trend. Babur made use of large contingents of cavalry archers from the steppes of Transoxiana during his invasion and the Mughals who came after him would continue to rely on a large cavalry arm. As the other states in northern India tried to catch up with the Mughal military machine many of them came to rely increasingly on the use of Central Asian adventurers as cavalry officers. One of these Afghan adventurers would come to found the short-lived Suri Empire in eastern and central India.
translation: 一种骑兵贯穿15世纪并成为印度最有影响力的骑兵.巴布尔在16世纪开创的莫卧儿帝国对此尤为看重.在进军西伯利亚与河中地区时巴布尔利用了大量的弓骑兵.印度北部的其他邦国也纷纷效仿，许多中亚的冒险者都成为了骑兵军官.一个阿富汗的冒险者甚至在印度中心东部建立了短命的苏尔帝国.

original: As the 18th century progressed Indian infantry came to fight more coordinated, with a higher rate of fire and be put to much better use than before. The addition of military innovations such as Mysorean rockets and the integration of Indian light cavalry allowed Indian states to be much more successful against European armies. Striking a good balance at this, Mysore in particular would, under Haider Ali and Tipu Sultan, come to propel itself from a local kingdom to a regional South Indian power.
translation: 18世纪的发展促进了印度步兵的战斗协调，高射速的利用远比以往要好。迈索尔火箭的发明以及轻骑兵的整合使得印度能够更好地对付欧洲的军队。在海德阿里和迪普苏丹的统治下，迈索尔地区取得了很好的发展。这也令他们由一个本地王国成为了印度南部的重要力量。

original: In Indian military history the infantry was often cheap to come by and easy to replace due to the large Indian population. Cavalry on the other hand was expensive and had often, at least since the arrival of the Muslim armies in the 13th century, proved to be the decisive element on Indian battlefields. Perhaps because of this the development of infantry tactics would not receive as much attention during most of the early modern era. The role of the infantry was to make up the bulk of a force and to siege the many forts of the Indian subcontinent.
translation: 在印度历史上，由于庞大的人口数量，步兵很容易募集。而另一方面骑兵虽然非常昂贵，却经常成为印度战场上的决定性力量，至少在13世纪的穆斯林军队抵达后如此。也许正因如此，近代早期的步兵战术并没受到重视。他们扮演的角色是在印度次大陆围困城堡。

original: As the Mughal empire grew the need for a central organization to keep track of its many power holders became a necessity. Under Akbar a numerical ranking system for all nobles (Mansabdars) was implemented. Jagirs, allowances and the number of cavalry troopers a noble was obliged to field, would become dependent on this rank.
translation: 随着莫卧儿帝国的发展，拥有一个追踪为数众多的掌权者的中央机构需求愈发显现出重要性。于是在阿克巴制度的基础上，一个关乎所有贵族的等级制度应运而生。不同等级的贵族能够拥有的封地、津贴以及他们应提供的征召骑兵数量都在这个等级制度中明文规定。

original: With Babur's invasion of India the subcontinent saw its first organized use of fire arms. Unlike in the west, however, the musketmen, or Tofangchis, as used by Babur would serve as marksmen in his armies, firing individually at specific targets both during pitched battles and sieges. Babur took care to train these troops to achieve better results and unlike the Mughal cavalry arm the recruitment, training and organization of musketmen would be kept under his direct control. Whether Babur's great success at Panipat was due to the use of fire arms or not the use of musketmen became increasingly commonplace in Indian armies after Babur's invasion.
translation: 伴随着巴布尔的入侵，印度次大陆出现了历史上第一次有组织的使用火力射击武器。然而，与西方不同的是，巴布尔所使用的火枪兵或波斯火枪兵，在他的军队中充当狙击手在战斗和围攻中单独射击特定的目标。巴布尔很注重训练这些部队，以取得更好的结果，不像莫卧儿骑兵部队，火枪兵的招募、训练和组织将由他直接控制。巴布尔在帕尼巴特的巨大成功是由于使用了火器，还是在巴布尔入侵之后，印度军队才逐渐列装起了成建制的火枪兵。

original: After the fall of the Ahmednagar sultanate the Marathas that had previously thrived in its service came to fight in the service of Bijapur and other local or regional powers eager to develop further ways to outsmart the large Mughal armies encroaching on the Deccan. With the rise of Maratha military ability came the rise of Maratha political power and these Deccani warriors would soon form states of their own, overshadowing their former Muslim employers and proving to be a threat to their Mughal nemesis. Through the use of light cavalry and infantry the Marathan armies would be able to harass and cut off much larger and less mobile Mughal forces and carve out a number of empires from the declining Mughal state.
translation: 伊斯兰的阿哈纳卡陨落后，马拉塔在与贾布尔的作战中迅速发展，其他地方势力也希望战胜进犯德干的莫卧儿。马拉塔军事点数的崛起提升了它的政治地位，德干武士迅速形成了他们自己的政权，成为了莫卧儿的威胁。通过轻骑兵和步兵的使用，马塔拉侵袭并或多或少地切断了莫卧儿的移动力量，并击败了莫卧儿在德干的数个政权。

original: Hiring of European officers to train and lead Indian regiments changed the military landscape of India in many ways. Armies using traditional tactics, emphasizing cavalry, were often beaten by forces with drilled musket-armed infantry and mobile artillery. In order to stay ahead it would become essential to organize cavalry, infantry and artillery to fight together to a much greater degree than had previously been seen in India. Mysore under Hyder Ali and Tipu Sultan was one of the states that took this lesson to heart the most and managed to prove that as long as they could be properly coordinated with the other arms light cavalry was still a very powerful tool for disrupting the operations of their opponents in India.
translation: 通过雇佣欧洲军官训练和领导印度军队，在多个方面改变了印度的军事景象.使用传统战术，强调骑兵的军队，常被火枪步兵和移动火炮击败。为了保持领先，组织步兵、骑兵和火炮协同战斗成了重要内容。迈索尔对此尤为用心，他们表明一旦他们掌握此道，就可以令其他敌人闻风丧胆。

original: Vijayanagara and its successor states relied on the local chiefs of the communities of their empire for much of its administration. Among their tasks was the organization of local defense and the recruitment and marshaling of troops.
translation: 毗奢耶那伽罗王朝和他的继承政权依靠当地的首领来治理帝国.他们的任务之一便是防御、征兵，以及整编军队.

original: The less prestigious infantry arm would commonly attract third or fourth sons of poor Purbia Rajput families in the northern countryside, deserted Afghan clansmen, Jat farmers, and other groups with poor prospects. Unable to afford horses these groups would adopt the use of firearms as a cheaper way to succeed in the battlefield. While they were given little formal training these self-educated Purbia musketmen would eventually make up the core of a more modern northern Indian army as their use of firearms and eventual use of more modern European infantry tactics allowed them to increasingly make a difference on the battlefields of India.
translation: 那些二流步兵团依然吸引着拉杰普特贫穷家庭的孩子加入。因为无法为他们提供战马所以成为火枪兵成了在战场上的好选择。少许的正规训练和自学使得他们最终成为了印度北部的核心力量，他们使用火器并最终采纳了许多欧洲步兵战术，最终让他们在印度战场上与众不同。

original: The role that the Telingas and Berads filled in the south would eventually be filled by the Purbias in the north. British officers in the service of the East India Company and French adventurers in the service of the Mughals or other Indian rulers became increasingly common as commanders of Indian musket infantry in the north-east. As a result drilled Indian infantry regiments could soon be found in all the armies of the states in the north as well as in mercenary bands. Eventually recruitment would become even more organized and these northern Indian troops, known as Sepoys after the Mughal term for an infantryman would become closely associated with Company rule in India.
translation: 特林加斯和普拉德斯占领了南部，北部最终由普比亚斯占领。英国军官受雇于东印度公司，法国冒险者则为莫卧儿和其他印度统治者服务，并在印度东北部成为了军队的指挥官，他们使得在任何北部军队都能很快建立起印度步兵团，以及佣兵部队。最终印度北部的募兵形成了组织化，莫卧儿之后火枪成为了印度统治者的必备。

original: As the Vijayanagara empire fractured into a number of Nayak kingdoms following its defeat at Talicota the local Poligars remained in place as local power holders responsible for recruitment. In some of these successor states the Poligars would acquire an even more independent position than they had under Vijayanagara. Along with the continued shortage of horses this led to an even bigger infantry ratio in the southern armies. Firearms also continued to become more common in the south as well as in the north during the 16th century.
translation: “在被塔里科特击败后，毗奢耶那伽罗王朝支离破碎成了一系列的纳亚克王国，马拉塔轻骑兵保留了下来成为本地统治者的力量。一些马拉塔轻骑兵获得了比在毗奢耶那伽罗王朝时期更加独立的地位。马匹的短缺让南部一些军队的步兵比例扩大。在16世纪火器变得像北部那样普及。”

original: The light Maratha cavalry increasingly proved how vulnerable the grand Mughal heavy cavalry armies were if you could cut off their supplies. During the first half of the 18th century as Maratha power grew and as infantry increasingly became organized in the European fashion there came a need for more organized cavalry regiments. From the 1720s and onwards the size and level of organization of Indian cavalry armies would increase to attempt to match the development of infantry and artillery tactics that now took place. It would take some time before seasoned Indian generals would realize just how vulnerable their focus on the cavalry arm could make them against the drilled European-style musket regiments that became increasingly common during the 1700s.
translation: 马拉塔轻骑兵证明了只要你切断莫卧儿重骑兵的补给，他们根本不算什么.17世纪上半叶马拉塔的步兵朝欧洲风格发展，这就需要征募更多的骑兵.1720年开始骑兵的等级和规模不断增加试图跟上步兵和火炮的脚步.老练的印度将军们需要花一些时间才能知道如何让骑兵对抗欧洲风格的火枪兵.

original: As the French became increasingly entangled in the affairs of the south and eastern Indian states they started the practice of training Indian troops to use coordinated European infantry tactics. This would soon prove to be the start of a revolution in Indian warfare as infantry rather than cavalry increasingly came to be the determining factor in battles. Under Dupleix and de Bussy Telegu soldiers started to fight and arm themselves in a manner more similar to the European armies of the time. These troops were known as Telingas after their area of origin (Telingana) but soon the term came to be used about musket armed and uniformed infantry troops in other parts of India.
translation: 法国人越来越多的介入到印度东部和南部邦国的事务中来，他们开始以欧洲的战术来训练印度军队.这将很快给印度的战场作战带来革命，步兵逐渐变成战场的决定性因素.在迪普莱和德彪西的训练下士兵们越来越像欧洲军队般武装和作战.起初这些士兵来自于特林加斯，但很快穿着统一制服的士兵将遍布印度.

original: We can revoke their power of an elector. Declaring this war will greatly upset the other electors.
translation: 我们可以剥夺他们选举的权力。宣这场战争会极大地惹恼其他的选帝侯。

original: Hunt down the privateers that harm your trade.
translation: 追捕妨碍贸易的私掠船

original: Go to war to help a spawned rebel faction to enforce their demands.
translation: 帮助揭竿而起的叛军，以使他们能够强制要求。

original: We must stop the Revolution and restore peace and order!
translation: 我们必须制止革命，维护和平与秩序。

original: We must spread the Revolution beyond our borders!
translation: 我们必须在境外输出革命!

original: We must force the Emperor to recognize our religious rights!
translation: 我们必须迫使皇帝承认我们的宗教权利！

original: We must force our neighbors to bend knee, so that we may have a regular supply of human sacrifices to keep the end of the world at bay.
translation: 我们要迫使邻国臣服于我们，如此我们才能获得一个人祭的稳定来源。

original: The lands around us are divided into numerous Cahs, city states of little consequence. All neighboring Cahs must join our city or perish.
translation: 我们周围的土地被分成了无数的「卡赫」——无足轻重的城邦。周围所有「卡赫」都必须加入我们或者被毁灭。

original: Unify lands of the Chinese Subcontinent.
We must prove to the world we are deserving of the Mandate of Heaven.
translation: 我们必须向世界证明我们是拥有天命的。

original: §YLeft-click§W to open War Overview\n§YRight-click§W to Sue for Peace
translation: §Y左键§W打开战争概览\n§Y右键§W请求和平

original: We no longer control any provinces:
translation: 我们不再控制任何省份：

original: Tensions along our border with [From.Owner.GetName] have given us a claim on the province of [From.GetName].
translation: 与 [From.Owner.GetName] 的紧张边境局势，给予了我们 [From.GetName] 的宣称权.

original: Trade Companies can only be created in territories.
translation: 贸易公司只能在自治领上建立

original: [new_shogunate.Monarch.GetName] has utterly defeated the shogun, and will crown [new_shogunate.Monarch.GetHerHis] brilliant campaign by having the Emperor name [new_shogunate.Monarch.GetHerHim] the new shogun - becoming the hereditary military dictator of Japan.\n\nOnly time will tell whether the [new_shogunate.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] shogunate will be more successful than its predecessor when it comes to the task of solidifying the warring clans.
translation: [new_shogunate.Monarch.GetName]彻底的击败了幕府。 [new_shogunate.Monarch.GetHerHim]将让天皇任命自己为新的幕府将军，成为日本世袭的军事独裁者，并以此作为[new_shogunate.Monarch.GetHerHis]辉煌战役的圆满结局。\n\n只有时间能告诉我们[new_shogunate.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]幕府能否比上一个幕府更加成功地把各个大名统合在麾下。

original: This cardinal belongs to $COUNTRY|Y$ since they have given them $VOTES|Y$ votes so far.
translation: 这个枢机主教效忠于$COUNTRY|Y$自从他们给他投了$VOTES|Y$票.

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§W has invested §Y$AMOUNT$§W papal influence in becoming the next curia controller.
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§W为成为下一任教廷监护已经投资§Y$AMOUNT$§W教廷影响力。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§W has $AMOUNT$ chance of being the next curia controller.
Target has a different religion group

translation: 目标是神圣罗马帝国成员

original: Have culture NOT accepted by owner

translation: 最高的省份贸易竞争力

original: You may not declare war when troops are already positioned in their land.
translation: 当你的部队在敌方领土上时你不能宣战.

original: You can't declare war on the leader of the personal union while a succession war is being fought over your throne.
translation: 你王位的继承战争正在进行，不能向联统主导者宣战.

original: These rebels want to defect to $NATION$
You are reinforcing $TROOPS|0Y$ troops every month.\nYou need $TOTAL_MISSING|0Y$ men to fully reinforce your armies.\nReinforcing your standing army costs $COST|2Y$¤ extra per month.
translation: 你每月增援$TROOPS|0Y$部队.\n你需要$TOTAL_MISSING|0Y$来补充军队.\n这将额外花费你每月$COST|2Y$¤！

original: You have mercenaries that are reinforcing. No manpower is needed, but it costs $COST|2Y$¤ extra per month.
translation: 你的雇佣兵正在补充，你不会消耗人力，但是这将每月额外花费$COST|2Y$¤。

original: §RWe have recently sent them a gift. Only our last gift will affect their relations with us.§!
translation: §R我们最近送了他们一个礼物.只有我们最近一次送的礼物会影响我们的关系§!

original: They are currently working on making §Y$PROVINCE$§! a core.
translation: 他们正在把§Y$PROVINCE$§!转化成核心省份。

original: You need to unlock Colonists through Ideas.
translation: 你需要通过理念来解锁殖民.
(其中 $VAL|Y$ 是由于重商主义为 $NAME$)

original: Impact of $PENALTY$ power due to $WHO$ power of §Y$POSS$%§!.
translation: 因$WHO$在§Y$POSS$%§!的贸易竞争力而受到$PENALTY$的贸易竞争力的惩罚.

original: With the North American technology group, technology levels are 250% more expensive (350%).
translation: 属于北美洲科技组时，科技消耗额外250%(350%).

original: With the Mesoamerican technology group, technology levels are 150% more expensive (250%).
translation: 属于中美洲科技组时，科技消耗额外150%(250%).

original: With the South American technology group, technology levels are 250% more expensive (350%).
translation: 作为南美科技组，科技贵250% (350%)。

original: The basic unit of armies of Mesoamerica. They were usually a peasant levy led by aristocratic officers and armed with spear and shield. This unit formed the backbone of the armies of states like the Aztec Empire.
translation: 中美洲最基础的士兵.他们通常是由抽役土民和贵族军官装备盾与矛组成.这类士兵是阿兹特克帝国一类国家的栋梁.

original: The forest warrior continued to improve as new technologies and tactics became available. Retaining its balance between attack and defense it continued to improve in both areas.
translation: 丛林勇士随着科技进步不断革新.在增强攻击和防御能力的同时维持两者的平衡.

original: The Incan Slingshots used their deadly missile weapons at relatively close range, where their accuracy and impact could be deadly. The use of a sling or huaraca was common knowledge in large parts of South America as children often spent many hours perfecting their skills killing birds.
translation: 印加投石兵在较近的距离使用他们那致命的投射武器时可以保障优越的精度和杀伤力.对投石索,或瓜拉卡的使用是南美洲孩童中最常见的活动,他们常用其射击飞鸟.

original: The Incan Axemen supplemented the missile troops, using a variety of weapons from small hand axes called champis, to ones with shafts as long as a halberd.
translation: 印加斧兵辅助投射部队,他们使用从小斧或称坎皮到长戟的各类武器.

original: With the arrival of the Europeans to the Americas, gunpowder weapons came to be known by the local population. The advantages became apparent and it was only a matter of time before units carrying muskets appeared. The Reformed musketeer was an attempt to combine the new technology with the ferocity of ancient tribal warfare. This unit is strongest in offense, but the new gunpowder weapons also give it weight in defense.
translation: 随着欧洲人在美洲的登陆,火药武器被当地人所熟识.其优势决定了携枪武士的出现仅仅是时间问题.这些改良滑膛枪手是努力尝试融合新科技与传统部落凶狠的战斗风格的结果.这些部队长于进攻,但火药武器同时给予他们足够防御.

original: The South American Arquebusier takes advantage of its weapon's lighter weight and increased maneuverability. What it loses in offensive shock it gains in keeping up a steady fire in defensive action.
translation: 南美火绳枪兵驾驭其火器优越的冲击力来保持防御时的优势.

original: The Westernized Incan infantry were the successors of the mountain warriors of earlier eras. Western training and equipment has improved these units in all departments.
translation: 西化印加步兵是早前山林勇士的继承者.西式训练和装备在所有领域增强了这些步兵.

original: The Reformed Westernized Incan infantry used the new gunpowder technology and training to assume a more defensive role.
translation: 改良西化印加步兵使用新式的火药科技和训练,拥有更强的防御能力.

original: The Incan Guerrilla used the terrain to its maximum advantage. Although they do not do a lot of damage to the opposition, it can take a long time to wear down these units.
translation: 印加游击队最大化地形优势.虽然他们无法向对手造成很大损害,但他们很难被一举消灭.

original: A provincial government set to handle the affairs of the New World colonies, led by a Governor or Viceroy.
translation: 一个由总督领导,在新世界殖民地里管辖各类事物的省级政府.

original: The locally elected assembly will elect their own [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 当地选出的选举团会选出他们自己的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 。

original: Demand the right for the locally elected assembly to elect their own [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 要求获得在当地选举[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的权利。

original: It is time to move the control and responsibility for taxes and government budgets from the Old World into the colonies. Members will be elected annually and all propertied citizens will be eligible.
translation: 是时候将税收与预算法权从旧大陆交予殖民地了。议会议员将会每年从有产公民中选出。

original: Much of the legislative power over taxes and governmental budgets has been moved into the colonies.
translation: 大多税收与预算法权已交予殖民地.

original: The term is up for [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]. Should we ask [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] to extend his appointment for another term, or should we ask them to send a new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]?
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]的任期将满。我们应该请求[Root.ColonialParent.GetName]让他再担任一届，还是应该请他们再派来一位新的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]？

original: Ask them to send a new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: 请他们再派来一位新的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]

original: The term is up for [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]. Should we trust him with another term as [From.Monarch.GetTitle] in [From.GetName], or should we pick someone else?\n\nRepresentatives from [From.GetName] have asked us to keep [From.Monarch.GetName].
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]的任期已满，我们应该信任他再担任一届[From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle]，还是另寻他人？\n\n[From.GetName]来的使者请求我们保留[From.Monarch.GetName] 。
推出一名偏向内政的候选人
推出一名偏向外交的候选人
推出一名偏向军事的候选人

original: The term is up for [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]. Should we trust him with another term as [From.Monarch.GetTitle] in [From.GetName], or should we pick someone else?\n\nRepresentatives from [From.GetName] have asked us to send a replacement for [From.Monarch.GetName].
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 的任期将满，我们应该信任他再担任一届 [From.GetName] 的 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] ，还是寻找其他人？\n\n[From.GetName] 来的使者要求我们推出一名 [From.Monarch.GetName] 的继任者。
推出一名偏向内政的候选人
推出一名偏向外交的候选人
推出一名偏向军事的候选人

original: [From.GetName], in all their wisdom, have chosen to extend the appointment of [Root.Monarch.GetName] as [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] for another term.
translation: [From.GetName] 出于他们的考虑，选择将 [Root.Monarch.GetName] 作为 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 的任期延长一届。

original: [From.GetName], in all their wisdom, have chosen to recall [Root.Monarch.GetName] and appoint a new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] place.
translation: [From.GetName] 出于他们的考虑，选择召回 [Root.Monarch.GetName] 并任命了一位新的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 来取代 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 位置。

original: We have chosen to replace [From.Monarch.GetName] as Governor of [From.GetName]. Whom shall we appoint in [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] place?
translation: 我们已经决定撤换[From.GetName]的政府首脑[From.Monarch.GetName]。我们应该任用谁来取代[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]位置？

original: The unfortunate passing of [Root.Monarch.GetName] has forced a premature election of a new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Three primary candidates have been nominated...
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName] 不幸的去世促成了一次草草的选举。推举出了三名主要候选人。

original: Let us hope that [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] send us a good replacement...
translation: 让我们期待[Root.ColonialParent.GetName]给我们派来了一位优秀的继任者……

original: The [From.Monarch.GetTitle] of [From.GetName] has suddenly died. Who should we send to replace [From.Monarch.GetHerHim]?
translation: [From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle]突然去世了。我们应该派谁去取代[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]？

original: Our colony [From.GetName] has decided to form their own assembly in order to take control of tax legislation and budgets. They claim that these matters are better handled locally, but it seems suspiciously like a first step towards independence...
translation: 我们的殖民领[From.GetName]决定组建他们自己的议会来控制税务和财政。他们声称这些事情在当地处理更加合适，但是这看上去很像迈向独立的第一步……

original: The winds of liberty blow strong in [From.GetName]. The locally elected assembly have decided to elect their own [From.Monarch.GetTitle] from now on. Fortunately this seems to have dampened their desire for liberty. At least for the moment...
translation: 自由之风席卷了整个 [From.GetName]。当地的议会决定他们将从现在开始自行推举自己的 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] 。幸运的是，这似乎削弱了他们独立的愿望，至少是暂时...

original: With $MONARCH$ being forced out of office by the revolting factions a new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will have to be elected. As the votes are tallied there is an unusual excitement in the air. The three primary candidates are all acutely aware of the events that has transpired these last few days...
translation: 由于反叛派系迫使$MONARCH$下台，一个新的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]将被选出。随着投票统计完成之后，空气中弥漫着一种不寻常的令人激动的气氛，这三名主要候选人都清楚的意识到了这几天发生的事情……

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Grain.
translation: 我们的母国通过对谷物增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Wine.
translation: 我们的母国通过对酒类增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Wool.
translation: 我们的母国通过对羊毛增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Cloth.
translation: 我们的母国通过对布料增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Fish.
translation: 我们的母国通过对鱼类增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Fur.
translation: 我们的母国通过对毛皮增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Salt.
translation: 我们的母国通过对盐增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Naval Supplies.
translation: 我们的母国通过对海军用品增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Copper.
translation: 我们的母国通过对铜增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Iron.
translation: 我们的母国通过对铁增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Ivory.
translation: 我们的母国通过对象牙增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Tea.
translation: 我们的母国通过对茶增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Chinaware.
translation: 我们的母国通过对瓷器增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Spices.
translation: 我们的母国通过对香料增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Coffee.
translation: 我们的母国通过对咖啡增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Cotton.
translation: 我们的母国通过对棉花增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Sugar.
translation: 我们的母国通过对糖增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our motherland has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a special tariff on Tobacco.
translation: 我们的母国通过对烟草增加特别关税来加紧对我们经济的控制。

original: Our tradition of relocating villages when soils grow poor has led us to improve our construction methods. By harnessing those new methods and spreading them, we can greatly benefit.
translation: 土地贫瘠后在别处重建村庄的传统使我们的建筑技巧得到提高。通过利用与传播这些技巧，我们将受益良多。

original: If the clans within our society were each to take up a distinct role in ceremonies and everyday life, we could ensure far greater efficiency in the governing of our nation.
translation: 如果众多氏族们能在祭祀仪式和日常生活中起到重要的作用，我们应当利用它们提高国家管理的效率。

original: By using images, wampum belts and art to represent our sacred rites and ceremonies, and the great events of our history, we can ensure the continuance and stability of our society.
translation: 贝壳腰带艺术是我们文化仪式以及悠久历史的代表。通过这些艺术品，我们能确保我们社会的延续和稳定。

original: By establishing rules that govern the ways of our people, and determine how conflicts between the clans are to be resolved, we can achieve more lasting peace amongst our people.
translation: 通过制定法规来统治我们的人民，并决定如何去解决氏族冲突，我们就能够得到让人民获得长久的和平

original: By developing the roles and powers of the people who govern our nation, we can greatly enhance our ability to rule ourselves.
translation: 给国家的管理者们进行职位和权利的分工，这样可以大大提高自我管理的效率。

original: By latching pieces of wood to a platform dragged by a dog or a larger animal, we make it much easier to carry heavy burdens across great distances, even on rough and uneven terrain.
translation: 拖车由底座和几片固定在之上的木板所组成，由狗或其他大型动物拖动。这样我们就可以带着行李经过崎岖而又遥远的路途了

original: The ceremonial use of pipes and tobacco among our people is an ancient art. By using those smoke ceremonies to seal peaces and covenants, we can lend greater authority to our agreements and deals.
translation: 用烟斗和我们有着使用烟草的传统艺术。在签订合约的时候，烟草可以给我们提供更大的权威和声望。烟草是我们的传统艺术。通过大典，我们可以敲定和平协定，并让我们的协议得到更有力的推动。

original: In our dealings with other people, we have found one constant: the language of gifts and trade is universal. Leveraging trade to make ourselves invaluable to neighbors will greatly assist our relations.
translation: 在我们与他人的交往中，我们发现了一个常态：礼物和贸易的语言是通行的。利用贸易使我们显得对邻居更有价值，这将大大有助于我们的关系。

original: The regions around us are often inhabited by disorganized and isolated tribes. By having individual clans within our greater people settle in those regions, we can expand our influence to new borders.
translation: 我们周围的地区经常居住着毫无组织并且与世隔绝的部落。通过让我们中的个别部族定居在这些地区，，我们可以在新的边界上扩张影响力。

original: If we could develop a way to record our dealings in permanent form by use of symbols to represent sounds as others do, we could greatly develop our abilities to conduct trade and diplomacy.
translation: 如果我们能和别人一样使用符号系统来表示声音并记录我们的行为，就能够提高我们的贸易和外交能力。

original: The establishment of prestigious societies of warriors will encourage our young men to show greater bravery on the field of battle.
translation: 战士荣誉社会体系的建立将鼓励我们的年轻人在战场上表现出更大的勇气。

original: By using swift and stealthy strikes, we can catch our enemies unguarded, and kill many of them before they have the chance to turn on us.
translation: 利用快速及隐蔽的袭击，我们可以赶在我们的敌人没有防备之时，在他们有机会反击之前杀死他们。

original: To help increase our numbers, we should take captives from other tribes where we can, and then adopt them among our own numbers.
translation: 为了增长人口，我们要从其他部落中掠夺战俘，然后将他们同化。

original: By studying the lay of the land, we can know which trails our troops can safely follow and which trails they should seek to avoid, allowing us to minimize our losses.
translation: 通过探索这片土地，我们现在知道部队哪条路可以走，哪条路需要加以小心并加以防范，这样才能减少损耗.

original: As we encounter new tactics and weapons among our enemies and others we encounter, we must always remain flexible so that we can integrate those in our strategies.
translation: 我们遇到的敌人拥有新的战术和武器，所以我们必须保持战术的灵活性，师夷长技以制夷。

original: The time has come to shake off the last remains of our colonial past. We must form a proper nation and solidify our claims to this region.
translation: 是时候向我们的殖民地历史说再见了。我们必须建立一个真正的国家，并巩固我们对这片土地的宣称。

original: It is not enough to have expelled the barbarians who have bloodied our land. We must forever assure liberty in the country of our birth and take any hope of re-enslaving us away from the inhuman government that for so long kept us oppressed. In the end we must live independent or die.
translation: 我们驱逐了这里的野蛮人，但这还不够。我们必须永远确保自由存在于这片故土，让那些曾经奴役我们的政权彻底打消他们的念头。不自由毋宁死。

original: The time has come to shake off the last remains of our colonial past. We must form a proper nation and solidify our claims to this region.
translation: 是时候向我们的殖民地历史说再见了。我们必须建立一个真正的国家，并巩固我们对这片土地的宣称。

original: The time has come to shake off the last remains of our colonial past. We must form a proper nation and solidify our claims to this region.
translation: 是时候向我们的殖民地历史说再见了。我们必须建立一个真正的国家，并巩固我们对这片土地的宣称。

original: The time has come to shake off the last remains of our colonial past. We must form a proper nation and solidify our claims to this region.
translation: 是时候向我们的殖民地历史说再见了。我们必须建立一个真正的国家，并巩固我们对这片土地的宣称。

original: The time has come to shake off the last remains of our colonial past. We must form a proper nation and solidify our claims to this region.
translation: 是时候向我们的殖民地历史说再见了。我们必须建立一个真正的国家，并巩固我们对这片土地的宣称。

original: Long have these proud colonies been subject to the greed and oppression of the European powers, but no more! The surge of liberty in the colonies has granted us an opportunity of forming a proud federation of independent states free from tyranny. The United States of America!
translation: 长久以来这些骄傲的殖民地人民一直饱受欧洲列强的贪婪和压迫，但是再也不会继续下去了！殖民地的自由浪潮让我们得以成立一个摆脱暴政的独立联邦国家。多么令人自豪，美利坚合众国万岁！

original: Our people have endured years of foreign meddling, subjugation, incursions, and our lands divided... Enough! The time has come to liberate and unite our people under one banner, and write our own destiny. We will form a liberal nation enriched by the trade passing between the Atlantic and the Pacific oceans.
translation: 我们的人民已经忍受了外国势力多年的干涉，入侵与征服，我们的祖国也因此而四分五裂......够了！是时候吹响自由的号角并将我们的人民团结在同一旗帜下来谱写我们自己的命运了！我们将成立一个因大西洋和太平洋之间的贸易往来而富饶的自由国家。

original: The time has come to shake off the last remains of our colonial past. We must form a proper nation and solidify our claims to this region.
translation: 是时候向我们的殖民地历史说再见了。我们必须建立一个真正的国家，并巩固我们对这片土地的宣称。

original: The time has come to shake off the last remains of our colonial past. We must form a proper nation and solidify our claims to this region.
translation: 是时候向我们的殖民地历史说再见了。我们必须建立一个真正的国家，并巩固我们对这片土地的宣称。

original: The time has come to shake off the last remains of our colonial past. We must form a proper nation and solidify our claims to this region.
translation: 是时候向我们的殖民地历史说再见了。我们必须建立一个真正的国家，并巩固我们对这片土地的宣称。

original: We must leave the last of our colonial heritage behind and reform into a proper independent state. The nation of Mexico will become the protector of all of Mesoamerica!
translation: 我们必须摒弃最后的殖民地遗产，并将其改造成一个真正的独立国家。墨西哥将成为整个中美洲的保护者！

original: Our people have had to adopt a hardened frontier lifestyle in this great wilderness. We are now simply a different people than Europeans: a coarser, tougher breed of men, wilder, intermarrying with the Indian. Let us build on the trade and soil of these rich riverlands, and amaze the world with our rugged prowess.
translation: 我们的人民在这片巨大的荒野上适应了艰苦的生活。我们不再是单纯的欧洲人，在与印第安人的结合后我们变得更加狂野、粗犷。让我们沿着贸易线和这些富饶的河床建立城市，并让世界为我们的坚毅的勇气而震撼！

original: The colonial masters who wished to enslave us are gone. It is time to form a truly independent country of our own. From this day forth the watchword of Brazil will be 'Independence or Death!'
translation: 那些想奴役我们的殖民地主人已经离开。现在是时候真正成立我们自己的独立国家了。从今日起，巴西的口号将是‘独立或者灭亡！’

original: Heretic believers have been able to demand large concessions through the use of military force.
translation: 这些异教徒们已经有能力通过武力使我们作出巨大让步了。

original: A delegation from the Five Nations of the Iroquois has made the arduous oversea journey and arrived in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] intending to form an alliance with us, and have unintentionally become a sensation. Our commoners wave and cheer as they ride our streets in royal carriages and our nobles compete for the privilege of entertaining these 'Four Kings' of the Mohawks.\n\nThey cast an imposing figure, much taller than our average man and they wear black breeches, vests, and stockings and over this they all wear scarlet cloaks trimmed with gold. They have dark skin, dark eyes and fantastic tattoos like we've never seen before. They do not speak our tongue, but after an exchange of gifts they had a speech read on their behalf, asking for better relations and help against our common enemies, telling us of their plight and bringing some members of our court to tears. They have made quite an impression.
translation: 一个来自易洛魁人五个国家的联合代表团在经历了艰难的海外之旅后到达了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]来与我们建立联盟，并引起了突然的轰动。我们的民众蜂拥而出对着乘坐皇家马车的他们欢呼雀跃。我们的贵族也争相取悦这四位来自莫霍克人的国王。\n\n他们身材魁梧，身高远高于我们的平均水平，穿黑短裤，背心，长筒袜，披着猩红色的镶金斗篷。他们有黑色的皮肤和眼睛，身上的奇特纹身非常神秘，我们从未见过。他们不说我们的语言，但是在交换礼品之后发表了演讲，希望和我们保持良好关系并请求我们的帮助来对抗共同的敌人，向我们陈述他们的困境的情感真挚无比，甚至让一些宫廷成员当场流泪。他们给我们留下了非常深刻的印象。

original: Give them a chain of steel representing our unbreakable bond
translation: 赠予他们象征永不断绝的友谊的铁链。

original: Give them gifts but make no promises
translation: 给他们礼物但不作出任何承诺。

original: Give them nothing, these men are savages, not royalty
translation: 什么也不给他们，他们是未开化的蛮子，根本没有皇室的威严。

original: A priest in [Root.GetCapitalName] has translated the Bible into our language, and has started to distribute copies of it to nearby villages throughout [Root.GetName].
translation: 一位来自[Root.GetCapitalName]的牧师把圣经翻译成了我们的语言，并在[Root.GetName]周边的村庄中开始分发印刷本。

original: Heresy! Burn the priest and his books!
translation: 异端！烧死这个牧师还有他的书！

original: Great news! Spread these Bibles far and wide
translation: 好消息！让它尽量广泛的传播出去。

original: Our colony in [Root.GetName] has not been progressing as quickly as we would like. One of your advisors has, however, come up with a plan to speed up growth. They are proposing that we send thieves, debtors and other criminals to [Root.GetName] and have them pay their debts to society by working to develop the colony and eventually become settlers once their sentence is done. While this plan might seem good on paper there is a chance a rebellion may occur due to having all these dangerous individuals in a single location.
translation: 我们在[Root.GetName]的殖民进程并没与我们想象中那样快速的推进。你的一个顾问为此想了个办法来推动它。他们提议我们把小偷，赖账者和其他罪犯送到[Root.GetName]并让他们通过发展殖民地来向社会赎罪，而当他们刑满释放后就会成为殖民者。虽然这个计划看上去很不错，但把这些危险的家伙放在一起也有叛乱的风险。

original: We can't trust these people! Keep them in prison over here
translation: 我们不能相信这帮家伙！还是让他们待在监狱里吧。

original: In order to help the colony grown, thieves, debtors and other criminals have been sent here to pay their debts to society by working to develop it.
translation: 为了帮助殖民地发展，小偷、赖账者和其他罪犯被送到这里，通过开发殖民地来向社会赎罪。

original: Rumors say that sailors came back from a trip sick like hell, and the ones who didn't die onboard infested the whole city with their disease. It is time to act before the whole country dies from coughing and cold sweat.
translation: 流言传来，一群水手从一次地狱般的行程中回来了，那些没有死在船上的幸存者却将他们带来的疾病传染了整座城市。是时候在整个国度感染上咳嗽和冷汗之前采取行动了。

original: Quarantine the port and let them die!
This is not the first flu in our country, I don't care!
translation: 这不是我们国家的第一次流感，我不在乎！

original: The influenza will eventually spread to a neighboring province...
translation: 流感最终会蔓延到相邻的省份......

original: The province has been quarantined in order to stop the influenza from spreading. But the lack of help has been devastating for the province.
translation: 该省份已经被隔离来阻止流感的蔓延，但援助的缺失已经对这个省份造成毁灭性打击。

original: The province has been devastated by influenza, but efforts to ease the suffering have been made.
translation: 该省份已被流感摧毁，但已经采取措施来缓解危机。

original: Influenza has spread to [Root.GetName]! How should we handle this growing epidemic?
translation: 流感已经蔓延到[Root.GetName]！我们要怎样才能控制疫情？

original: During the reformation outbreaks of destruction of Catholic religious art occurred in various European countries. The most notorious example is "Beeldenstorm" in the Low Countries, but similar attacks occurred in Germany, Switzerland, England, Scotland, France and Livonia. The majority of attacks were carried out by spontaneous mobs, but in some countries the government took a leading role.
translation: 宗教改革期间，欧洲各国发生了破坏天主教宗教艺术品的事件。最臭名昭著的就是低地国家的圣像破坏运动。而类似的事情也出现在德意志地区，瑞士，英格兰，苏格兰，法兰西和利沃尼亚。其中主要的犯案者是自发的暴民，但在有的国家，政府在其中起到了领导作用。

original: Send guards to stop these vandals!
translation: 派卫兵去阻止这些破坏者！

original: We can't do anything except weather the storm!
translation: 除了听天由命之外我们别无他法

original: Time to take the lead and break Papal stranglehold!
translation: 是时候起来摆脱教皇的束缚了!

original: The outbreaks of destruction of Catholic religious art across the country have caused many people to flee their homes and disrupted production and trade.
translation: 全国性的对天主教信仰艺术的摧毁已使很多人逃离了家园，打乱了生产和贸易秩序.

original: The people in [Root.GetName] are too friendly with the Indians. A proposal has been put forward for a ban on all private trading with Indians, including the death penalty for anyone caught teaching an Indian how to fire a gun. This new law will injure the local economy of both the Indians and the local population but will ensure our security from armed Indian raids.
translation: [Root.GetName] 的人们对印第安人太友好了。有人提议对私人与印第安人的贸易发出禁令，教会印第安人使用枪支的人最高可被处死。这条新法规会破坏印第安人和当地移民双方的经济活动，但是可以保证我们不受印第安人的武装劫掠。

original: The crop harvest in [Root.GetName] has been very poor this year and the shortage of food is already felt across the colony. The prices are soaring and some predict a harsh winter might be coming. The nearby Indians have found out about our difficult situation and have volunteered some of their food supplies. What they brought isn't nearly enough to sustain us through the winter, but there must be more corn where the gift came from. Some propose that we send soldiers to the Indian villages and seize their food.
translation: [Root.GetName] 今年的收成很差，消息传遍了整个殖民地。粮食价格在飞速上涨，有预测说这将是一个非常寒冷的冬天。临近的印第安人察觉到了我们的窘况，捐助了我们一些事物。他们给我们的不足以支持我们过冬，但那里一定有更多的食物。有人提议我们派士兵过去抢粮食。
我们只是拿我们需要的而已
我们可以自己解决问题

original: The prices of construction are going up because skilled labor is in shortage as new colonists flowing into the colony greatly demand their services. A proposal has been put forth that a maximum wage should be set across [Root.GetName] for all carpenters, sawyers, masons and bricklayers. The price will be set at fair levels, and everyone demanding higher payment or offering to pay more for construction work would be subject to a penalty. How do we vote?
translation: 因为熟练技工的稀缺以及人口的快速涌入，供需变化导致建筑的价格逐渐上涨。有人提议为所有的木匠，伐木工，石工和瓦工设定最低工资。最低工资将会相当公平，要求或提供更高报酬的人将会受到惩罚。我们该如何选择？

original: Vote yes, it's a sound idea
We don't need to regulate that

To sustain ourselves, [Root.Owner.GetName] must seek new sources of revenue and reduce our dependence on imports. A great opportunity has presented itself though, as bog iron ore has been discovered in [Root.GetName]! The proposition is to mandate the owner to construct a furnace and a forge and immediately begin production. In exchange the owner will be guaranteed a 10-year-long tax break to subsidize the initial cost.
translation: 为了养活我们自己， [Root.Owner.GetName] 必须寻找新的收入来源，减少对于进口的依赖。现在我们有一个很好的机会，在 [Root.GetName] 的沼泽中发现了大型铁矿! 有提案要求铁矿的拥有者建设熔炉，招聘铁匠立刻开始生产。作为交换，铁矿的拥有者将获得十年的免税待遇作为初始投入的补偿。

original: The dwindling profits of the colonial trade and our reliance on imported goods are starting to hurt [Root.Owner.GetName]. We must seek economic independence from imports and for that end a new proposal has been presented. By outlawing exports of sheep and ordering more wool to be produced locally we'll ensure enough warm clothes are being offered to the colonists. For this a Textile Manufactory should be started in [Root.GetName].
translation: 殖民地贸易的利益逐渐萎缩，我们对于进口货物的依赖已经开始让 [Root.Owner.GetName] 感到困难。我们必须寻找除了进口以外的经济来源，现在有一个新的提案。通过禁止羊的出口，加大本地羊毛的生产，我们可以制造很多保暖衣物提供给殖民者。为了实现这个计划我们需要在 [Root.GetName] 建立纺织品工厂。

original: If [Root.Owner.GetName] wants to become less dependent on [Root.Owner.ColonialParent.GetName] and move towards self-sufficiency, we need to be able to secure enough salt and naval supplies. A prominent citizen living in [Root.GetCapitalName] has assured us that with a little help he could construct a new Wharf in [Root.GetName]. In exchange for his investment he asks for 10 years of subsidies.
translation: 如果 [Root.Owner.GetName] 想减少对 [Root.Owner.ColonialParent.GetName] 的依赖，能够自给自足，我们需要有能力确保食盐和海军设备的供应。一位住在 [Root.GetCapitalName] 的名人向我们承诺，只需要很少的帮助他就能在 [Root.GetName] 建设一个新码头。作为回报，他要求10年期的补贴。

original: Unlike the founders of [Root.Owner.GetName], new settlers tend to be short-sighted and put profits ahead of securing the future existence of themselves and their families. They ignore the necessity to produce food for the colony and go straight for cash crop believing that they will be able to sell it and purchase food from other farmers. If this continues, our colony will eventually face famine and disorder. To prevent this, a law enforcing that new farmers produce food in at least a part of their fields has been suggested.
translation: 不同于 [Root.Owner.GetName] 的建立者们，新的定居者们更短视，将利润置于他们和他们的家庭的未来发展之上。他们忽视食物对殖民地的重要性，更倾向于经济作物，相信从中获得的更多利益可以让他们有能力从别人手中获得粮食。如果继续下去的话，我们的殖民地最终会面临饥荒和混乱。为了避免这种局面，有人提议新的农民必须保证土地的一部分用来种植粮食。

original: When we first arrived here the prices of Tobacco were soaring, and the profits were immense. Now, as more farmers arrive and start their own plantations, the supply of Tobacco has quickly risen and caused the prices in Europe to drop year after year. A proposal has been made by established planters to ban the planting of Tobacco for one year, so prices have time to recover. New farmers are obviously opposing this proposal but we must do what we must do to protect our livelihoods.
translation: 我们刚来到这里的时候，烟草的价格飙升，利润巨大。而现在，越来越多的人来这里开种植园，烟草的产量迅速增加，于是烟草在欧洲的价钱一年比一年低。有提案建议禁止烟草种植一年，让价格重新升高。新的农场主毫无疑问会反对，但为了保住我们的生计，我们必须做点什么。

original: Settlers from another of [Root.Owner.ColonialParent.GetName]'s colonies have breached our borders! In search of resources they have expanded into land part of [Root.GetName] and gotten into conflict with the local population. This cannot be tolerated!
translation: 从 [Root.Owner.ColonialParent.GetName] 来的定居者已经越过了我们的边界！为了寻找土地和资源，他们扩张到了 [Root.GetName] 的领土，与当地的人民起了冲突。这决不能被容忍！

original: Send the local militia to drive them out!

In search of new land and resources, settlers from [Root.GetName] have ventured across the border into [From.GetName] which has caused conflicts with the local population there. [From.Owner.GetName] then sent their militia to drive them out, but their militia seems to have gone too far and their mission degenerated into a vengeful raid into [Root.GetName]. This cannot be tolerated!
translation: 为了探索新的土地和资源，来自 [Root.GetName] 的居民们探险跨越了 [From.GetName] 的边界，与当地人产生了冲突。 [From.Owner.GetName] 于是派出民兵将他们赶走了，但这些民兵好像走得太远了，反过来进入了 [Root.GetName] 进行了复仇性质的劫掠。这绝对不能容忍！

original: Send in our local militia as well!

Sending our militia to drive out the competing settlers from [From.From.GetName] might have been a mistake. Encouraged by their easy success, our troops got carried away and continued into [From.GetName], raiding the border villages there. This has greatly upset [From.Owner.GetName] and they in turn sent their militia into [From.From.GetName]...
translation: 派出民兵赶走来自 [FromFrom.GetName] 的定居者们可能是一个错误。受到最初胜利的影响，我们的部队继续前进并进入了 [From.GetName] ,劫掠了当地的边界村镇。这极大地激怒了 [From.Owner.GetName] ，他们也派出了他们的民兵进入了 [FromFrom.GetName] ...

original: Sigh... where to begin? It seems that settlers from [From.Owner.GetName] has ventured into [From.From.GetName] - a province of [From.From.Owner.GetName] - in search of new land and resources. [From.From.Owner.GetName] then sent their militia to drive them out, but they got overzealous and pursued the settlers back into [From.GetName], raiding and burning. The conflict then escalated when [From.Owner.GetName] sent their militia to drive out the [From.From.Owner.GetAdjective] militia and carry out raids of their own into [From.From.GetName]...\n\nThe [From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] of [From.From.Owner.GetName], [From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetName], is blaming the [From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] of [From.Owner.GetName], [From.Owner.Monarch.GetName], and vice versa. How do we solve this without losing face?
translation: 哎... 怎么说呢？好像来自 [From.Owner.GetName] 的居民冒险进入了 [From.From.GetName] - [From.From.Owner.GetName] 一个省份 - 为了寻找新的土地和资源。 [From.From.Owner.GetName] 于是派出民兵将他们赶了出来，但这些过于激动的民兵将他们赶回了 [From.GetName] ，并进行了劫掠和放火。这场冲突之后升级， [From.Owner.GetName] 派出民兵赶走 [From.From.Owner.GetAdjective] 的民兵，也在 [From.From.GetName] 进行了劫掠...\n\n[From.From.Owner.GetName] 的 [From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] ， [From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetName] ,责备了 [From.Owner.GetName] 的 [From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] ，[From.Owner.Monarch.GetName] ，反过来也是如此。我们如何体面地解决这件事？

original: Let them sort it out themselves

In the recent conflict along the border between [From.From.From.GetName] and [From.From.GetName], [From.GetName] has taken the side of [From.From.Owner.GetName]! [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has decided to blame [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] for the incident and has dismissed [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 在最近[From.From.From.GetName]和[From.From.GetName]的边界冲突中，[From.GetName]选择站在[From.From.Owner.GetName]一边！[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]因为此事责备了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]，并解雇了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]。

original: In the recent conflict along the border between [From.From.From.GetName] and [From.From.GetName], [From.GetName] has taken our side! [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has decided to blame [From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetName] for the incident and has dismissed [From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 在最近[From.From.From.GetName]和[From.From.GetName]的边界冲突中，[From.GetName]选择站在我们这边！[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]因为此事责备了[From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle][From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetName]，并解雇了[From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHim]。

original: In the recent conflict along the border between [From.From.From.GetName] and [From.From.GetName], [From.GetName] has taken the side of [From.From.From.Owner.GetName]! [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has decided to blame [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] for the incident and has dismissed [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 在最近[From.From.From.GetName]和[From.From.GetName]的边界冲突中，[From.GetName]选择站在[From.From.From.Owner.GetName]一边！[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]因为此事责备了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]，并解雇了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]。

original: In the recent conflict along the border between [From.From.From.GetName] and [From.From.GetName], [From.GetName] has taken our side! [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has decided to blame [From.From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetName] for the incident and has dismissed [From.From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 在最近[From.From.From.GetName]和[From.From.GetName]的边界冲突中，[From.GetName]选择站在我们这边！[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]因为此事责备了[From.From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle][From.From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetName]，并解雇了[From.From.From.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHim]。

original: The assembly has proposed that we set aside substantial resources to enhance our militia. The colony needs better protection from native attacks and raids from other colonies. It will also strengthen us if we at some point should find ourselves at war with [Root.ColonialParent.GetName].
translation: 最近的会议提议我们大幅拨款来提高民兵水准。面对原住民的攻击以及其他殖民地的劫掠，我们需要更好的自我保护。如果我们与 [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] 进入了战争，这些民兵也可以起到作用。.

original: Settlers in [Root.GetName] are complaining that there are still natives living in parts of the province. This land could be used more effectively if settled and cultivated. They suggest we purchase this land from the local natives.
translation: [Root.GetName]的定居者抱怨该省份仍然生活着原住民。如果有了更多的人民，更好地利用土地，这里可以变得更繁荣。有人建议我们从原住民手上购买土地。

original: To be able to compete with other colonies we must sustain the growth of [Root.GetName]. The natives in a neighboring province have proved willing to sell their lands to us. This seems like an ideal solution.
translation: 为了有能力和其他殖民地竞争，我们必须保持[Root.GetName]的增长。邻省的原住民有意向将他们的土地卖给我们，这听起来不错。

original: A small group of Natives, long since pacified and now decimated by warfare and disease, are seeking to live under the protection of our colony. Though they are few, they can still be of some assistance to us with their knowledge of local ways, and are willing to help us in return for our protection of their village in [Root.GetName]. But their native enemies would look poorly on us...
translation: 有一个因战争和疾病急剧缩小的原住民部落，正在寻求我们殖民地的保护。尽管他们力量弱小，但他们仍然能够通过对这片土地的丰富了解来帮助我们来换取我们对他们在[Root.GetName]的村庄的保护。但是这会降低我们在他们敌人眼中的评价...

original: News of native assaults on our people along the frontiers have spread across the colony. Reasoning that all natives are somehow allied and cannot in any event be trusted, an angry armed mob has descended on the peaceful remnant of the Mahican living in [Root.GetName]. Only a handful, the very last of their people, remains, and the mob, against whom no one will testify, remains at large...
translation: 原住民在边境上对我们攻击的消息已经传遍了整个殖民地。所有的原住民之间都有盟约，所以他们绝对不能被信任。一队武装暴徒突然袭击了住在[Root.GetName]的平和的莫希干村落，只有少数的人还在那里，那群暴徒干了什么，也没有人能够证明……

original: Protect the remnant at all cost
translation: 不惜代价保护剩下的人

original: Years ago, we granted our protection to the last remnant of the Mahican tribe. In the years since, disease and war have made further ravages, until at last only one remained - the last of his people. He was a faithful ally, guiding our people in battle and helping our colonists, but the laws of life are harsh, and now he too, has passed on. With him die not only a man, but a people and a way of life.
translation: 很多年前，我们向莫希干残余部落提供了保护。从那之后，疾病和战争带来了更多的破坏，到现在只剩下最后一个人了。他是我们忠实的盟友，指导我们作战，帮助我们定居。但生命是残酷的，他现在已经过世了。随着他的死亡，一种生活哲学随着这个人，这个部落，一起消失了。

original: The last remnants of the Mahican tribe have found refuge in our province.
translation: 最后的莫希干遗民在我们这里找到了避难所。

original: More resources have been given to enhance our militia.
translation: 调配了更多资源来建设民兵
派出我们在当地的民兵

original: Settlers from a neighboring province have crossed the border in search of new lands and resources.
translation: 邻省来的外国殖民者跨越了我们的边界来寻找新的土地和资源。

original: The raids by the local militia in a neighboring province have damaged the province.
translation: 来自邻省的民兵劫掠并破坏了我们的土地。

original: The raids by the local militia in a neighboring province have severely damaged the province.
translation: 来自铃声的民兵劫掠并严重地破坏了我们的土地。

original: This law hurts the local economy of both the Indians and the whites but will ensure our security from armed Indian raids.
translation: 这条法律破坏了印第安人和白人双方的经济，但是可以保护我们免受印第安人的武装劫掠。

original: To keep escalating prices down, a maximum wage for construction has been put into place.
translation: 为了让飙升的价格稳定下来，我们实行了建筑工人最低工资法案。

original: The owners of the local ore mines have been given a tax break.
translation: 铁矿的矿主将拥有一段时间的免税期。

original: The owners of the local wharf have been given a tax break.
translation: 码头的主人将拥有一段时间的免税期。

original: The planting of tobacco has been banned for a year in order to enable prices to increase.
translation: 一年内禁止烟草种植以提高价格。

original: One of our neighbors is ruthlessly oppressing their minority of Reformed followers. These poor souls wish to escape the persecution and settle in our border province [Root.GetName]. Allowing this would benefit our economy but greatly upset our neighbor...
translation: 我们的邻居残酷地镇压国内的改革宗信徒。这些可怜人希望逃脱迫害，在我们的边界省份[Root.GetName]定居下来。允许他们定居会改善我们的经济，但会很大程度上激怒我们的邻居……

original: Many Reformed heretics in [Root.GetName] have fled across the border hoping to find a safe haven in [From.GetName]. Allegedly, this was carried out with the tacit sanction of the government of [From.Owner.GetName].
translation: [Root.GetName]的许多改革宗信徒穿越边境逃至[From.GetName]寻找容身之所。据称，这是在[From.Owner.GetName]政府的默许和帮助下完成的。

original: Many within the church are of the opinion that we, as a leading Reformed nation, should send our ministers abroad to ensure that the true reformation continues to spread.
translation: 许多神职人员认为，我们作为改革宗的领导者，应当派出外交官来确保正确的信仰改革宗的持续传播。
在国内闷声发大财比较好

original: There are reports of ministers preaching the Reformed faith have turned up in [Root.GetName]. They appear to come from [From.GetName] in order to encourage the local population to resist and fight back against our attempts to root out this heresy.
