translation: 据称有人在[Root.GetName]宣传改革宗信仰。他们似乎来自[From.GetName]，使得我们清除异端的努力受到了顽强的抵抗。

original: Reformed theologians believe that only those who are predestined to be saved can be saved. But since it is impossible to know who is predestined, a notion has developed that it might be possible to discern that a person is predestined by observing their way of life. As hard work, frugality, social success and wealth are thought to be important consequences of being predestined, it seems to inspire followers of the Reformed faith to strive for reaching them, as well as attracting those who already possess them - like burghers and merchants.
translation: 改革宗的神学家们认为只有那些命中注定被拯救的人才能被拯救。可是我们不知道谁是命中注定的人，有观点认为我们可以通过一个人的行为方式判断他他是否有机会。勤奋，节俭，社交和财富被视为被选中的重要条件，这似乎激励了改革宗信徒们去遵循这些品质，并羡慕那些已经拥有的人们 - 例如城市中产阶级和商人。

original: Leading theologists are of the opinion that music shouldn't be used in religious sermons. They believe that it distracts people from the matter of importance - worship and seeking knowledge of God - and thus favor the ban of musical instruments in churches.
translation: 神学领袖们表示音乐不应该用于教会布道。他们认为这会让人们在崇拜和聆听神的过程中分心。所以他们认为应在在教堂中禁止乐器。

original: [Root.GetName] has seen outbreaks of religious violence as mobs of Reformed followers vandalize churches and destroy Catholic religious art. The Catholic majority in [Root.GetName] demand that the government immediately take action.
translation: [Root.GetName]爆发了宗教暴动。信奉加尔文宗的暴民破坏了教堂，摧毁了其中的天主教宗教艺术品。[Root.GetName]中信奉天主教的人民要求政府立即采取措施。

original: Religious persecution of the Reformed minority has led to many of them fleeing across the border in hope of finding a safe haven.
translation: 对少数派加尔文宗的迫害导致其中的许多人穿越边境寻找避难所。

original: A neighboring country has sent ministers to the province to ensure that the Reformed faith continues to spread.
translation: 邻国派传教士到该省份确保改革宗得以传播。

original: Hard work, social success and wealth are considered consequences of being predestined, and so inspire people to reach those goals.
translation: 勤奋，热衷社交和财富被认为是被选中的表现。这鼓励了人民去接近这些目标。

original: As to not distract people from the matters at hand during sermons, musical instruments have been banned in churches.
translation: 为了使人们在听布道时不分心，教堂乐器被禁止。
君士坦丁堡的陷落音乐包

original: Land was liberated from non-HRE member.
translation: 解放了被非帝国成员占领的领土。

original: A larger type of frigate, carrying additional guns.
translation: 大护卫舰，可以装载更多的火力。

original: The war galley carries the same number of guns as a normal galley but has a larger hull.
translation: 加里奥和普通桨帆船火力相同，但具有更大的船体。

original: The galiot used both sails and oars to navigate, and carried up to fifteen guns.
translation: 加里奥同时使用船帆和桨控制方向，可以携带十五门火炮。

original: A fast and highly maneuverable ship, favored by both merchants and for military use.
translation: 快速高机动船只，在商用和军用中都深受欢迎。

original: A slow but reliable cargo ship, built wide, compact, and with good stowage.
translation: 速度慢但可靠的货船，船身宽，结实，载货量大。

original: §Y$WHO$§! is the overlord of the march §Y$TARGET$§!.
The government of $WHO$ doesn't allow this action.
A subject can't sign a treaty of Support for Independence with its overlord.
translation: 属国不能签订与其宗主签订保证独立条约。

original: A subject cannot receive support for independence while it has a truce with its overlord.
translation: 属国与宗国停战时不能被他国支持独立。

original: - You already have this policy enabled.
translation: 你已经启用了这一政策.

original: This costs $COST|Y$ $TYPE$ each month to maintain.
Increases Goods Produced in foreign provinces where the country has trade power.
translation: 增加本国拥有贸易竞争力的国外领土的商品产出。

original: This factor increases the quantity of domestically produced goods in our provinces.
translation: 该因素极大的提高了国内生产总值

original: The higher this factor is, the longer it takes for our envoys to travel to and from the missions we send them on.
translation: 该要素值越高，我们的使节就要花费越多时间在往返任务地点的路程上。

original: This impacts how quickly we get new siege phases when besieging a hostile fortification. The higher Siege Ability we have, the better. It also reduces damage taken when assaulting enemy garrisons.
translation: 这决定了我们获得新的围城阶段所需的时间，所以拥有的围城能力越强越好，这也会降低强攻敌人时的收到的伤害。
战争中自动提高维护费

original: If this is enabled, your army and fleet maintenance will automatically be raised, and your forts will be activated, when you enter a war.\n
translation: 如果启用这个选项，当你进入战争状态时你的陆军和海军维护费将自动提高，要塞也将被激活。\n

original: Any drilling armies will also stop drilling.\n
translation: 所有操练中的军队也会停止操练。\n

original: If this is enabled, you will also see the revolts in your subject nations.
translation: 该项如果开启，你将会看到你的属国的叛军。

original: These are your subject's rebels, we cannot negotiate with them.
translation: 这些是你属国的叛军，你不能与他们进行谈判。

original: A policy must be enacted for at least §Y$YEARS$§! years until it can be repealed. This policy can be repealed at §Y$DATE$§!.\n
translation: 一项政策在它可以被替换之前至少必须施行 §Y$YEARS$§! 年，这项政策可以在 §Y$DATE$§! 被替换。\n

original: Are you sure that you wish to repeal §Y$NAME$§!?
They currently have no active policies.
translation: 他们当前没有启用任何政策。

original: When fully unlocked, this idea group gives access to the following policies, each depending on another Idea Group finished as well.
translation: 当被完全解锁时，这一理念组将会提供以下政策，同时每项政策还依赖于另一个完全解锁的理念组。

original: There are no possible policies to enact right now. You can unlock policies to enact by completing idea groups.
translation: 现在没有可以制定的政策，你可以通过完成理念组解锁政策。

original: You can only add provinces on the European Continent
translation: 您只能在欧洲大陆上添加新的省份

original:
This fleet will add §Y$POW$§! trade power to §Y$NODE$§!.
This will increase our trade value from §Y$CURRENTINCOME$§!¤ to §Y$INCOME$§!¤ (§Y$INCOMEDIFFERENCE$§!¤ gain), while this fleet costs §R$MAIN$§!¤ in maintenance.
Total change will be $PROFIT$¤ $DIR$.
translation:
这支舰队会增加§Y$NODE$§!节点§Y$POW$§!的贸易竞争力。
这将使我们的贸易额从§Y$CURRENTINCOME$§!¤增加至§Y$INCOME$§!¤（增加了§Y$INCOMEDIFFERENCE$§!¤），同时这支舰队会消耗§R$MAIN$§!¤来进行维护。
总变动将是$PROFIT$¤的$DIR$。

original: We expect to have enough power to do it at §Y$DATE$§!.
translation: 我们预计将在§Y$DATE$§!拥有足够点数来完成它。

original: We do not currently have any Military Power Monthly Increase.
translation: 当前我们的每月军事点数增长陷入停滞。

original: Starts the construction of a canal in $WHERE$.
By setting $NAME$ as a rival, you will announce to the world that they are your rival. $EFF$\n Are you sure?
translation: 通过设定$NAME$为宿敌，你将向全世界宣告他们为你的宿敌。$EFF$\n你确定吗？

original: Removing $NAME$ as a rival will cost you §Y$COST$§!£dip .\n Are you sure?
translation: 移除您的宿敌$NAME$将会花费您 §Y$COST$§! £dip£。\n您确定吗？

original: By setting $NAME$ as a rival, you will announce to the world that they are your rival. $EFF$\n Additionally, removing $OLDRIVAL$ as a rival will cost you §Y$COST$§!£dip .\n Are you sure?
translation: 通过设定$NAME$为宿敌，你将向全世界宣告他们为你的宿敌。$EFF$\n而且，移除宿敌$OLDRIVAL$需要§Y$COST$§!£dip£。\n你确定吗？

original: They view us as a rival, so we cannot ally.
translation: 他们将我们视为宿敌，所以我们不能与他们结盟。
不能将省份出售给宿敌。

original: They view us as a rival, so we cannot sell provinces to them.
translation: 他们将我们视为宿敌，所以我们不能将省份出售给他们。

original: You cannot sell ships if you don't have any.
translation: 在没有船只时无法出售船只。

original: §R- You cannot add a rival while at war.§!
translation: §R- 不能在战争期间添加宿敌。§!

original: §R- You cannot remove a rival while at war.§!
translation: §R- 不能在战争期间移除宿敌。§!

original: §R- You have recently added §Y$NAME$§! as a rival, so cannot replace them until §Y$DATE$§!.§!
translation: §R- 最近刚将§Y$NAME$§!设为宿敌，§Y$DATE$§!前不能将其移除。§!

original: §R- You do not have the §Y$COST$§!£dip that is required to remove a rival.§!
translation: §R- 没有足够的§Y$COST$§!£dip£来移除宿敌。§!

original: §R- You were recently forced to remove §Y$NAME$§! as a rival and cannot re-add them until §Y$DATE$§!.§!
translation: §R- 最近刚将宿敌§Y$NAME$§!移除，§Y$DATE$§!前不能重新设其为宿敌。§!

original: If you have at least $MAX$ power projection you gain:\n
translation: 如果力量投射达到$MAX$点你将获得：\n

original: \nDue to having at least $VAL|Y$ power projection:\n

If you have at least $MAX$ power projection you gain
 +1 £adm£
 +1 £dip£
 +1 £mil£
translation:
如果力量投射达到$MAX$点你将获得
 +1 £adm£
 +1 £dip£
 +1 £mil£

original: \nDue to having at least $VAL|Y$ power projection:

Triumph over your rivals to gain power projection:
§Y- Enter a war against them.
- Take their provinces or vassalize them.
- Insult or humiliate them.
- Support rebels in their lands.
- Embargo their merchants.§!
translation:
打击你的宿敌来获得力量投射：
§Y- 参加针对他们的战争。
- 夺取他们的省份或附庸他们。
- 侮辱或羞辱他们。
- 在他们领土上支持叛军。
- 对他们贸易禁运。§!

original: It's not possible to detach ships while retreating.
translation: 无法在船只升级时分离船只。

original: All the ships are already up to date.
translation: 所有的船只已是最新型号。

original: This would detach all the ships since they are all outdated.
translation: 这将分离所有过时的船只。

original: We receive no spoils of war.
translation: 我们在这场战争中没有任何获益

original: Do you wish to start following $NAME|Y$ as your new god?
translation: 您确定将信仰新的神祇$NAME|Y$？

original: Do you wish to add $NAME|Y$ to the $ASPECTS_SHORT$ of your church? It will cost us $COST$ Church Power
translation: 你确定要将 $NAME|Y$ 添加到你的教会 $ASPECTS_SHORT$ 吗? 这会花费我们 $COST$ 教会力量

original: Do you wish to apply the $ASPECTS_SHORT$ $NAME|Y$? It will cost us $COST$ Church Power
translation: 你希望采用$ASPECTS_SHORT$$NAME|Y$吗? 这会消耗我们$COST$点教会力量

original: Do you wish to remove $NAME|Y$ from the $ASPECTS_SHORT$ of your church?
translation: 你确定要将 $NAME|Y$ 从你的教会 $ASPECTS_SHORT$ 中移除吗?

original: It will cause a $COST$ loss to stability.
You cannot convert the culture of a province that has separatism.
translation: 您不能在有分离主义的省份内转变文化。

original: $WHAT$ cannot be removed from a province as long as $WHO$ exists as a nation.
translation: $WHAT$不能从省份内移除，因为$WHO$尚未灭亡。

original: Your National Focus is currently set to §Y$POWER$§!, adding §G+$VAL$§! to that power each month.
translation: 您的国家焦点已设为§Y$POWER$§!，该点数每月增加§G+$VAL$§!。

original: You currently do not have a National Focus set.
translation: 您现在没有设置国家焦点。

original: Your National Focus is currently set to another power, reducing your §Y$POWER$§! by §R$VAL$§! each month.
translation: 您的国家焦点已设为其他的方面,每月降低您的§Y$POWER$§!至§R$VAL$§!。

original: Click to change your National Focus to §Y$POWER$§!, adding §G+$VAL$§! to that power each month but reducing the other two by §R$OTHERVAL$§! each month.
translation: 点击将国家焦点改为§Y$POWER$§!，每月为此增加§G+$VAL$§!但是减少其他两项的§R$OTHERVAL$§!。

original: Click to remove your National Focus from §Y$POWER$§!.
translation: 点击将您的国家焦点从§Y$POWER$§!移除。

original: §RYou can only change your National Focus every §Y$YEARS$§! years, you will be able to change it again on §Y$DATE$§!.§!
translation: §R每§Y$YEARS$§!年只能改变一次你的国家焦点，§Y$DATE$§!后才能再次改变国家焦点。§!

original: They are a subject of one of our subjects, so we can't declare war on them directly.
translation: 他们是我们的属国之一，所以我们无法直接对他们宣战。

original: You cannot select a deity while in regency.
translation: 您无法在摄政议会期间选择神祇。

original: You cannot select a cult while in regency.
translation: 您无法在摄政议会期间选择祭祀图腾

original: Add all eligible provinces to the Trade Company.
translation: 添加所有符合条件的省份至贸易公司。

original: You don't have any applicable provinces.
translation: 您没有符合条件的省份。

original: Your maximum tolerance towards Heathens is §Y$MAX$§!.
translation: 你对异教的最大容忍度是§Y$MAX$§!。

original: Your maximum tolerance towards Heretics is §Y$MAX$§!.
translation: 你对异端的最大容忍度是§Y$MAX$§!。

original: In this type of Monarchy the heir will be selected by the Sejm.
translation: 这种君主制下继承人会由色姆议会选举而产生。

original: There will be no more chances to end the stagnation.
translation: 我们不再有任何机会结束萧条

original: There might be more chances later on.
translation: 以后也许会有更多机会。

original: The Polish Nobles are up in arms against the attempt at curtailing their rights.
translation: 波兰贵族已经拿起武器来反对削弱贵族权利的企图。

original: $WHO$ running a deficit while having loans
translation: $WHO$因为要偿还贷款的利息而入不敷出

original: $WHO$ having a debt bigger than $VAL|Y$ years of income
Not possible to send gifts due to $REASON$.
translation: 因为$REASON$，所以不能送出礼物。

original: Not possible to offer loans due to $REASON$.
translation: 因为$REASON$，所以不能提供贷款。

original: Not possible to send subsidies due to $REASON$.
translation: 因为$REASON$，所以不能发出资助。

original: Not possible to rent condottieri due to $REASON$.
translation: 因为$REASON$，所以不能雇佣佣兵。

original: Not possible to sell provinces due to $REASON$.
translation: 因为$REASON$，所以不能出售省份。

original: They must have at least one core province that is close enough for us to core.
translation: 他们必须至少拥有一个和我们足够近的核心省份来让我们进行核心化。

original: Recent advances in glazes, painting techniques, and pottery-making have resulted in a product that many experts claim is perfection.
translation: 近期上釉、画瓷与制胎工艺的进步造就了这么一个令诸多专家啧啧称奇的佳作。

original: You do not have enough Administrative Power to create a trade post. This costs §Y$POWER$§!£adm to do.
translation: 你没有足够的行政点数建立贸易站。需要 §Y$POWER$§! £adm 。

original: As $NODE$ is the node of our Main Trade City, we cannot create a trade post here.
translation: 因为$NODE$是我们贸易本埠的节点,所以我们无法在这里建立贸易站

original: This province has a $NAME$, so it cannot be home to a mere trade post.
translation: 该省份有一个$NAME$,因此它不能成为贸易站所在地

original: $NAME$ is not a fully developed province, we cannot create a trade post here.
translation: $NAME$尚未完全开发,因此我们不能在这里建立贸易站

original: $NAME$ is not our core, so we cannot create a trade post here.
translation: $NAME$不是我们的核心领土，因而我们不能在这里建立贸易站。

original: This province has a Trading Post, which will help control trade in the region.
translation: 该省份有一个贸易站,它将帮助我们控制当地的贸易

original: We already have a Trading Post in $NODE|Y$, located in $NAME|Y$.
translation: 我们已经在$NODE|Y$建立了一个贸易站,它位于$NAME|Y$

original: You need to own and control $NAME|Y$ to create a Trading Post in it.
translation: 你需要拥有并控制$NAME|Y$才能在当地建立贸易站。

original: Creating a Trading Post in $NAME$ will have the following effects there:\n$EFFECTS$
translation: 在$NAME$建立贸易站将会得到以下效果：\n$EFFECTS$

original: Creating a Trading Post will cost §Y$COST$§! $TYPE$ power, and have the following effects there:\n$EFFECTS$
translation: 建立贸易站将花费§Y$COST$§!$TYPE$的点数，并将得到以下效果：\n$EFFECTS$

original: Only a merchant republic can create a trading post.
translation: 只有商业共和国能建立贸易站

original: Representing the Artisans and Master Craftsmen inhabiting our cities that have banded together in Guilds for mutual economic gain and assistance. Their main concern is the economic well-being of the cities.
translation: 行会代表的是居住在我们的城市里，为了共同经济利益和协作而联合起来的能工巧匠们。他们主要关心的是城市的经济福祉。

original: Representing the Merchants and Ship Captains that are the lifeblood of the Republic's trade. Their main concern is the control of lucrative maritime trade routes.
translation: 商人代表的是经商者和船长们，他们是共和国的贸易命脉。他们主要关心的是对富庶的海上商路的控制。

original: Representing the aristocratic Patrician families that dominate the political life in the capital. Their main concern is ensuring that the Republic is victorious in war and achieves the glory that they view as their own.
translation: 贵族代表的是执首都政治牛耳的豪族们。他们主要关心的是共和国能否百战不殆并达到他们所期望的荣光。
直到$WHEN|Y$我们的间谍网络将持续衰退。\n

original: In an elective monarchy, as the heir changes constantly, it's not possible to make the heir into a commander.
translation: 在选王制国家中,因为继承人会不断变换,所以无法让继承人成为将领。

original: Do you wish to send our diplomat to back a candidate from our dynasty to get on the throne in §Y$COUNTRY$§W?\nEach month the diplomat will improve the standing of our candidate, depending heavily on our diplomatic reputation. If this heir becomes the ruler, we will get 2 years of power from that ruler, as well as prestige.
translation: 你是否希望派遣外交官前往§Y$COUNTRY$§W支持来自我们王朝的一位候选人获得该国的王位？\n外交官会在每个月加强我们的候选人的支持，而这极大依赖于我国的外交威望。如果这位继承人顺利成为统治者，那么我们将获得与该君主两年所获相当的点数以及威望。

original: Do you wish to recall our diplomat who is backing a candidate for the throne of §Y$COUNTRY$§W?\nWhen he stops working, that candidate will not gain any further standing.
translation: 你是否希望召回我们的外交官,他正在支持一位候选人获得§Y$COUNTRY$§W的王位？\n当他停止工作,该候选人将不再继续获得支持

original: Support a member of our dynasty as heir to their throne.
translation: 支持我们王朝的一位成员成为他们国家王位的继承人

original: Stop supporting a member of our dynasty as heir to their throne.
translation: 停止支持我们王朝的一位成员成为他们国家王位的继承人

original: We are already supporting an heir in $WHO$.
translation: 我们已经在$WHO$支持继承人

original: But we are not supporting an heir in $WHO$.
translation: 但是我们没有在$WHO$支持继承人

original: Our candidate will have a §Y$CHANCE$§! chance to gain §G+1§! support each month. Improving diplomatic reputation and relations with the country will increase this chance.
translation: 我们的候选人每个月将有§Y$CHANCE$§!的几率获得§G+1§!的支持。提升外交威望或与该国的关系将增加这一几率。

original: Our candidate currently has a §Y$CHANCE$§! chance to gain §G+1§! support each month.
translation: 目前,我们的候选人每个月有§Y$CHANCE$§!的几率获得§G+1§!的支持

original: We currently have no local noble to back as our heir.
translation: 我们目前没有地方贵族能成为继承人

original: We are not an elective monarchy
You need at least §Y$VAL$§! prestige to back a local noble as your heir.
translation: 你需要需要§Y$VAL$§!点威望才能支持一位地方贵族成为你的继承人。

original: Increase support for $NAME|Y$ by $SUPPORT|Y$ as heir, by spending $COST|R$ prestige.
translation: 通过消耗$COST|R$威望增加$SUPPORT|Y$对$NAME|Y$当继承人的支持。

original: The uprising progress must be at least $AMOUNT|0$%.
translation: 起义的进度必须至少达到$AMOUNT|0$%。

original: You need $AMOUNT$ £mil£ to use harsh treatment on $NAME$.
We expect to be able to convert at $DATE|Y$.\n
translation: 我们预计在$DATE|Y$能使当地皈依\n

original: We expect to be able to change our Syncretic Faith at $DATE|Y$.\n
translation: 我们预计在$DATE|Y$能改变兼容宗教\n

original: This will allow $ACTOR$ fleets to be based in $RECIPIENT$ ports and will also extend $ACTOR$ trading range.
translation: 这将允许$ACTOR$的舰队驻扎在$RECIPIENT$的港口里并将延伸$ACTOR$的贸易范围

original: This will allow $RECIPIENT$ fleets to be based in $ACTOR$ ports and will also extend $RECIPIENT$ trading range.
translation: 这将允许$RECIPIENT$的舰队驻扎在$ACTOR$的港口里并将延伸$RECIPIENT$的贸易范围

original: This leader is already assigned to $NAME|Y$.
We have stopped collecting War Taxes.
translation: 我们已经停止征收战争税

original: Would you like to renew the war taxes?
translation: 你是否希望继续征收战争税

original: Should we continue to influence them, for another $MONTHS$ months?\nThis would cost us $COST|Y$¤.
translation: 我们是否要继续影响他们$MONTHS$月？\n这将让我们花费$COST|Y$¤

original: The fleet is mothballing and cannot be upgraded. It would cost $COST$¤ to upgrade $AMOUNT$ ships.
translation: 这支舰队正被封存因而无法升级。我们要花费$COST$¤去升级$AMOUNT$艘船

original: Do you wish to delete the template $NAME|Y$?
translation: 你是否希望撤销该编制$NAME|Y$？

original: You cannot send privateers to trade nodes that have nations you have a truce with where you lost the war. To send privateers the truce needs to expire or the nation's trade power needs to be less than $TRADEPOWER|%0$ in the trade node.
translation: 你不能劫掠曾击败你且停战协议还未到期的国家控制的贸易节点。只有休战期满或是该国在贸易节点中的贸易份额低于$TRADEPOWER|%0$时才能派送海盗。

original: $NATION$ has $TRADEPOWER|%0R$ Trade Power and the truce expires on $DATE|Y$.
translation: $NATION$拥有$TRADEPOWER|%0R$的贸易份额并且维持休战到$DATE|Y$。

original: You cannot build ships to reach it either.
translation: 同时你也无法建造船只到达当地。

original: The debate will continue until at least $DATE|Y$, after which it has a §Y$CHANCE$%§! chance of ending each month.\nLosing it will cost us $PRESTIGE|R$ prestige.
translation: 这次辩论将持续至少$DATE|Y$天，此后每月将有§Y$CHANCE$%§!的几率结束。\n输掉辩论将使我们丢失$PRESTIGE|R$威望。

original:
The total development of our provinces is $DEV|Y$, based on:
 $TAX|Y$ Base Tax
 $PRODUCTION|Y$ Production
 $MANPOWER|Y$ Manpower
We have $PROVS|Y$ provinces and $HOME|Y$ non-overseas cores.
translation:
我们省份的总发展度是$DEV|Y$，基于：
$TAX|Y$税基
$PRODUCTION|Y$生产力
$MANPOWER|Y$人力
拥有$PROVS|Y$个省份且$HOME|Y$个为非海外核心。

original:
The total development of their provinces is $DEV|Y$, based on:
 $TAX|Y$ Base Tax
 $PRODUCTION|Y$ Production
 $MANPOWER|Y$ Manpower
$WHO$ have $PROVS|Y$ provinces and $HOME|Y$ non-overseas cores.
translation:
他们省份的总发展度是$DEV|Y$，基于：
$TAX|Y$税基
$PRODUCTION|Y$生产力
$MANPOWER|Y$人力
$WHO$拥有$PROVS|Y$个省份且$HOME|Y$个为非海外核心。

original: Authority changes by $CHANGE$ every year due to:\n
translation: 权威值每年变化$CHANGE$，原因如下：\n

original: Authority is a measure of the spiritual power and stature of the $MONARCHTITLE$. When Authority reaches §Y100§!, we will be able to enact religious reforms. Authority increases from owning a large number of provinces, and goes down when provinces are granted autonomy.
translation: 权威值是衡量灵魂力量的程度以及$MONARCHTITLE$的声望。当权威达到§Y100§!时,我们将能推行宗教改革。权威会因拥有大量省份而上升并会因给予省份自治而下降

original: Doom changes by $CHANGE$ every year due to:\n
translation: 末日值每年变化$CHANGE$，原因如下：\n

original: If Doom reaches §Y100§!, we will have no choice but to sacrifice our ruling family, casting our nation into chaos.
translation: 当末日值到达§Y100§!时，我们将别无选择只能献祭我们的王室家族，将国家带入混乱之中.

original: Our people believe that the world will come to an end unless our gods are strong enough to prevent it. By §Ywinning battles, occupying provinces and sacrificing the rulers and heirs of our subjects§! we can acquire captives to sacrifice, giving strength to the gods and ensuring that doomsday never arrives.
translation: 我们的人民坚信末日终将来临除非我们的神灵足够强大能阻止它。通过§Y赢得战役,占领省份以及献祭我们的附庸的统治者和继承人§!我们能获取用以献祭的俘虏,从而为神灵奉献出力量并确保末日不会来临

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Kizilirmak strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制克孜勒河这条重要的河的河口将巩固我们对当地贸易的控制

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Menderes strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制门德雷斯河这条重要的河的河口将巩固我们对当地贸易的控制

original: §RYou do not fulfill all requirements for unlocking this idea:§!\n
translation: §R未满足解锁这一理念组的所有要求：§!\n

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§! is reduced to a size of §Y$NUM$§! provinces.
You must have at least §Y50§! aggressive expansion opinion penalty towards a country to join a coalition against them.
translation: 你对目标国家需要至少§Y50§!点侵略扩张态度的惩罚才能加入针对他们的包围网。

original: \n\n§RCan't pick another idea group in the $CATEGORY$ category right now. At most $MAX$% of your current idea groups may be in the same category to be able to pick another idea group of that category.§!
translation: \n\n§R现在无法选取$CATEGORY$类别中的另一理念组。你最多只能有$MAX$%的理念来自同一类型才能在该类型中选另一个理念§!

original: You have §Y$NAME$§! and can explore everywhere.
translation: 你拥有§Y$NAME$§!并且能在全球各地探索。

original: You don't yet have the idea §Y$NAME$§! and can't explore across the high seas.
translation: 你尚未拥有§Y$NAME$§!理念组，无法穿过外海探索。

original: Number of Custom Nations is less than $VAL|Y$.
translation: 自定义国家的数量少于$VAL|Y$个。

original: Number of Custom Nations is at least $VAL|Y$.
translation: 自定义国家的数量至少$VAL|Y$个。

original: §RCan't randomly select a country during hotjoin.§!
translation: §R在热加入期间无法随机选择国家§!

original: §RCannot randomly select a country when loading a savegame.§!
translation: §R无法在读取存档时随机选择国家§!

original: §RMust use Normal or Historical setup to be able to randomly select a country.§!
translation: §R必须在正常或史实配置下才能随机选择国家§!

original: §RCannot randomly select a country when you have already told the host that you are ready.§!
translation: §R在你已经告诉房主你已经准备就绪后无法随机选择国家§!

original: Hotjoining has been disabled in this game.
translation: 在这场游戏中热加入已经被关闭了

original: §RNot possible to connect to game because players have created Custom Nations after savegame was loaded.§!
translation: §R由于玩家在读取存档后建立了自定义国家,无法连接上游戏§!

original: §RNot possible to connect to game because players have created Custom Nations after generating Random New World.§!
translation: §R由于玩家在生成新世界后建立了自定义国家,无法连接上游戏§!

original: Joining this game has been disabled for an unknown reason.
translation: 由于一个未知的原因无法加入游戏

original: §RCannot edit Custom Nations while a player is loading a savegame.§!
translation: §R当一位玩家读取存档时无法编辑自定义国家§!

original: §RCannot edit Custom Nations when you have already told the host that you are ready.§!
translation: §R在告诉房主你已经准备就绪后无法编辑自定义国家§!

original: §RAdding Custom Nations not allowed in Options.§!
translation: §R设定中禁用了添加自定义国家。§!

original: There is §Y$TOTAL$§!¤ worth of loot in this province.
translation: 在该省份中有§Y$TOTAL$§!¤价值的战利品可掠夺

original: The amount looted per month depends on the number of hostile regiments present. A maximum of §Y$AMT$§!¤ may be looted from a province in a single month.
translation: 每月掠夺数量基于部队规模. 每月最大可以掠夺 §Y$AMT$§!¤ .

original: There is §Y$TOTAL$§!¤ worth of loot in this province, and our armies will loot §Y$MONTHLY$§!¤ next month.
translation: 在该省份中有§Y$TOTAL$§!¤价值的战利品可掠夺,并且我们的军队每个月将掠夺§Y$MONTHLY$§!¤的战利品

original: We will gain $CHANGE$ Horde unity due to this.
translation: 因此我们将获得$CHANGE$的部落团结。

original: This province is completely drained by war and it will not be possible to find more loot here.
translation: 该省份已经被洗劫一空并且无法在这里掠夺更多的战利品了

original: The province is currently §R$PERCENTAGE$%§! looted, resulting in the following effects:
translation: 该省份目前被掠夺了§R$PERCENTAGE$%§!，导致以下效果：

original: §Y$DELAY$§! days after the last looting, the province will start recovering by §G$PERCENTAGE$%§! monthly.
translation: 在最近的掠夺§Y$DELAY$§!天后,这个省份将开始每月恢复§G$PERCENTAGE$%§!

original: This province was last looted on §Y$LAST_LOOT_DATE$§!. It will start recovering by §G$PERCENTAGE$%§! monthly on §Y$FUTURE_LOOT_DATE$§!, unless it is looted again before that date.
translation: 该省份最近在§Y$LAST_LOOT_DATE$§!被掠夺。它将每月恢复§G$PERCENTAGE$%§!从§Y$FUTURE_LOOT_DATE$§!开始,除非它在该日期前再次被掠夺

original: This province is currently recovering by §G$PERCENTAGE$%§! monthly.
§RYou must restart the game to play multiplayer, because you entered the singleplayer screen or hosted/joined a multiplayer game.§!
translation: §R由于你进入了单人模式或开始或加入了多人游戏,你必须在重启游戏后才能游玩多人游戏§!

original: §RYou must restart the game without the -nudge command line option to play multiplayer, because it would cause out of synch.§!
translation: §R你需要重启游戏并不使用-nudge指令打开游戏才能游玩多人游戏因为该指令将导致无法同步§!

original: Next building slot unlocked at §Y$VAL$§! Development.
translation: 下一个建筑槽位将在发展度达到§Y$VAL$§!后解锁。

original: You are transferring trade power, which prevents demanding it.
translation: 你已经在转移贸易力量.

original: §YThere will be a battle on $DATE$ if we move here.§!
translation: §O如果我们向这里行军,那么将会在$DATE$爆发一场战役§!

original: A battle will begin here between @$ATK$$ATTACKER|Y$ and @$DEF$$DEFENDER|Y$ on $DATE$
translation: 一场战役将于$DATE$在@$ATK$$ATTACKER|Y$与@$DEF$$DEFENDER|Y$之间爆发。

original: - Due to lack of control of the hostile fortress, the $WHO|Y$ army will be the attacker in this combat.
translation: - 由于未能攻占敌军堡垒,$WHO|Y$的军队将在这场战役中成为进攻方

original: - Due to $TERRAIN|Y$ terrain, the attacker gets a $VAL$ penalty to the diceroll.
translation: - 由于$TERRAIN|Y$的地形,进攻方将在掷骰子时获得$VAL$的惩罚

original: If the attacking general has higher Maneuver than the defending general, the crossing penalty will be ignored.
translation: 如果进攻方的将领的机动比防守方的高,跨河惩罚将被无视
如果§R< $BAD$§!，否则如果§O< $QUITE_BAD$§!，\n否则如果§Y< $NEUTRAL$§!，否则§G>= $NEUTRAL$§!

original: During war, will go to a friendly port. Any mission will resume when the war ends.
translation: 在战争期间,该舰队将前往友方的港口。任何任务将在战争结束后恢复

original: Allow friendly armies to attach to this army
translation: 允许友方军队跟随该军队

original: Allow friendly fleets to attach to this fleet
translation: 允许友方舰队跟随该舰队

original: This province produces §Y$NAME$§! which is not impacted by production modifiers.
translation: 该省份生产§Y$NAME$§!而这一数据不受生产修正的影响

original: You need §Y$COST$§W £adm£ to reduce Inflation, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W.
translation: 降低通货膨胀需要 §Y$COST$§W £adm£而你只有§Y$VAL$§W。

original:
Declaring this war will have immediate severe negative effects.

Stability effects:
translation:
对其宣战将立即导致严重的负面影响。

稳定度影响：

original: This fleet has left port and is out of your Supply Range and cannot be assigned a new mission until it returns from its exploration mission.
translation: 舰队已经离开了一个港口，并且无法在回到你的供应范围之前分配别的任务。
在贸易节点§Y$NODE$§!追捕私掠船

original: Currently hiding from enemy fleets that are too strong.
translation: 目前正在躲避过于强大的敌方舰队

original: You can try to increase the mission §YAggressiveness§! setting to make the fleet take greater risks.
translation: 你可以尝试提高任务§Y侵略性§!设置使舰队承担更大的风险。
正在前往§Y$PROV$§!躲避敌方舰队

original: The fleet will evade enemy fleets en route to its destination.
translation: 该舰队将前往目的地躲避敌方舰队

original: Seek out and attack vulnerable enemy fleets in the selected region.
translation: 在所选择的地区中寻找并进攻脆弱的敌方舰队

original: Blockade enemy ports, evading enemy fleets that are not significantly weaker.
translation: 封锁敌方港口并躲避较强的敌方舰队

original: Seek out and attack enemy fleets near allied coastlines, focusing on troop transports.
translation: 在附近盟友的海岸线附近寻找并进攻敌方舰队,主要进攻敌军运输舰队

original: The fleet will start Patrolling between its current location and end destination.
translation: 这支舰队将开始在它目前的位置和目的地之间巡逻

original: Send the fleet to explore a region or its coastline or attempt to circumnavigate the globe.
translation: 派遣该舰队在一个地区或其海岸线探索或尝试环球航行

original: Send the fleet to explore the $REGIONNAME$ region.
translation: 派遣该舰队在$REGIONNAME$地区探索

original: Send the fleet to explore the $REGIONNAME$ (coast) region.
translation: 派遣该舰队在$REGIONNAME$(海岸)地区探索

original: Click to select the §Y$REGION$§! region for this mission.
translation: 点击以选择§Y$REGION$§!地区开始任务

original: §RThe $REGION$ region cannot be selected for this mission.§!
To start Patrolling, first right-click on a destination at least one sea zone away.
translation: 首先右键点击至少一个海域之外的目的地以开始巡逻

original: To Evade enemies, first right-click on a destination.
translation: 首先右键点击一个目的地以开始躲避敌方

original: Score is adjusted due to $DIFFICULTY|Y$ difficulty: $MOD$
Adjust the behavior of this fleet when it is carrying out a mission.
translation: 调整该舰队执行任务时的行为
已经要求收回非法领土

original: The largest Trade Power share in the node ($COUNTRY|Y$) makes privateers $VAL$ efficient here.
translation: 在该节点中最大的贸易份额($COUNTRY|Y$)使得在这里的私掠能获得$VAL$

original: The Repair Threshold determines how much damage the fleet will take while before going to port for repairs.
translation: 维修阈值决定该舰队在回港维修之前能承受的伤害

original:
Aggressiveness influences how the fleet will react to enemy ships while on a mission.
The higher the value, the stronger enemies the fleet will try to engage.

(Exploration, Evade and 'Repair damaged ships' missions are not affected by this setting.)
translation:
侵略性影响舰队在执行任务时对敌方舰队的应对方式。
这个值越高，舰队就会尝试迎击越强大的敌舰。

（探索、躲避以及「修理受损舰船」的任务不会被该设置影响。）

original:
On the Cautious setting, the fleet will generally try to avoid overwhelming enemy forces and cut their own losses, as well as avoid attrition.

§YHunt Mission§!:
Avoid strong enemy fleets and engage if there is a reasonable chance of winning.

§YBlockade Mission§!:
Avoid large engagements while blockading.

§YIntercept Mission§!:
Intercept reasonably sized enemy fleets near your coasts.

§YEvade§!, §YExploration§!, §YRepair§!:
Not affected.
translation:
设置为谨慎后，该舰队通常会尝试躲避过于强大的敌方舰队、减少损失以及损耗

§Y追捕任务§!：
躲避强大的敌方舰队并在有较大机会胜利时交战

§Y封锁任务§!：
在封锁港口的同时避免大规模交战

§Y拦截任务§!：
在你的海岸线附近拦截规模合理的敌方舰队

§Y躲避任务§!， §Y探索任务§!，§Y维修任务§!：
不被影响

original:
On the Bold setting, the fleet will have the courage to chase the enemy further than Cautious fleets, as well as accept a little attrition.

§YHunt Mission§!:
Willing to accept some attrition to chase the enemy fleets down.

§YBlockade Mission§!:
Aggressively blockade enemy ports.

§YIntercept Mission§!:
Willing to chase enemy fleets away from your coasts a little further than Cautious fleets.

§YEvade§!, §YExploration§!, §YRepair§!:
Not affected.
translation:
设置为大胆后，该舰队将比谨慎的舰队更加敢于追击敌舰并能忍受一定损耗

§Y追捕任务§!：
能接受一定损耗以追击敌方舰队

§Y封锁任务§!：
带有侵略性地封锁敌方港口

§Y拦截任务§!：
追击敌方舰队时比谨慎的舰队追得更远

§Y躲避任务§!，§Y探索任务§!，§Y维修任务§!：
不被影响

original: There is a §Y$CHANCE$%§! chance that enemy ships can be captured instead of being sunk.\nThis chance is based on your countries ability to capture ships, the fleet's highest ranking Admiral's Maneuver skill and his personality.\nEnemy ships with low morale may also be captured after the battle.
translation: 敌方舰船有§Y$CHANCE$%§!的几率被俘获而非被击沉。\n该几率取决于舰队中指挥级别最高的海军将领的机动能力。\n敌方低士气的舰船也可能在交战结束后被俘获。

original: Determines how many ships can engage the enemy this round.
translation: 决定这一回合内有多少战舰能与敌方交战。
核心化$NAME$地区的所有省份

original: Are you sure you want to spend §Y$COST$§!£adm£ to make the following $COUNT$/$TOTAL$ provinces Cores?\n§Y$PROVS$§!
translation: 你确定要消耗 §Y$COST$§! £adm£ 将以下$COUNT$/$TOTAL$个省份核心化？\n§Y$PROVS$§!

original: Core as many Provinces here as you have £adm£ to afford.
translation: 消耗你承担得起的所有£adm£核心化这个地区尽可能多的省份。

original: No provinces can be cored here.
translation: 在这里没有省份能被核心化。

original: You need more £adm£ to core any Provinces here.
translation: 你需要更多的 £adm£ 用来核心化这里的省份。

original: We do not own this province.
You are §G$YEARS$§! years ahead of time in this technology.
translation: 你在这项科技上领先了§G$YEARS$§!年。

original: You are §RNOT§! ahead of time in this technology.
translation: 你在这项科技上§R没有§!领先。

original: Being ahead of time in this technology will give you the following bonuses for the next §G$YEARS$§! years:
translation: 提前研发该科技使你在接下来§G$YEARS$§!年内获得以下加成：

original: Spread of Institutions is modified by:\n
translation: 思潮传播受到以下效果修正：\n

original: There is currently nothing modifying the spread of institutions.
translation: 目前思潮传播不受修正。

original: The Institution $NAME$ is currently growing in this province.
Only one Institution can grow in a province at a time.
translation: 在一个省份中，同一时间内仅有一个思潮能够传播。

original: §RRandom New World not allowed by Mod:§! §Y$NAME$§!
This age will start $MONTH|Y$ months after the following is true:
translation: 这个时代将在以下条件达成的$MONTH|Y$个月后开启：

original: The current age is about to end. All Splendor and abilities will be cleared, and a new set of objectives will be available.
translation: 当前时代即将结束。所有辉煌点数和能力将被清除并且新的目标将被颁布。

original: Your level of Splendor is currently high enough to be able to purchase an Ability.
translation: 你当前的辉煌点数足以购买一个能力。

original: Your level of Meritocracy is currently high enough to be able to enact a Decree.
translation: 你当前有足够的的贤能值来颁布一道圣旨。

original: Isolationism represents a nation's willingness to adopt ideas and technologies from abroad. It can range from $FIRSTISOLATIONLEVELNAME|Y$ (§YLevel $FIRSTISOLATIONLEVELVALUE$§!) to $LASTISOLATIONLEVELNAME|Y$ (§YLevel $LASTISOLATIONLEVELVALUE$§!).\n\n§MIsolationism is changed through the way you react to Incidents that occur during the game. Each Incident lasts for more than 10 years and can end with your Isolationism moving towards Open, Closed or leaving it unchanged.§!
translation: 孤立主义倾向体现了一个国家对于外来理念和技术的接受程度。它的范围是$FIRSTISOLATIONLEVELNAME|Y$（§Y$FIRSTISOLATIONLEVELVALUE$级§!）至$LASTISOLATIONLEVELNAME|Y$（§Y$LASTISOLATIONLEVELVALUE$级§!）。\n\n§M孤立主义倾向的变化取决于你如何应对游戏中出现的事变。每个事变持续超过十年并能使你的孤立主义倾向往开放或封闭倾斜，抑或不发生改变。§!
你目前的孤立主义等级是「$ISOLATIONLEVELTITLE|Y$ （§Y$ISOLATIONLEVEL$级§!）」\n$ISOLATIONLEVELDESCRIPTION$

original: If our Isolationism levels change, our nation would get the following effects:\n$ISOLATIONISMDESCRIPTIONLIST$
translation: 当我们的孤立主义倾向变化时，我们的国家将获得以下效果：\n$ISOLATIONISMDESCRIPTIONLIST$

original: You can't press sailors from a colonial nation, if they have less than $NEED|Y$ of their sailors. They currently have $CURR|Y$.
translation: 如果殖民国家的水手少于$NEED|Y$，你将无法向他们强制征收水手。他们目前有$CURR|Y$。

original: You will gain $SAILORS|Y$ sailors from them.\n
translation: 你将从他们那获得$SAILORS|Y$水手。\n

original: This fleet is waiting for sailors before continuing its exploration mission
translation: 在继续其勘探任务之前，这支舰队需要补充水手

original: This mission is available to you because you are playing as $COUNTRY$.
translation: 该任务可用，因为你正扮演$COUNTRY$。

original: You can complete one or more Missions
translation: 你可以完成一个或多个任务

original: By using $VAL|Y$ gathered power for '$NAME|Y$', we will impact war exhaustion by $CHANGE$ and raise $UNITS|Y$ Cossacks Regiments in our capital.
translation: 通过收集 '$NAME|Y$' $VAL|Y$  , 我们能影响厌战情绪 $CHANGE$ 并且增加首都中哥萨克军团 $UNITS|Y$ 个。

original: This will increase our stability cost to $MODIFIER$ by relying on these regiments.
translation: 由于依赖这些军团，我们的稳定性花费将提高到$MODIFIER$。

original: The Government Rank $RANK|Y$ gives the following benefits:\n
It is not possible to abandon this state as we are converting the people of $PROVINCENAME|Y$.\n
translation: 无法取消该直属州，因为我们正在$PROVINCENAME|Y$传教。\n

original: It is not possible to abandon this state as we are converting the people of $PROVINCENAME|Y$.\n
translation: 无法取消该直属州，因为我们正在转变$PROVINCENAME|Y$的文化。\n

original: By no longer considering $NAME$ as a State, we will no longer be forced to pay $COST|Y$¤ maintenance every month, but their local autonomy in the provinces will increase to a much higher level.\n\n§RAll modifiers given by increasing local autonomy will be removed from the provinces.§!
translation: 不再将$NAME$视为直属州，我们不再需要每月支付$COST|Y$¤的维护费，但他们的自治度将会增加到一个很高的水平。\n\n§R源自提升自治度的修正效果将从该省移除。§!
对拉杰普特的巨大让步。
统治者是拿破仑·波拿巴

original: The English Monarchy is a representative monarchy, with a parliament called regularly by the ruling monarch. It is based on the privileges defined in Magna Carta.
translation: 英国君主制是一种代议君主制体系，其议会由君主定期召开。该制度基于《大宪章》规定的权利。

original: It was a short-lived city-state government that formed in the Duchy of Milan when the Duke died without an heir in 1447.
translation: 这是一个短命的城邦制政府。在1477年，米兰公国的公爵死后没有继承人，导致了这个政府的形成。

original: A powerful territorial vassal lord in Japan, ruling their hereditary lands under the shogun.\n§MA country can take over the Shogunate, and become the overlord of all Daimyo Subjects, by taking the province of Kyoto.§!
translation: 日本体制中强有力的地方诸侯领主，在幕府将军治下统治着其世袭领地。\n§M各国国主可以通过上洛即占据京都来继任将军并成为所有大名的宗主。§!

original: Although nominally appointed by the Emperor, the shogunate became a hereditary military dictatorship and the de facto ruler of Japan between 1192 and 1867.\n§MA country can take over the Shogunate, and become the overlord of all Daimyo Subjects, by taking the province of Kyoto.§!
translation: 虽然名义上由天皇任命，但幕府将军成为世袭军事独裁统治者，并于1192年至1867年间成为日本事实上的统治者。\n§M各国国主可以通过上洛即占据京都来继任将军并成为所有大名的宗主。§!

original: A powerful Lord in Japan, ruling their hereditary lands without acknowledging any shogun.\n§MA country can take over the Shogunate, and become the overlord of all Daimyo Subjects, by taking the province of Kyoto.§!
translation: 日本体制中强有力的地方诸侯领主，在幕府将军治下统治着其世袭领地。\n§M各国国主可以通过上洛即占据京都来继任将军并成为所有大名的宗主。§!

original: Although similar to the feudal fief system, the holders under the iqta tax farming system did not actually own their lands, and were not guaranteed that they would be inherited by the next generation.
translation: 虽然类似于封建封地制度，但是农业税收系统下的持有者实际上并没有拥有他们的土地，并且不保证他们会被下一代继承。

original: This state is ruled by a religious leader with the throne passing on within his divinely sanctioned family.
translation: 这个国家的统治者同时兼任宗教领袖，其王位在一个受神灵认可的家族内传递。

original: This state was once taken over by Mamluk slave soldiers and sustains itself through continued importation of soldier slaves.
translation: 这个国家曾一度被马穆鲁克奴隶士兵所占领，并通过持续输入奴隶士兵来维持自己的地位。

original: The Dutch Republic is a confederation of seven provinces, which have their own governments and are very independent, and Generality lands, which are governed directly by the States-General, the federal government.
translation: 荷兰共和国是一个由七个省及若干分子邦组成的联邦。共和国各省有着相当高的独立性，且都拥有自己的政府，而分子邦则由联省议会即联邦政府直接管辖。

original: Corruption increases over time due to unbalanced research, overextension, lack of religious unity and having more territories than max states. It can be decreased by high stability and being ahead of time in administrative or diplomatic technology. If all else fails you can spend ducats to reduce corruption over time. Corruption can affect all power costs, minimum autonomy as well as spy defense and spy network construction speed.
translation: 不平衡的研究、过度扩张或低宗教统一会导致腐败度随着时间而增加，而高稳定度或领先于时代的行政、外交科技则可以减少腐败度。如果其他手段都不奏效，你还可以花费金钱来减少腐败度。腐败度会影响所有的点数花费、地方自治度下限及间谍防御和间谍网的建立速度。

original: Only show servers that are not full
translation: 仅显示不拥挤的服务器

original: Only show servers that have players online
translation: 仅显示有玩家在线的服务器

original: Only show servers with no password
translation: 仅显示不需要密码的服务器

original: Only show servers with the same game version
translation: 仅显示相同版本的服务器

original: Only show servers with the same mod(s) active
translation: 仅显示激活了相同MOD的服务器

original: Only show servers with Steam friends
translation: 仅显示有Steam好友的服务器

original: $NAME|Y$ from $COUNTRY|Y$ is working on Settlement Growth, gradually improving Development in $PROVINCE|Y$.\nEvery year, there is a $CHANCE|%1G$ chance of adding $DEV|Y$ Base Tax, Production or Manpower. This chance is reduced with higher Development and affected by Local Development Cost modifiers.
translation: $COUNTRY|Y$的$NAME|Y$正在垦殖$PROVINCE|Y$，使其发展度逐步增长。\n每年都会有$CHANCE|%1G$的几率增加$DEV|Y$点基础税收、生产或人力。这一几率会因更高的发展度而减少，也会被本地发展度花费修正所影响。

original: Cannot construct Manufactory in gold provinces.
translation: 不能在产金省份建造工厂。

original: A provincial government set to handle the affairs of the New World colonies, led by a Governor or Viceroy.
translation: 一个省政府负责处理由总督或总督领导的新世界殖民地事务。

original: §RYou can only have $MAX$ $CATEGORY$ policies at the same time§!

Enacting $NAME$ will raise our policy cost to $COST|Y$ $TYPE$ power each month, and it has to be active for at least $YEARS|Y$ years before it can be repealed. It will give you the following benefits:\n$EFFECTS$\nAre you sure?
translation: 推行$NAME$将提高我们每月的政策支出 $COST|Y$ $TYPE$ ，且至少施行$YEARS|Y$年后这条政策才能被废止。这项政策将会带来以下增益效果：\n$EFFECTS$\n你确定吗?

original: In this type of Monarchy the heir will be selected by the Sejm.
translation: 在这种君主制中，继承人将由众议院选中推举出来。

original: When $NAME$ are in power we will get new rulers elected every 4 years, but no ruler can hold more than 1 term at a time.
translation: 当$NAME$掌权时每四年将选举出一名统治者，但是每位统治者的任期不得超过一届。

original: When $NAME$ are in power, our current ruler will continue to rule until his/her death.
translation: 当$NAME$掌权时，我们当前的统治者将持续执政直至他或她的死亡。

original: The strengthening of the Statists has forced $MONARCH$ to accept the election of a new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Both the Statists and the Orangists have put forward a new candidate.
translation: 议会派的得势迫使$MONARCH$接受新任[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的大选。议会派和奥兰治派都各自提出了新任候选人。

original: The strengthening of the Statists has forced $MONARCH$ to accept the election of a new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Both the Statists and the Monarchists have put forward a new candidate.
translation: 议会派的得势迫使$MONARCH$接受新任[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的大选。议会派和君主制主义者都各自提出了新任候选人。

original: The unfortunate passing of $MONARCH$ forces us to hold a premature election. Both the Statists and the Orangists have put forward a new candidate.
translation: $MONARCH$的不幸去世迫使我们提前开始选举。议会派和奥兰治派都各自提出了新任候选人。

original: The unfortunate passing of $MONARCH$ forces us to hold a premature election. Both the Statists and the Monarchists have put forward a new candidate.
translation: $MONARCH$的不幸去世迫使我们提前开始选举。议会派和君主制主义者都各自提出了新任候选人。

original: Subject nations can never become Great Powers.
translation: 属国永远无法成为列强。

original: There are not enough $CULTURE$ People in full cores within the $NAME$ to raise any banners.
translation: 在$NAME$地区没有足够的持$CULTURE$文化的核心省份来招募八旗。

original: Since you are the lesser party in a Personal Union but §Y$WHO$§! is not a Monarchy you retain your own Legitimacy but it does not change when you get a new leader.\n
translation: 我们虽是被联合统治的一方，但§Y$WHO$§!并非我们的皇室成员，我们因而保留了自己的正统性；但当我们迎来新领袖时，正统性将不会改变。\n

original: Since they are the lesser party in a Personal Union but §Y$WHO$§! is not a Monarchy they retain their own Legitimacy but it does not change when they get a new leader.\n
translation: 虽然他们是被联合统治的一方，但§Y$WHO$§!并非他们的皇室成员，他们因而保留了自己的正统性；但当他们迎来新领袖时，正统性将不会改变。\n

original: It is not possible to scorch the earth while exiled.
translation: 流亡时不能实行焦土政策。

original: Declaring war on a fellow $REL$ will move us towards Mysticism by §Y$VAL$§!.
translation: 向$REL$同胞宣战将提高§Y$VAL$§!神秘主义。
达摩 - 印度苏丹国包

original: The unfortunate passing of $MONARCH$ forces us to hold an election. After several rounds of secret allotment, three candidates have been presented each representing powerful factions within [Root.Country.GetName]. Officially the election should be decided by lottery, however we could pull some strings...
translation: $MONARCH$的不幸逝世迫使我们举行一次选举。在数轮的秘密配票后，分别代表着[Root.Country.GetName]国内不同势力的三名候选人浮出水面。原则上选举结果由票数决定，但是我们也可以适当地走一些后门……

original:
You can Consecrate Metropolitans in states with at least 30 Development if all provinces are fully cored, Orthodox and of an Accepted Culture.

Consecrating a Metropolitan in $NAME|Y$ will give us $VAL$ Patriarch Authority, and the following permanent effect:
$EFFECT$
translation:
你可以祝圣一个总发展度达到 30、所有省份的文化已被接受且信奉东正教的直属州来建立都主教区。

祝圣并建立都主教区$NAME|Y$给予我们 $VAL$ 牧首权威以及以下永久效果：
$EFFECT$

original: You cannot order a barrage against your own fort.
translation: 你不可以炮击你自己的要塞。

original: You cannot order a barrage if you are not in command of the siege and do not participate as an overlord.
translation: 当你不是本次围攻的指挥官或其宗主国时，无法炮轰城墙

original: You currently have $CANNONS_CURRENT|Y$ and cannot order a Barrage.
translation: 你目前拥有$CANNONS_CURRENT|Y$所以无法炮轰城墙。

original: You need $COST|Y$£mil to order an naval barrage, and you only have $CURRENT|Y$.
translation: 你需要$COST|Y$£mil£来进行海上炮击，而你只有$CURRENT|Y$。

original: You cannot order a naval barrage in a province without a coast.
translation: 你无法对非沿海省份进行海上炮击。

original: You have no navies in adjacent sea provinces to perform a naval barrage.
translation: 你在相邻的海域没有舰队，因此无法进行海上炮击。

original: You need at least §Y100§! cannons for each fort level to order a Naval Barrage. You need at least $CANNONS_NEEDED|Y$ to order a Barrage on this fort.
translation: 对于每一级要塞，你需要至少§Y100§!门火炮来进行海上炮击。你需要至少$CANNONS_NEEDED|Y$门火炮来对这座要塞进行海上炮击。

original: Ordering a naval barrage will create a breach for a cost of $COST|Y$£mil .
translation: 进行海上炮击将制造城墙裂口，花费$COST|Y$£mil£。

original: states owned by you or your non-tributary subjects with
translation: 个属于你或你的非朝贡属国的直属州

original:
By declaring bankruptcy, we will write off all our loans.
This will cause a direct loss of prestige and stability. All hired advisors and mercenaries will also leave our service and any Subsidies to other countries will be canceled.
Bankruptcy will furthermore set us back throughout our country by stopping all construction progress and causing devastation everywhere.
During $DURATION|Y$ years we will also suffer the following effects:
$EFFECT$
All your Centers of Trade will be §Rdowngraded§!
All your Trade Company Investments will be §Rlost§!

Are you sure?
translation:
宣布破产将清空我们的债务。
这同样会失去大量威望、稳定度。已雇的顾问及雇佣兵都会离开，所有对他国的资助会被取消。
破产将中止国内所有建设进程，倒退近年来所有建设成果（建筑、核心、文化等），并在全国范围内造成荒废。
在 $DURATION|Y$ 年内我们会受到以下影响：
$EFFECT$
你所有的贸易中心将§R降级§!
你将§R失去§!在贸易公司的所有投资

你确定要这么做吗？
